name: Stylish Downtown 2-BR Near US Stadium & HCMC
description:
Rare find! Experience downtown Minneapolis up close and personal when you book this specious 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom fully furnished rental! This charming apartment is centrally located and is less then 0.5 mile from Hennepin County Medical Center, US bank Stadium and the Armory.

Perfect for traveling nurses or professionals working downtown!

host.name: Spencer
host.about: 28 year old small business owner, traveler, PhD student, and Minnesota native. I am a first-timer to hosting with Airbnb, and really hope to offer visitors the experience I want when traveling. Do NOT hesitate to reach out with questions, feedback, or even recommendations to be the best I can!

amenities: 55 inch HDTV with Amazon Prime Video, Netflix

detailed_reviews.comments: Great host & air bnb felt like home

Mice, pubs, stains, and no refund.
Longer term stay, given the aforementioned issues we requested to move out. Host indicated that 'he shouldn't be financially penalized for our inability to adapt'. 
The house was very minimally equipped, probably fine for only a few days. The host did agree to provide more kitchenware and the like but over a week later and after we had decided to move out. 
The pictures of the inside of the house are accurate as it has been redone to a modern standard but the niceness ends at the very back door of the unit - lots of rules (don't use main door, laundry only two days a week) and loud neighbors. Very unpleasant neighborhood with many homeless people and drug use.

name: Luxury 6Bed Retreat in St Paul
description: This spacious home offers 6 bedrooms, 3 baths, 2 full kitchens, and a game room. Enjoy smart locks, fast WiFi, and self check-in. Located in a quiet neighborhood near top Minneapolis attractions, with free street parking and one garage spot. Perfect for families or groups—relax on the rear decks or explore the city with ease. Your home away from home!

host.name: Mohmeet
host.about: I'm Moh, your sports-loving, music-savvy, spicy food enthusiast host. I can't wait to share my cozy home with you. You can usually find me at a coffee shop ordering a chai latte and pretending to pay attention to zoom meetings. I hope to make your stay the best you've ever had - shoutout Drake.

name: Spring Street
description:
Cute single family home in the heart of downtown Somerset. Walking distance to all Somerset's downtown has to offer.
Three bedroom (two queen beds and twin bed with twin trundle). 
Brand new queen sleeper sofa.
Updated appliances and furniture.
Outdoor patio set with umbrella.

Public Apple River Access across the street
0.6 miles to Somerset Amitheater
0.6 miles to LaPoint Event Center
0.7 miles to Sam's Christmas Village
0.7 miles to Somerset Ice Arena

detailed_reviews.comments: Host went above and beyond with presentation and thoughtfulness. Thank you so very much. Sorry,  we didn't know what trash cans to throw our trash in.

Krista’s place was beautiful, peaceful and perfect for my family’s stay! She was always responsive, gave recommendations and left lots of amenities and extra things around the house for us to use (the extra chargers were especially helpful)!! The property was exactly as described and my sister especially like the comfortable beds and cozy linens! Thank you Krista, if we are ever back in town I would love to book again!

This was a wonderful place for our girls weekend. Plenty of amenities and Krista was incredibly kind. She was incredibly quick with any concerns we had and the whole place was well organized and clean. The decor was very cute as well and overall I would say the place was very nice. I would definitely stay here again if I end up in the area again.

We stay at a lot of Airbnbs - and Krista definitely went above and beyond for our stay!
Everything was clean, tidy, enough space, extra personal touches + amenities making it the perfect Airbnb. 
It was the perfect Airbnb to gather with friends for a weekend away when we wanted to spend some time in Stillwater which was about a 15 minute drive. 
There are a lot of restaurants and coffee shops not far away in town as well!
Krista's place was perfect for our girls getaway weekend! It was quiet, cozy, and close to Stillwater. The listing description is accurate. We would definitely stay again!
It was great! Krista made it a cozy and inviting place to stay with nice touches and warm blankets. Lots of amenities and local info in a binder. Thanks, Krista!
House was perfect.   would definitely stay again next time we're the area
I booked for a work crew. Property was as listed and Krista was great to work with.
We enjoyed Kristas place! If was very nice and welcoming! She made us feel right at home! She was very responsive throughout our stay, I would highly recommend!

Krista’s place was perfect for our family and she was super accommodating. The house has everything you need to make you feel at home. Highly recommend to anyone staying in the Somerset area and would definitely book again.

The house was perfect for our weekend.  Very comfortable, well appointed kitchen, and good location for our activities. Would recommend any guests looking in the area to stay here. We were a party of 4 and could very easily had a couple more guests with us.
Much cheaper than the hotels in Hudson, WI. A little bit of a drive to Hudson but not too bad. Nice updates to an older house.

The home is very lovely. Nice and quiet neighborhood. Centrally located in Somerset.  We enjoyed our stay. It felt like home. Came in summer and there were a/c units throughout the home to keep the place cool. Lots of cozy throw blankets to cuddle up with even though it was summer. Easy walks to market and coffee shop. We were in town for a wedding. It was busy enough that we could have appreciated more time to just hangout.

We booked Krista’s place for a family wedding the location was literally down the street! 
When we first drove up to the home I was so excited it looked so nice! Krista provided us with a code and instructions that were easy to follow. As I walked in I noticed that there was a sign with my name on it greeting us! I loved it !
Then we all walked in and were in awe of how nice the inside was. It was very clean and beautifully decorated. We had everything we needed like it was our own home minus food. 
The rooms were spacious and beds were comfortable. We had enough towels and blankets. Everything was great ! We would definitely stay here again and definitely recommend this place !
Perfect house near the la pointe venue!
The house was great.  Great coffee and tea assortments.  Very clean, we had plenty of space.  Would recommend and stay again.
Great stay! Described as is. Very easy check in
This AirBnB was very nice, clean and well taken care of.  Would stay again.

Great weekend stay with our family. Very kid friendly. My sister brought her 10 month old and there were lots of toys, books, pack and play, high chair and kids silverware. Everything we needed to stay in and cook a few meals. House was very cozy and clean. About 20 mins from Hudson and Stillwater for easy day trips. Would definitely come back!
We enjoyed our stay and everything was nice and clean!
Would definitely use again

name: Furnished Townhome
description: Located in the tranquil Cranberry Pointe residential community. This cozy retreat features one full bath and one half bath, fully equipped kitchen, comfortable living room, and a basement with an extra bed that can serve as a second bedroom. Enjoy in-unit laundry and the inviting front porch with a table and grill within an enclosed gate. Includes detached garage for secure parking and access to community pool. 15 minutes from nearly everything in the Twin Cities!

detailed_reviews.comments: what a nice place to spend an evening while travelling,  I would definately be back the next time I'm in Minneapolis.
The location is exceptionally safe, and the host is very kind. My time spent here has left me with nice sweet memories. Thank you!

Denise was a gem - most responsive host I ever had! They were very accommodating and friendly. The location was so convenient, easy to access interstate/highways. Also the best Mexican restaurant next door - Casa Deli!

I am originally from Minnesota but live in Scotland with my daughter. We come back every year or two for visits. Unexpectedly, this year our usual accommodation plans with family fell apart at the eleventh hour and very last minute I was scrambling to find a place for us to stay. What good fortune that we found  Denise's place!!
It is very conveniently located near my parents' home and my dad even stayed with us at Denise's several nights in the cool 'Dad Pad' downstairs. It is attractrive, bright, clean, cosy, and well-kitted out. (I even made use of the Kitchen-Aid to make cookies for friends and family when they came round to visit us! 😄)
Denise is an amazing host!! Quick to reply and sorting out anything that needed fixing. She was a kind, generous, and überfriendly host! I would recommend anyone to stay here, especially if needing a homebase for several days, as we were. We had 12 days/nights well enjoyed in Hopkins at Denise's!! Thank you Denise!
We really enjoyed staying. The house was a perfect place for our family to stay. The flexible check in/out made it super easy!
Denise was a wonderful host.  Very responsive to any questions.  Location was easy to find by following her directions.  Townhouse was clean and comfy.  Would stay here again!
Cute place - perfect for my family. Had everything we needed!
So grateful for this wonderful stay and host. We will definitely stay again!

The host was responsive and welcoming to us and our four dogs. We had questions about parking and securely locking the door to the property behind us. She was quick to respond in both cases and our questions were answered. I would recommend this property to others. It was convenient to us as we visited family and friends Minneapolis.

name: Modern suite in downtown Afton!
description:
Contemporary suite in the heart of Afton. Just steps from amazing restaurants, shopping, marinas & more. Perfect for a weekend getaway, boating, ski trip, hiking, or homebase while exploring the area

Unbeatable location to Afton Alps & Afton State Park 5 min, St Paul 25 min, airport 30 min away.

Bright & airy with skylights above the Pub. Amenities include Queen-size bed, Full kitchen with Keurig coffee maker, Sofa sleeper, access to wi-fi internet and SmartTV, Washer/dryer, off street Parking

detailed_reviews.comments: Great place, great location!  Super easy to communicate with - would highly recommend!!

We stayed at Eric’s place for a last minute weekend get away to do a fall hike at Afton State Park. It was right above a pub which was super convenient when we arrived in the evening and needed some food. From the Eric’s place, it was a short drive north to Hudson (cute town with cafes and restaurants) and a few miles south to Afton State Park.
The place was clean and comfortable.
Nice place for a getaway.

The house was super clean! A lot went on during my stay but Eric and his wife Cindy were always there to help. They respond to my questions in a few minutes and they were super helpful. Definitely would go again if I had chance!
Really enjoyed this place.  Above a pub, but VERY quiet (the pub closes at 9:00PM).  Great space, comfy bed , well stocked kitchen.  The town of Afton is small, but fun.

There was a hiccup with check in and we were assigned the incorrect unit. However it got sorted real quick. With owners being responding promptly. The place was less clean than our preference with the shower and bathroom particularly having hair and film and stains. However the rest was clean. The toilet did stop flushing however it was a quick fix with my spouse. We let them know if concerns and issues at check out with little interaction or response to our feedback. With all that being said we would come back and rent as it  was well centrally located and now we know what to expect. Thank you.

I would most definitely recommend this cute cozy little place. All kinds of walking trails nearby and it's along the scenic river way of the St. Croix, just a beautiful spot, all in all the place was squeaky clean. Exactly what he says. It is, it is, and it's spacious. Everything modern to be cozy, nice place.
Great time.  Very clean place.
Honestly wish we could have stayed longer. Place is huge, furnishings are ok, cleanliness is ok (found some dirty dishes), quiet place after the bar closes, overall happy with our stay.
Second time staying here.  Love it!
I booked this at the last minute and Eric got me in right away!  Great communicators

name: 5th Floor Studio | Gym | Pool | 1 mile to US Bank
description: Our spacious & modern High-Rise apartments are in an amazing Downtown location! Enjoy sweeping views directly from your unit. Walk to many restaurants & shops. Only 5 minutes to US Bank Stadium! Furnished with quality & design in mind to ensure a comfortable, stylish, & enjoyable stay. Our guests will enjoy access to the Pool, Gym, Rooftop Lounge & Grill area, Conference Room & more!

neighbourhood.overview:
Where you’ll be
Minneapolis, Minnesota, United States


Downtown West (aka The Central Business District) makes up the skyscraper dominated skyline of Minneapolis. But don’t let the association with work fool you – this is the *center of fun and nightlife* in the Mini-Apple – with 3 stadiums, a district for professional theaters, nightly live-music venues, sophisticated steakhouses, new American restaurants, and enough retail to shop-til-you-drop, all within walking distance – you can’t beat this location!

Minneapolis is known for its Skyway: 9 miles of elevated, climate controlled, enclosed walkways (the largest in the world!). With entrances all over downtown, including right here, once you arrive you don’t have to deal with subzero temps or hot humidity.

Just around the block you’ll find…
- AT&T Tower (1/2 block)
- Minnesota Orchestra (1/2 block)
- Dakota’s Jazz Club (1 block)
- Starbucks / Caribou Coffee (1 block)
-

amenities: Paid pack ’n play/travel crib - available upon request
Exercise equipment: elliptical, free weights, stationary bike, treadmill, yoga mat, workout bench, rowing

detailed_reviews.comments: Would stay again!
Great stay!

The Airbnb is in a great location, was reasonably priced and met expectations. I had a minor issue with the check in link, but the host was very responsive and resolved it immediately. I would stay here again.
This apartment was so beautiful and having access to all the amenities was so nice the 17th floor lounge was beautiful! So many things to do right around the building!
Great place to stay if you’re working downtown!
The building was beautiful, artistic and clean.
Nice place and convenient to downtown events
Overall a great and clean place. Did have a problem checking in however the host went above and beyond to fix the issue. Well worth it!

This was a beautiful location. We had some issues first checking in but host was instantly responsive and extremely helpful. They also checked in to see how our trip was and how the place was for us. I loved the unit and the amenities. This place is in a great part of the city with so much parking all around. We will most definitely be back and would 100% rent from this host again.
Great place in an awesome building! The amenities are awesome: spacious gym, cool lounges, epic rooftop pool. It’s right downtown and there’s always something going on. Highly recommend!
Great place downtown Minneapolis! Hassle-free check-in and great location to walk with many great restaurants nearby. Pool and tanning beds were amazing! Secure entry with guard on duty.
My new favorite place in Minneapolis 🤩

I had a few problems with my stay but the host was responsive. I appreciated his communication.
I only had a bottom sheet on my bed and there were stains on the mattress pad (cleaned, but stained with blood? and cigarette hole maybe), so I asked the host about that. Someone came and changed the sheets for me late, but before I was asleep, but they didn't have a new mattress pad (which felt reasonable to me, as they did what they could).
There were a couple of vertical blind panels missing on the patio window, so I didn't have full privacy and ended up propping up a broom with a towel to block out light. The host said he would follow up with maintenance about it. 
Definitely more of a corporate Airbnb than a property someone really has cared for and made sure has all of i's dotted. It was a bit dusty, so I think they're still working out their cleaning rhythm but not terrible. 
The checkin process requires selfie, drivers license on 3rd party site for security.

Very much enjoyed our stay at Curtwood. Basil provided clear instructions for check in and check out with photos to help. The place was easy to find, very clean and exactly as advertised. The complex is located right downtown and is very walkable! Basil was very helpful and would respond to any questions almost instantly. For the price, location, and friendly host, highly recommend!!
I was in town for an event, so I spent VERY LITTLE time here. But it was a comfortable and secure place to stay. I didn’t get to use any of the great amenities, but let’s hope for a next time, then!

We loved being in the heart of Minneapolis. It was fun to be able to walk to so many locations and find lots of things to do!! The only downfall we found was that parking wasn’t provided. We aren’t from the cities to navigating public parking options was difficult. We noticed there was parking under our building and wished it would have been included in our stay.
Great location, easy to find, close to numerous places in Downton Minneapolis but was a quiet and relaxed atmosphere.
I recommend it to you, it's like the description in the photo, it's Fancy Place for people who like Fancy places, it's for you, I felt at home, nothing to complain about this place

Very convenient to the convention center and environs.  Cheaper than local hotels.
Decor is very minimalist.  Concrete walls and ceiling.  Air conditioner unit is kinda loud.

I stayed here a few nights while in a work trip - the location was convenient and I enjoyed having a kitchenette. The apartment complex is easy to find and the website used for check-in was easy. There is a front desk and the woman working was kind enough to help me with the key box since the software froze when I was trying to check in. The apartment itself is fine - as others have mentioned, it felt a bit sterile and could use a deep clean and a couple of small repairs. The hand soap dispenser in the bathroom was empty. Overall this is a perfectly adequate place to stay and much cheaper than the nearby hotels, it just doesn’t necessarily feel “cozy”.
Was impressed by the accommodations and would definitely stay here again if I needed to be in downtown! In a great spot.
This was an excellent stay right in the heart of Minneapolis. Very responsive and helpful hosts. The unit had everything we needed and more!
Great communication.  Really quick responses.

Great stay! The host was super responsive and was proactive in their communication. The price was great, considering the location and amenities. I would stay again and recommend it to friends and family.
I really enjoyed this place.  It was clean, convenient, and comfortable.  Check in and check out were very easy and the host provided very clear instructions.  Would definitely stay there again!
Very easy and communicative. Perfect for my trip!
Todo limpio y práctico

Had a great stay in Minneapolis this past weekend! Check in/out process was extremely easy to navigate, very clear instructions. The building is beautiful, while we did not have time to use - having access to the gym and top floor amenities were a nice feature! The room was as described in ad. We parked directly across the street in a surface lot and were able to conveniently pay online. Walked everywhere - target, restaurants, and to the US bank stadium. Would definitely stay again, thanks!

My husband and I booked an eight night stay here and honestly we were uncomfortable. Maybe for two or three nights it would be better. The bed was extremely uncomfortable. The TV, although functional, flickered constantly and wasn't usable. There was a washer and dryer but they didn't provide anything to do laundry with which was surprising. There were several items in the room we noticed were broken: a piece of the closet, the luggage rack, and the TV as mentioned. I contacted the host twice. Both times the co-host Basil was responsive, but the information I was given wasn't accurate and they didn't do anything to remedy the TV issue even though we were staying a week. I am giving this place three stars because the location was wonderful and close to a lot of shopping, restaurants, and transit. We also enjoyed the kitchenette which made it easy to cook, although we had to buy all our own spices (including salt and pepper). Despite the location, we wouldn't stay here again.
Great stay here! Highly recommend!
Great stay in a convenient downtown location. Host provided everything to make a longer stay enjoyable.
I’ve stayed twice and it has been excellent both times. It’s the first place I would pick when staying in Minneapolis.
The Airbnb was perfect, i didn’t experience any adversity
Had no problems. Easy instructions to arrive/depart and host checked in with us to make sure everything was ok.

A good place for a quick stay! Host was easily accessible and quick to respond. However, place was not completely clean when arriving. The shampoo/body wash containers that were attached to the shower were completely empty. And the tv was glitching on the right side which made it hard to watch. Otherwise was a convenient location again for a short stay.
Amazing
Great location, I would recommend not having a car for parking purposes.

It was a great location and lovely studio! amazing bathtub and large soft king bed. The building was beautiful and all the instructions to get in were super easy! The hosts were amazing and answered all our questions and had super quick responses as well. Washer and dryer was a huge plus!
Great location and very clean!
Will recommend to other MSP visitors

There were two blinds missing in our room which did not allow full privacy. The TV must have had an issue with the lightening because it flickered the whole time we tried to use it which was really annoying. In their defense we were only there 2 nights and didn't want to request a new room or try to get it fixed since we were there a short time.

🌟 **Charming Studio Gem in Downtown!** 🌟  
This studio was an absolute delight! Nestled in a vibrant area, it’s steps from cafes, transit, and major attractions. Perfect for exploring the city yet quiet enough to unwind.  
The space is **immaculate**—modern, bright, and thoughtfully designed. The bed? Was comfortable. Compact but smartly organized, with ample storage and a kitchenette stocked with essentials (coffee included—lifesaver!). The bathroom sparkled, and the shower had great pressure. Bonus: fast Wi-Fi and a cozy workspace.  
**Host shines!** Responsive, friendly, and provided a detailed check in instructions
**5/5 stars!** Affordable, central, and packed with charm. Ideal for solo travelers or couples. Already planning my next stay—**don’t miss this one
Excellent location, host is very responsive and proactive, great place to stay in downtown
Beautiful city views, great restaurants, amazing time!

The host was quick and responsive when I had problems checking in and kept great communication throughout my stay. The bathroom was not clean when I first arrived but was quickly addressed and cleaned the very next day. Overall the stay was good and I would stay here again.

Be warned! If you like being sleep deprived and exposed to excessive dust and decay then this is the place for you!
From the outside, the building looks modern. The lobby looks “artsy” and cool. A place where the young professionals that live there can brag to their friends about.
But if you’re an AirBnB guest, prepare for bare minimum accommodations. 
The beds have no support. You will sink to the floor and your body will contort like a circus performer. You will wake up in a fog and stiff. 
It seems the AirBnB hosts are corporate drones that simply are trying to maximize profits by selling you on the rooftop experience and the fact that you are walking distance from everything the city has to offer.
That was the only upside. You can truly experience the city but there are far better hotels and deals out there to choose from.
Also, this place is not pet or human friendly.
They are concerned with pushing to leave them a 5 star review than  actually offer a 5 star experience.
Exactly as pictured. I highly recommend their condo.
Nice and clean place, and the decoration in the lobby and last floor, it’s outstanding!
Easy stay, lots of technology to manage to get in.

Had a great stay in Minneapolis for a work conference! Check in/out process was extremely easy to navigate, very clear instructions. The building is beautiful and accessible, and the room was as described in ad. Lots of nearby restaurants and things to do. Walked everywhere - target, restaurants, and to the US bank stadium. Would definitely stay again, thanks!
My stay was great would definitely stay again!

name: Arcade | Game Rm | Rooftop Patio Overlooking Downt
description:
▪️ Downtown Prescott – On Broad Street, walk to bars, restaurants, shops & marinas
▪️ Shared Rooftop – 2,000 sq ft with fire table, outdoor dining, & downtown views
▪️ Shared/Free Game Room – 5 arcade machines, ping pong, dartboard, 50” TV, game center
▪️ Private Deck – 300 sq ft with fire table & city views
▪️ Sleeps 8 – 3 king bedrooms + 1 queen sofa bed

neighbourhood.overview:
📍 Unbeatable Downtown Location! The Diamond Suite is located directly on Broad Street in the heart of downtown Prescott, giving you a front-row seat to the best the city has to offer.

🚶‍♂️ Walk Everywhere! Step outside and you’re just moments from:
✔ Gourmet restaurants & craft cocktail bars
✔ Boutique shopping & charming local businesses
✔ Lively dive bars & entertainment spots
✔ Scenic riverfront paths & parks

🚤 Short Walk to 3 Marinas! Whether you’re boating, fishing, or just enjoying the waterfront, you’re just a short stroll from 3 marinas, offering easy access to the scenic St. Croix and Mississippi Rivers.

⛵ Adventure & Relaxation at Your Doorstep! Explore Prescott’s unique blend of small-town charm and vibrant energy, all while staying in a luxurious and comfortable space right in the center of it all.

host.name: Megan
host.about:
Hi, I’m Megan! As an Airbnb host with a passion for bold design & unforgettable experiences, I transform properties into destinations.

Every space I host blends style, comfort, and adventure to leave a lasting impression. Whether a cozy retreat or group getaway, I love creating spaces that make every moment unforgettable.

Cheers to adventures in comfort and design! Book your next stay with me, and let’s make it extraordinary.

– Megan

detailed_reviews.comments: We stayed one night here and it was lovely. We enjoyed the walkability to dinner and coffee in the morning and lovely walk to the river. The train noise is legit and goes throughout the night. Maybe bring ear plugs if you are a light sleeper and we ran our room AC fan to have some white noise. That helped a lot. Great location and great hosts. We would stay again!

The space was amazzzzing! The decor and little extra touches were greatly appreciated.  I LOVE that each room had a vanity and welcome gift which was so thoughtful from the host. I am a clean freak and this place was CLEAN!!!! The kitchen was well stocked with what we needed for our stay and we have to give a shout out to the host for providing extra garbage bags and paper towels/tp  that not all Air BNB hosts stock. The deck was also awesome with comfy seating and the lovely propane fire table we enjoyed.  
My only note to future guests: The train noise is REAL and right out of My Cousin Vinny. The host is kind enough to provide earplugs in the welcome gift which were also appreciated, and it does not diminish the quality and beauty of the property but be aware the train is  loud and rolls through all day and night.  My husband laughed every time the train whistle blew he said WILD SCORED!! haha

Beautiful suite just a stones throw from great downtown bars and restaurants. We had a great time visiting for New Years celebration and birthday with friends. The rooms were lovely and comfortable. Only real downside is how loud the train is but we knew to expect that based on the description and it wasn't too bad. We look forward to visiting again when its warm to use the patio and other outdoor perks.

Wonderful location.  Comfortable beds.  Lacking a few kitchen items and paper products, so we had to go grab some.
The view is great.  We enjoyed spending time in the Club House as well.
Wish they would have mentioned the square footage, as it was quite a bit smaller than I had expected for a 3 bedroom.  The bedrooms were good size, however, the living space was small.
Megan’s place was really nice and clean, my kids love the pizzas from the fridge and the fireplace. I will definitely book it again when I come back !

We were so excited for this stay because of the great reviews we had seen. Unfortunately that wasn’t our experience. We knew the trains would be loud and didn’t mind that but there were active water leaks in the bedroom ceiling, the heat was stuck on in the bedroom in 80 degree weather, smoke alarms kept beeping in all units that we couldn’t fix from our unit, the walls are so thin you can hear someone cough in the other units (which was a huge issue when a Bach party was our neighbor into the middle of the night) and there were stains on the couch cushions that were VERY questionable. I tried to bring up my concerns and it was met with ZERO sympathy or resolution. I had to keep checking in and still nothing has been resolved 3 weeks later.. Decorations were very cute though and I wish we could have loved this place.
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Our host was responsive and diligent in answering our questions and taking care of problems that we encountered (eg. a noisy neighbor).

Megan's property is a great place to stay! Everything is clean and comfortable. The property is gorgeous and included all of the amenities that we needed during our stay.  Great communication from the host! We would definitely stay again:)
Nice place and convenient for restaurants
Nice place. Very close to downtown

Me and my family really enjoyed the stay here. Very peaceful and beautiful place to stay. A lot of places in walking distance from the home. Megan was very helpful and easy to reach, she made the stay wonderful.

overall, this place exceeded our expectations on every level. the host was extremely helpful and responsive. the condo was beautifully updated and had great amenities. there is plenty of room to hang out and enjoy the patio and deck. there is also a great outdoor deck and club house for even more room. this was awesome!

We had the best time - loved checking out the local places and using the game room.  Megan was always quick to respond to any questions and proactive.  We skied and visited Minneapolis and this location was perfect for our long weekend.  Thanks!!
Loved the locations, we were able to walk to the restaurant even on a chilly night. Wish it were nicer so we could have enjoyed the patio.
Comfortable stay and the game room was a lot of fun. Nice patio setup and right in down town, so plenty to keep you busy!
My wife and I, as well as our 3 kids loved the location, game room and the general laid back vibe at Megan's home!
A cute getaway in the heart of Prescott!! Very nice and clean place. The kids loved the game room. I will recommend this place forsure!!

We enjoyed Megan's space very much.  The location was wonderful; walkable distance to great restaurants and nightlife, a rooftop game room that includes many free video games,  ping pong and board games, and a wonderful private deck with heater. We loved the sinks in the bedrooms and the very comfortable beds.  We would absolutely stay in this beautifully decorated space when we make another trip to the Cities. Thank you Megan for the comfort your place provided us and your responsiveness to our questions!
Thanks for sharing your space with us and being so flexible with our check-in.
our 2nd time staying here, and it was just as great!

name: Luxury Apt w/ Hot Tub in DT!
description: Unwind in the cozy one-bedroom apt in the heart of downtown Minneapolis. Walking distance to restaurants, bars, and attractions. Adventure through Minneapolis and the region easily from this prime location. Once you are ready to relax, retreat to the comfy apt!

host.name: Bowen
host.about: Welcome to Coboda Rentals, offering premium short term rentals and corporate housing across the United States!

detailed_reviews.comments:
First, let's talk about the free coffee bar in lobby. Yikes. Latte, cappuccino, espresso, milk drinks (whatever they were) and, yes, coffee.
And then there's the apartment. Immaculate and beautiful. Always of great importance -- the bed was very comfortable.
An added bonus was the attached garage. It gets cold in Minneapolis.
The location is great and very walkable.
you can see the armory from the window! next time I go there for an event I will be staying at this airbnb!
I've stayed at a variety of Bowens locations and they're always great hosts. Everything is always clean and ready they were super accommodating and very responsive.
The place was nice, clean and quiet! Bowen was quick to respond for any questions and even made sure to reach out to ensure I way enjoying my stay!

Had a great stay here. Very comfortable apartment with everything I needed for my week stay. Very well located with plenty to do and see in the surrounding area. Parking was comfortable as well. Would recommend

Place was perfect! Clean and walking distance from restaurants. Parking on premises was a hit given the snow and cold weather during my stay. Check-in/out was simple and bed was comfortable. If you’re looking for a cozy, clean place with good amenities and walking distance to restaurants, this is your place! Host was proactive, friendly and very responsive. Would 100% recommend staying here.
Great stay!
Totally worth it !! Great location.

I had the pleasure of staying here after a business trip for a few relaxing days. It was very easy to check in and check out and the instructions were very clear. Very close to every where I wanted to go. I will be back in the future! Thank You

Great location, downtown. Walking distance to restaurants and bars. Very nice apartment. Private parking in the garage was very convenient. Comfortable bed and everything was clean and neat. Definitely worth the price.
Great stay with so many things to do in the area. Service was 100/5, very responsive, kind, and helpful!

Great location downtown Minneapolis! Our stay was smooth. The biggest inconveniences were outside of Bowen's control and the building staff responsible for handling these issues were congenial and did their best to minimize our inconvenience. The secure included parking is a big plus, just know that the key fob allows you to access parking AND quick access to the building. 
The kitchen is lightly outfitted, enough for minimal cooking. Not many utensils etc. for food prep, but would allow for some light baking or heating of dishes. 
Lots of walkable places nearby. Close to US Bank Stadium. Would absolutely stay here again!
Great place would love to stay again

If you’re looking for a mid city place, easy access to dining, entertainment and transportation this one bedroom is for you. A small deck for enjoying the city sounds, a lobby with free coffee and a covered parking garage. Bed is comfy, dressing room is large with clothes washer&dryer, full kitchen for cooking and privacy blinds gives full use of this space. Seating is limited and couch not comfortable so plan to bring your own lawn chair. Located on a busy street not far from hospital so you’ll hear plenty of ambulances and traffic. Building is safe and secure and we will stay here again.!

A pretty nice unit, although some of the finishings are a little odd: the stools at the kitchen island, for example, are too tall to actually sit and eat there. There’s also a light cover missing from the ceiling fan in the bedroom, which is a little jank.
The in-unit washer and dryer is nice, and having a responsive smart TV is always a plus. The hot tub is also a big plus, but it is a shared amenity, and so it sometimes hard to use it because others tend to hog it. The communal gym is also nice.
I think the best thing about this unit is the view of the city, and the connection to the skyway. It’s very easy to get to a lot of different restaurants and other destinations in Minneapolis from here, even when it’s cold out.

Apartment was immaculate and right near both US Bank Stadium and Target Center.
We walked to both for events.
Perfect location if you going to either one of these places.
Very clean, very modern apartment with cool balcony and rooftop amenities.
Better deal than nearby hotels. Great host!

Very well-appointed, centrally located apartment. It was exactly what I was looking for when booking. The host was very nice and responsive to my questions. Two notes that have nothing to do with the host: the building amenities like the gym and hot tub were open 9am-9pm, which is not convenient during the week, especially for the gym. The other thing is that the parking garage is tight, so make sure you have a compact car!

The complex was very conveniently located in heart of Minneapolis.  The included parking along with access to conference room space and top
Floor gym facility made this a perfect fit for me.   The unit itself also was new with in unit washer and dryer, also very convenient after coming into Mpls following a 10 day trip in Europe.
Clean and comfortable. would stay again.

nice enough place in a pretty good location. the apartment is large & has plenty of space. it is not well appointed; very few glasses/dishes/towels/etc. are included. there is a patio but nothing to sit on out there. the bed is pretty uncomfortable but overall ok and the couch is very uncomfortable and small. it's a typical bare bones Airbnb; it's fine but not particularly comfortable or well stocked. I did not use the laundry but when I went to leave and placed used towels in there, it smelled awful. 
main issue is that it's a poor value for the price and anything extra at all costs extra money. parking, even though an assigned spot is included with the apartment/accessible with the included key fob, is an extra $10/day. check out at 11am instead of 10am is $25 extra, etc. host responds quickly but be sure to read the messages because I did not receive a code for the door to the apartment in my initial welcome message. 
overall, it's fine, but a poor value for the cost.
Awesome place, would stay again

name: Lovely Studio Unit At Princeton Place
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located complex. This stylish place to stay is perfect for short or long term trips. It is fully furnished with baking and cooking essentials, bedding, and bathroom and shower essentials. Unlimited free parking. With easy access to highway 94 and 35w, it is a short drive away from all the dining, shopping, and entertainment Saint Paul has to offer!!

Please note that there may be noise transfer from the unit above.

host.name: Hamadeh
host.about: I would love ❤️ to host you. #MinnesotaNice

detailed_reviews.comments:
Such an amazing experience the whole way through! The host is so nice and easy to work with. A perfect stay for anyone or couple. The Airbnb was very clean, organized and I felt safe!
If I get another chance to book this place I will definitely do so!!
Amazing host, went above and beyond for us when he didn't even have to.

Overall it was a great place to stay at! The check-in process was fast. The host is very communicative and great. The room was very clean and all the living essentials were provided. The location is very close to St. Paul which is really nice. I really enjoyed my stay here, and I highly recommend booking this place!
However, just a heads up, it can get a bit loud sometimes from the other families living in the building, but you can turn on the AC to cover up the noise. There was also the occasional slight scent of cigarette smoke coming from somewhere.
As fotos enganam. Tem um vazamento no banheiro. O corredor de acesso ao apartmento é sujo.

Hamadeh was an excellent host, very friendly and even suggested a place to visit when I mentioned I was going hiking. The studio apartment is very nice and cozy, has a good AC in there to keep you cool in the warmer months. The bed was comfy even for someone like me who needs a good amount of squish. A note, is that the apartment does not currently come with a table for you to eat at. But it does come with a couple of chairs. 
Now for a bit of not so good things, at least from my point of view. The location of the apartment is on the shadier part of town. It felt like I was hanging out around Milwaukee if you're from Wisconsin. The neighborhood itself was kinda filthy with all the garbage floating around the apartment complex. For the few days I was there, there was no shortage of food garbage littered about. And the entry hall for the apartment is very narrow and always had a terrible smell. I want to say it was food, but thankfully that smell didn't get into the apartment.
Overall I enjoyed my stay and would definitely consider booking another visit using Hamadeh's property.
Convenient location with a fair price.  Comfortable and as advertised.  There is noise from neighbors but can be drowned out with fan or AC.

The overall stay was okay. Location/building is loud and rowdy. The AC unit is loud enough to coverup the hallway noise so sleep can be restless at times. The ventilation isn’t that great in the room/building so it left a strong smell after cooking or neighbors cook. 
The room was clean and had all the bare minimum that’s was needed. Parking was fine also.
Cozy and just what I needed for my quick trip. Neighbors were nice to help me when in need.
Nice , would stay again!
Great place! Very easy to get in and out of!
Great host
Nice, Quiet, & Clean! Hamadeh’s Response Time is Immaculate.

It was a wonderful weekend spent, Hamadeh is a great host and went out of his way to set up flowers as a surprise for the other guest that was coming. Always responded in timely matter and was very friendly. The place was very nice inside, modern and clean along with being very easy to get in and out of. It was well worth the 4 hour drive to get there and would consider staying at one of his airbnbs in the future. The only downside I can think of would be the location but everyone seemed nice and friendly. Overall 10/10 stay

Excellent place. This has to be the most min-maxed BnB on the market. My only critiques have to do with things outside the hosts control like the hallway smell (which didn't permeate the apartment) and noisy neighbors. Still a place I'd recommend to others visiting the area.

I had a nice stay! Hamadeh replied promptly and resolved my issues quickly. The only problem I have is that the apartment doesn't have an exhaust fan above the stove for cooking and the smoke alarm was very close to the stove so I did not cook as I wanted to. It was a nice experience overall.

I had an incredible stay at this Airbnb! Everything was amazing aside from a couple things! The sheets could have been a little cleaner and every time the bathroom fan was on it smelled moldy. However the building had a strange smell which was out of Hamadeh’s control! He was very responsive and a great host! Answered every question I had and was very friendly! Overall I would recommend this place and would definitely stay with the host again!
Love it here !!!
great space for couple days or an extended period.
Good, clean space, had everything I needed, and Hamadeh was very responsive to messages.
This place was literally what I need.  Would recommend to anyone that ask
Perfectly placed Airbnb. Very close to St Paul
Great communication, well maintained and clean.

I had the most amazing stay at this Airbnb! The space was beautifully decorated, clean, and had all the amenities I needed for a comfortable stay. The location was also perfect!
I would highly recommend this Airbnb to anyone looking for a comfortable and convenient stay in a great location. Thank you to the hosts for making my stay so wonderful!

We had a great time staying here, it was very close to everything we wanted to do. Hamadeh's was very responsive and the only hiccup we had with check he was able to solve within 10 minutes! Would book again
Overall great stay, only issue we faced was with bugs usually big spiders. Very scary. Besides that, great place within a good neighborhood!
Worth the money.

The north Saint Paul location isn’t ‘bad’ per-se, but it is known as one of the rougher areas in MSP. The unit itself is a (basement) apartment in a Project Housing (HUD) style development. I saw the great price and pictures and booked it for 30days.
Checking-In:
ROUGH shape buildings and trash around haphazardly between them. suspect looking people in the parking lot, and it smelled like drugs BAD.
Unit itself was fine, and looked like pics — if you want a cheap stay for a day or two. BUT, I can absolutely NOT recommend this on a monthly basis — the host let me cancel after I explained my disappointment and let him know about the horrid bleach-y chemical smell from both the building itself (basement unit) and the apartment interior bathroom/bedroom. 
Overall, I stayed for two hours and left with a migraine because of how heavy the cleaning fumes were they used. Hamadeh let me cancel, so he gets a star for being solid and understanding I wasn’t feeling safe enough to stay a month.
The host was very responsive, flexible, and accommodating! There were a few things we weren’t ok with but he made sure to get them fixed for us. Overall good stay!

Hamadeh was a great host! He was very responsive and helped us resolve a scheduling issue quickly and easily. The building was easy to access and the unit door had a safe and secure lock. The apartment was clean, very accommodating (extra paper towels, TP, garbage bags, etc) and also included any cooking implement or dish we could need. Bed was comfortable and TV had lots of channels and apps. Thanks so much for making our stay calm and pleasant!

Hamadeh was a great host! He was very responsive and helped us resolve a scheduling issue quickly and easily. The building was easy to access and the unit door had a safe and secure lock. The apartment was clean, very accommodating (extra paper towels, TP, garbage bags, etc) and also included any cooking implement or dish we could need. Bed was comfortable and TV had lots of channels and apps. Thanks so much for making our stay calm and pleasant!
Great space responsive host

The place is really nice inside and comfy. Is like I'm home. Hamadeh will response to yours question ASAP if you have any. Overall, love the place will come back to book the place again in the future.
Great place to stay very fast response time.
Place was very clean.
Great place that is centrally located!
Cute place perfect for just me and my boyfriend there was a lot of stores and stuff close by as well witch was nice would recommend :)

Hamadeh's place was cozy and comfortable. I was surprised to see there was no table (pictured in the description) as I had booked my location this trip based on a table for a project. While it took some time for Hamadeh to respond, we did work out a mutually agreeable fix. I would stay here again.
Nice
This is my second rental from Hamadeh and will definitely continue tonight book his rentals as it's always a 10 out of 10 no issues everything is perfect.
Highly recommend!!!
Host was super responsive.
Highly recommend best host on airbnb!!!
Highly recommend!
Highly recommend!
Definitely coming back!
Best host and nice and cozy place!
My favorite host!
It was a good place. The area wasn't so great, but the host was very helpful and responsive.
As always perfect!
Highly recommend best host!
The best host ever!
Highly recommend!

Simply the best j
Host!
Best ABNB host!

I’m a little nervous walking to and from the parking lot (especially at night) but having children running and playing around during the daytime makes me feel more comfortable. The odor from the entrance hallway literally gave me a headache. Other than that the studio itself is awesome and I love it. Overall, Hamadeh is a 5/5 super host.
The best
#1 place to stay!

I had to cancel the reservation at 4 in the morning and get out. 
A rat came across my bed and I was out immediately. 
There is a strong smell / unique perfume.
Host was very responsive
Great spot

Hamadeh was very accommodating and easy to communicate with. The area was a little rough but folks were friendly.  The unit was exactly as described and I appreciate that we were able to bring our pups.  We cut our stay short due to weather and Hamadeh graciously gave us a refund for the day. Thank you!

Microwave caught on fire when I tried to heat up my tacos. Dead flies were everywhere including mouse droppings. 
It was not as mentioned in the ad. Person was okay at communication but is trying to blame me for the microwave. Never will stay at a place like this. I am traumatized.
Good Job!!!
Had zero worries the entire visit
Wonderful stay. Easy to find and get to and from it. A couple blocks from a small park and walking trail that I took advantage of
I had an good stay at this Airbnb! The place was as described. The host was incredibly friendly and quick to respond to any questions. I recommend!!
Great place would stay again !
Was definitely worth it, would stay again
Great place to stay. would definitely recommend staying here. very updated, clean, nice.
Great host and a nice, accurate, quaint rental.  Felt right at home, made some friends with neighbors, and felt like the location was great for my needs.  Would recommend
Very easy check in clean space simple setup quiet parking is easy to find with no hassle
Good stay for the price.

Was good for the price 👍 Area surrounding the unit was pretty. Only complaint was the neighbor units smelling a bit potent. But that isn't the hoster's issue of course.
Would definitely recommend for budget traveling.

Es una excelente persona, responde los mensajes en cuestión de segundos, es muy atento y muy amigable. Por lo tanto el apartamento es 10 de 10 y realmente vale la pena adquirirlo por su precio. Estoy satisfecho al 100% 💯👍🏻
This was a nice clean place to stay for a few nights.
Very clean, the host is also very helpful!
We had a wonderful stay! Cozy, clean studio,  exactly as expected. The host was accommodating and responsive. Thank you!

This was a great spot to stay on a budget! This location is in an apartment complex - the community at the complex was friendly and family-oriented, which made me feel very safe as a solo female traveler. The unit is secure, and all appliances and living quarters were clean and in working order. I saw in past reviews that some people commented about flies, which are present in the hallway of the complex but are not in the actual unit itself, which is nothing that the host can do anything about, and didn’t affect my stay at all. Hamadeh was very helpful and great with communication whenever I needed anything. Next time I visit the area, I will be staying here again! Thank you Hamadeh for hosting!

We had a couple problems, but I feel the host addressed them very well, and was very responsive. The things that I found off-putting had nothing to do with the host, and are really out of his control, so I do not wish to lessen his rating. But I will include a comment here, as they could be important to others looking to make a decision about where to stay. There was a strong smell of marijuana in the apartment building that leaked into the room, and during our stay there was yelling in the hallways and outside our window. These are obviously things I wouldn't fault the host for, but they definitely made me feel uncomfortable.
Thank you To the host very responsive and friendly

name: Charming 2BR Near Lake Phalen
description:
Welcome to our newly remodeled 2-bedroom, 1-bath home, offering a cozy and inviting atmosphere. With a spacious living room and a fully equipped kitchen, you'll find everything you need for a comfortable stay. The home is designed to be the perfect retreat, whether you're here for a weekend getaway or an extended stay.

We take pride in maintaining a clean, well-kept space and kindly ask guests to treat it with the same care.

neighbourhood.overview: The Payne-Phalen neighborhood in Saint Paul, MN, is a vibrant and diverse community located near the serene Lake Phalen. This area is known for its family-friendly atmosphere, well-maintained parks, and beautiful green spaces. Lake Phalen itself is a focal point for outdoor activities, including walking, biking, fishing, and boating. The neighborhood is a mix of residential homes, with tree-lined streets and a variety of architectural styles. Payne-Phalen offers easy access to local amenities, such as schools, shops, and restaurants, as well as good public transportation options.

host.name: Thomas
host.about: I'm a thirty-something architect that enjoys experiencing cities as a local.

name: Convenient Home Near the Best Restaurants & Bars
description:
Perfect for families, business travelers or if you're in town for concerts or sports events. Lots nearby!

Relax at our centrally located Cathedral Hill home in Saint Paul's historic district. Minutes from the best food and entertainment that Selby and Grand Avenues have to offer. 

Our beautiful home is designed in the historic style of the neighborhood and fully equipped with all the amenities you will need. Guests will enjoy an oasis-like backyard garden to relax and have a meal or drink.

neighbourhood.overview:
We are located in Saint Paul's beautiful and historic Cathedral Hill neighborhood, on a quiet residential street.

Just 15 minutes from the airport and a short walk from great bars and restaurants such as Red Cow and Revival! Close to the co-op grocery Mississippi Market for longer stays, and a quick drive to the Minnesota History Museum and the Science Museum of Minnesota for families.

Nearby Food & Drinks:
- Revival Comfort Food (5 min walk)
- Red Cow Burgers & Bar (5 min walk)
- Nina's Cafe (5 min walk)
- Bon Vie Bistro & A Piece of Cake (5 min walk)
- The Blair Arcade (5 min walk)
- WA Frost & Co (High End Dining) (5 min walk)
- The Happy Gnome (7 min walk)
- F.Scott Fitzgerald's House (7 min walk)
- The Mississippi Market Grocery (10 min walk)
- Cathedral of Saint Paul (10 min walk)

host.name: Brian
host.about:
Hi there! I'm Brian, your AirBnb host. 

My favorite part of hosting is sharing an environment in which guests can relax and form cherished memories throughout their travels. Bon voyage!

detailed_reviews.comments:
Our experience was reminiscent of staying with a distant relative; the host was super responsive and I believe well-intentioned, but a bit unfamiliar and carefree with the property. 
The space is quite quaint, but definitely NOT child friendly/proofed at all, many hazards/breakables around.  The bathrooms were extremely clean, but I couldn't say the same about the rest of the house. 
One AC window unit in upstairs bedroom, one portable box fan, and one tiny bedside table fan; be aware during hot MN temperatures. 
Lastly, no coffee pot or working remote, which were big deal items to my mother, who said she would have rather been in a hotel.  I, on the other hand, loved the location (walking distance to a park and some great restaurants), and appreciated the ability to have some extra space for my daughter to move around (after childproofing and cooling the space).  Would have loved a guide of the quirks of the home and the area from the host, but we seemed to figure it out.

Brian’s place was a great homey stay. The space is good for a small family and more. It is not infant proof but that was not an issue and was not something that must be accommodated because it wasn’t listed as is!   As for Brian, he is a very responsive and friendly host and we appreciate that! The airbnb is located near so many things.
Great location and a responsive host.

We enjoyed our stay.  Brian was responsive, helpful, and checked in with us periodically throughout our stay. Neighborhood was friendly and safe (we spoke with a couple of the neighbors. The place was clean and decorated nicely. We would stay with him again.  Also, loved the back patio area and the mossy bricks!
This is a great location. Very close to attractions and restaurants. Peaceful neighborhood. It has everything you would need. Host was excellent very kind and responsive. Made everything easy.
So much space I would definitely recommend!
Exactly as described/pictured - great space, great location, and great price!
Good place to stay
Lovely home and dog friendly.  Great space near high-end restaurants.  Cute and private back yard.
Super convenient house for curlers in town for a bonspiel. Brian was an outstanding host - extremely helpful and responsive. We really appreciated the early check-in time he offered.
Brian did a great job of staying in touch and answering questions for my friends and I! Decent place and reasonably priced.
Great location, and very responsive host. Would stay with again!
Good over the weekend stay. Located in a beautiful neighborhood!

Nice old house that has been somewhat renovated.  Quiet neighborhood full of beautiful old houses.  Very walkable to many restaurants and the like.  Some random things need cleaning and/or repair, but nothing too serious.  Mattresses need to be replaced and have plastic covers.  We would probably look for something slightly nicer in the same area next time, but this would certainly do in a pinch.
Nice place. Good location. Unique and quirky.
Brian’s place was comfortable and clean. Wonderful neighborhood with cafes and restaurants close by. Lots of street parking and a quiet street.

name: Huge Game Room, Protected dock, Guest House, More!
description: There is no walk to the lake. This home is on the water.  Huge Game Room! There is a new dock on a protected channel. There is a boat launch right across on the channel. Make Marina Cottage part of your Mille Lacs Adventure! This home is located on a channel and has a  private dock to keep your boat away from large waves that can come up fast on this lake. We have a fully equipped kitchen, a game room across the street, Wifi, smart TVs, and a cute guest house.

neighbourhood.overview: This is a in a rural residential neighborhood. Groups are welcome, parties are not. We provide a 15 page Area attraction guide to help folks plan out their adventure. This includes many restaurants, where to rent a boat etc.

host.name: MN Real Estate And Management
host.about: We are a professional short-term management company. We handle every step of the process to ensure an amazing experience for each guest.

amenities: Coffee maker: drip coffee maker, Keurig coffee machine

detailed_reviews.comments:
The house is really layed out well.   Gas stove in living room is great.   Large tv in living room as well as bedroom upstairs
Little guest house is great!    Has tv, fridge
And baseboard heat that keeps it toasty warm.   
We enjoyed staying here and would come back in a minute      Thanks for having us!!!

Wonderful place to stay.  Nicely stocked kitchen and great internet.  The views of the water are gorgeous.  We would have liked to spend more time outdoors, but the Minnesota weather did not cooperate.  We would definitely stay there again.
This place was so nice and right on waterside love it . Great host too
Great communication.  Beautiful home.
This property was great! It worked great for my sibling trip!

Host was very responsive. Great location on the canal right off the lake. Easy access for us to put our boat in and take out. Cute house for my family of 5. Kayaks and games in the shed were an added bonus for my 10, 12 and 15 yr old.
Would recommend staying here!

We had a wonderful weekend here! It’s located on an alcove off of Millie Lac lake so it is peaceful and serene. We loved kayaking out to the lake and enjoyed fires outside every night while looking at the stars. Mike was so responsive and helpful. We had a few questions and he was beyond accommodating. Definitely recommend a visit here!!
Would definitely go back again

I stayed here during a visit with my family.  One of my favorite thing about the rental is it is located on a quiet road with lots of safe places to walk.  I also enjoyed kayaking the canal.  The house was clean, well laid out, and comfortable.  Thank you!
Host was great very communicative, great location beautifully area. Would definitely recommend
Everything was great, they jut need an upgrade on the port other then that everything was good
We love finding a cozy place to stay while working out of town! They made sure we were very well taken care of throughout the stay.

Very cool location in the backwaters of the big lake so it's always calm. The kids loved fishing off the docks, kayaking and playing darts in the rec room area. The host was very responsive and quickly addressed any of our questions. We'd love to come back!
My host Mike was amazing, super helpful and easy to reach. Such a beautiful airbnb, we saw river otters!
Great location with nice amenities. Lots of space to spread out including a game room, guest “bunkhouse” and main house. Dock was nice and provided easy access to Lake Mille Lacs.
Alright place to stay.

The noise/traffic from highway 169 made for a less desirable experience while looking for that lake/peaceful vibe.  The house was super clean and we appreciated everything about it.  It accommodated our needs very well.  This is an inlet off of Mille Lacs Lake so it's not lakeview.  The depth of the water is about 4 feet off of the dock so not swimming friendly.  The inlet is very close to Lake Mille Lacs so easy access for boating or fishing.  There is a great guest house for 2 additional sleep spaces with TV and little frig, not to mention a large garage across the street that is great as a game room with foosball and darts.  We enjoyed our kayak ride from the inlet to the lake.  Mike Fish offered wonderful customer service the entire time we communicated.  Thank you, Mike!
We had seven adults stay and we never felt crowded. It was clean . It’s located in a peaceful neighborhood and close to neighboring towns, if you are looking for things. Communication was very good
The house was clean and comfortable.  The pavers outside of the patio are uneven which could lead to a fall if you’re not careful.  Overall it was a pleasant getaway.
We had an amazing time at this place it felt like home. You get a beautiful view of the river and it’s nice and cozy.
Great place on the water with lots of room for guests.  The host was very responsive to our requests!

We received all the information we needed prior to arriving for our get away and when we arrived we couldn't have been more pleased with this cabin. It was extremely clean and had everything that was described. The cabin was very spacious and it felt like we were at home. This cabin had everything that we needed, and was immaculately clean when we arrived!!!
The game room was more than bargained for. The amount of games that were available was awesome. We haven't played some of these games (foosball, air hockey) in ages and we had so much fun. The kids especially enjoyed it, they had a blast.
Access to the lake was super easy and the firepit was an excellent place to relax and enjoy the sunset!!
We will definitely be coming back in the future.

name: Cozy 2 bed townhome with/Garage
description: Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay. Spacious and welcoming

detailed_reviews.comments: This place was a nice clean little place to stay. Very centrally located in Hudson.  Although a very basic townhouse with no frills at all it was a very quiet nice stay.  Two bedrooms with queen foam mattresses.  Also has a fold out couch.  Best part was that I had a late flight and the host was very gracious and let me stay over until the afternoon. Way better than waiting at the airport.   A great stay.
This place was very convenient to downtown Hudson and was a great price.
Very clean and as expected. Great location.

name: MINNeSTAY* Sable 803
description:
Minnestay PM:
Our preventative maintenance for sable typically include - checking and replacing batteries in all devices, replacing filters in all units, setting all times on clocks, checking internet and tv connections, ensuring all lightbulbs are working, snaking all drains, cleaning filters in the washer and dryer, resetting smoke and carbon monoxide detectors, and checking the fire extinguisher.

neighbourhood.overview:
Artists, merchants, restaurants and tech businesses have all gravitated here, finding the old warehouse spaces, ease of transportation and neighborhood energy uniquely suited to their needs. At Sable, you’ll discover the same. Join friends for craft beers. Shop the latest boutique styles. Jog the scenic Cedar Lake trail or catch a game at Target Field. In the North Loop, it’s easy to follow your instincts.

Local Retailers
Located in the most up and coming neighborhood in Minneapolis, the North Loop has some of the best boutiques, coffee shops, and restaurants within walking distance of Sable.

Below are a few of our favorites
Restaurants:
• Thr3 Jack
• Bar La Grassa
• Black Sheep Coal Fired Pizza
• Red Cow
• Spoon and Stable
• Nolo’s Kitchen and Bar
• Spyhouse Coffee
• The Freehouse
• Bunker’s Music Bar and Grill
• Inbound BrewCo
Shops & Boutiques
• Umei Boutique
• Hazel & Rose
• Statem

host.name: Minnestay
host.about:
Lance, has extensive experience in providing high-end customer service. Catering to the rich and famous as Captain of Mega Yachts for over 18 years, he brings the same level of service and expertise to the vacation rental market. 
 
Lance left his career in the yacht industry in order to be present for his two boys. Now, he spends his time in his home state of Minnesota, and he has redirected his expertise and focused all his energy on transferring his entrepreneurial and innovative skillset into Minnesota’s vacation rental industry.
 
At MINNESTAY we strive to offer the absolute finest rentals to anyone who’s looking to stay in Minnesota for vacation, short term, corporate travel, or any other reason. From city condos to cabins to RV’s, we want to be the place people go when they’re traveling to Minnesota, and we’re reaching that goal by providing the best rentals with amazing amenities, dedicated customer service, and a comfortable, customized experience for each and every guest.

amenities: Free parking garage on premises – 1 space

detailed_reviews.comments: Great place to stay

We really enjoyed our three day stay! The unit is small, but very well laid out. We particularly liked the high end appliances (great Bosch washer and dryer set). We are former residents of the North Loop and came, in part, to enjoy the many great restaurants. There are five of our favorites within a two block walk of the unit - amazing. We had a good experience and will certainly return.

Fantastic spot! Getting the key is a little convoluted (remember to save the SMS text they send you with the code to the key box!!!)
Everything else was super great! 👍
Extremely responsive and fun people in the Minnestay office, they helped me out several times.
Great space with free parking in a quiet and convenient area of downtown.
Grocery delivery service was awesome.  Everyone was very attentive.  Good times.
Clean and quiet.  Nice neighborhood.  Good communication with hosts - they answered my questions very promptly.  Thank you!
Epic stay and accommodations.

This was a GREAT apartment for an extended stay. The north loop is a great neighborhood for both people coming in for work or for personal. Great restaurants within walking distance, easy transportation options, and close to anywhere you would want to be in Minneapolis. I was provided with all comforts of home while I stayed in this apartment and I couldn't have been happier with my choice, will definitely stay again when I return. Thanks!

This modern studio condo was in a great location, within walking distance of Target Field and close to everything else in downtown that I wanted to do. The included parking lot was awesome, and I didn’t have any issues with other tenants or getting into the unit. I would definitely recommend looking at this unit!
Great location, and the access to private parking was perfect for us. Clean room, and the space provided everything we needed for our two night stay.

Our stay at the Sable was wonderful! The location was just as pictured. The room was immaculate and the free on-site parking was so wonderful especially for the location. The only hang up was using the keycafe to get our keys, but the staff onsite were so accommodating and helped us out! Overall a wonderful stay and if we plan to come back to Minneapolis, we'd definitely stay again!
Great little place! Neighborhood was nice, with many coffee shops and restaurants close by. The condo was clean and all instructions were clear. Would definitely stay here again!
This is a perfect location for any north loop activities. Will be coming here again!
Very convenient and clean.

Great space for a single or couple, just as described. Beautiful view of sunsets. Within a few minutes walking distance of coffee shops, bars and restaurants in the North Loop area. A 10 minute walk to Target Field and the blue and green light rail lines- very convenient for sporting events.

We enjoyed staying in this place. It was clean and the location was great. It was very accessible. It was nice to have on-site parking as well. We will recommend this place for friends and anyone else who wants to stay downtown Minneapolis.

2nd time renting here and mostly went off without a hitch. Some checkin issues as I didn't get my access code but if you download the Keycafe app straight to your phone you'll have smooth sailings. Will rent again.
Great location near everything in the north loop, very reasonably priced, overall great experience and would stay again!
Well appointed place with nice appliances and design.  Fun neighborhood.  Would come back.
Can I just move in? :)
Fantastic apartment with great access to Target Field and surrounding areas.
We enjoyed our stay!

I have stayed in dozens of Airbnbs all over the country , and will proclaim Minnestay as the BEST! From the location to amenities & customer service, Minnestay sets the bar to which all other properties are measured. I cannot wait to return and stay with them again.
Great place! Would stay here again!

We loved staying in Sable 803. We stayed for 10 days and never ran out of restaurants we wanted to try. It is a very quiet building as well as the area of town in general. Our stay was in February. The reserved parking space in the attached ramp was great on cold and snowy days. Getting to the unit was close and convenient from the parking spot. The queen size bed was so comfortable that we are considering buying one just like it. We did not need to communicate with the owners because everything was as expected. If we did need help, there were many point of access for communication. Emails, text and a refrigerator magnet with all essential numbers.
Great location. Clean and quiet. Enjoyed our stay
Great location
10’s, 10’s, 10’s across the board!!
I’d definitely stay here again

Parking fob did not work. Plus, there was a homeless man sleeping in the entrance prior to using fob to enter the buildings lobby.  He was there from when came back at night to when I left the following morning.
Nice place. Good location. Would stay here again.

We loved staying with Minnestay. Check in instructions were very clear, parking was easy, and the condo was as described. A couple things weren't perfect, such as the loud construction starting at 0730 weekday mornings, which is out of Minnestay's control, and the ear plugs were a nice touch! The shower was not satisfying, as the water pressure was low and the water didn't get hot enough for my liking... I'm picky about showers, though! The ice maker in the freezer did not work, only made like 4 ice cubes per day. These are, of course, minor complaints, and we really did enjoy our stay! There building was quiet, we didn't hear any neighbors at all, and the parking pass was such a nice perk! We would definitely use Minnestay in the future!
Very professionally managed. Carspace included which is very useful in this area.
Enjoyed my stay for the Big 10 tournament weekend. Lots around in the North Loop area.
Great location. Great communication. Excellent value when compared to some of the higher end hotels in the area. Will definitely be back!
Amazing place! A lot of walkable options for dining and more!! definitely will go back!

Place was cute & cozy. Very quiet! It was great overall, my only complaint is for $200+ a night - at least give us 2 ply TP!
Overall great quiet stay! Would stay again.
Nice accommodations in a great neighborhood.  Highly recommend

Staying at The Sable was perfect—great neighborhood, safe, walkable, and a great view of downtown. Unit was spotless and quiet. Bed was comfy. Appreciated being able to park in the ramp. I’d definitely stay again!

The stay was great, it is a good location,  many nearby attractions. The place was super clean and well equipped. I had some issues going in and out of the parking garage, the card  provided to access and exit the garage has to be re-set  and re-activated twice.
Had a great time. The place was clean, the bed was very comfortable, and loved the ability to walk to many restaurants and other activities.
Great place to stay in the Minneapolis north loop. Great amenities, private yet close to a lot of great restaurants and outdoor activities.
Had a great stay at Sable. Rented two units and both were clean, well stocked with linens and towels, nice kitchen, clean and super location in North Loop. Would definitely stay here again.
Great North Loop location, and really nice to have a reserved parking spot in the ramp!
Great location! Rooftop deck was wonderful! I loved the high ceilings & aesthetics of the building.
Great location. Very clean. The parking spot was a very nice plus.
Great spot. Would stay again.
Everything was just like the photos! Great location, really enjoyed the parking spot as well! I will be booking again very soon!
Loved this spot! Great coffee shop right down stairs and in a very walkable area. Would stay again!

The apartment was fine, clean, well appointed, and comfortable - a small one-bedroom (with a pull-out couch for a second bed) in a recently-completed building. Not someone's home but a short-stay rental. Entry was complicated and we had difficulty with the auto-lock post-9pm front door codes. The location was excellent, as was the overall value of the stay.
Loved the walkability of the area! Lots of restaurants to choose from. Perfect location for seeing a Twins game at Target Field.
Will definitely book again next time I’m in Minneapolis
Great!

This is a great place to stay.
right by Target Field.
Great location that is close to fun restaurants and bars, but it is on a much quieter street.  Very clean, very easy to check in and out, and the host was extremely quick to respond.
Great Airbnb. Awesome location with plenty around, responsive host, very clean and quiet and looked like the pictures. Would definitely recommend and/or stay again!

Thought we would quickly leave our stuff in the unit & then run out to meet our waiting group. The key fob did not open the door. The concierge unable to change the battery. The owner had to come to change the battery. They wouldn’t put us into another unit thereby eliminating this wait. Waited over an hour to get in. Frustrating. 
 
Other frustrations:
- Only one set of keys.
- Multiple entry codes. 
- Overwhelming scent of cleaning solution.
- Key fob never worked great.
Enjoyed the place and absolutely love how close the place is to the event centers and to local businesses!
Had some trouble getting inside and had to call the number to get a new key. Additionally, half the lights and outlets didn’t work when we got inside. Other than that, great stay and great location!

I believe that my Minnestay experience was my best and most professional AirBnB experience. The communication leading to check in was excellent. The communication during my stay was great as well. The unit I stayed I'm was spotless and looked just like the pictures. It was very clean and inviting. I really enjoyed my stay and would definitely stay in a Minnestay property again.

We greatly enjoyed our stay! The location was great with lots of things to do at a walkable distance. The building was clean and secure, and the host allowed us to check in a little earlier which was great. We will definitely stay here again when we come back to Minneapolis.

Everything was honestly great. I loved the apartment, the view, and everything was clean. My only inconvenience was when I was watching TV my first night, the power for the TV and kitchen lights went out randomly. They never turned back on. 
I communicated this to the host and I didn’t mind not being able to watch TV this because I knew I was  going to be out and about most of the day anyways. That’s the only reason I’m rating it a 4, since it was an amenity that I basically didn’t have access too. If I ever find myself back in Minne I  would definitely stay here again!
Nice place!

I had a very nice stay here. The area is beautiful with a lot of young people at local restaurants and bars. 
The apartment was the perfect size for myself. Kitchen was sufficient to prepare dinners and breakfast. 
Would stay again in the future.
Another great stay with Minnestay!

name: Uptown Gem - Lakes, Trails & Local Hotspots!
description: Make yourself at home in this beautiful mid-century home located in Uptown making it easy to get around this walkable, vibrant neighborhood.  You'll be 2 blocks from great restaurants, coffee shops, shopping, play grounds and a locally owned market.  City of Lakes urban bike/walking trails have been voted the BEST city park system in America and are out your front door.  Find yourself in the heart of one of the most beautiful urban cities in the world!

neighbourhood.overview:
This is a unique walkable urban neighborhood close to dozens of great restaurants, coffee shops, bars, and markets. The airport is about a 15-20 minute drive and to the center of downtown Minneapolis is even closer. The US Bank Stadium, home to the Minnesota Vikings is a 10-minute drive, same for the Twins Stadium and TCF Stadium home of the University of Minnesota Gopher football team.  Downtown St. Paul is 15 minutes away by Uber.

Public transportation is 2 blocks away and it's only a 10-minute ride to downtown sports venues and numerous entertainment and eating options.
