They were great hosts to chat with, and offered excellent suggestions about activities in the neighborhood. Also, the bathroom is very cool and unique!
Beautiful home, lovely hosts. We had a great time!

Hannah and Richard made us feel very welcome. They were very nice and hospitable and their home is beautiful! It was much better than staying at a hotel. We got an Uber to the Xcel Energy Center for only $7. Great location, home and hosts! I definitely recommend staying here.

Hannah and Richard were so welcoming! They greeted us as soon as we arrived and gave us a tour of their lovely house. The house and interior is so cute and exactly what it looked like in the pictures!! They had a small fridge with some stocked water, cereal, milk and towels laid out in the room for showering. We had a very short stay but would highly recommend them for anyone looking for a nice and relaxing place to stay!
Hannah and Richard's home was perfectly charming and I only wish we could have stayed longer.

Most comfortable bed at an airbnb,
Richard and Hannah’s warm welcome
And great navigation of landmarks to see.
Homemade muffins to greet us…yum!

Sharing a bathroom was not too awkward,
Easy access to the freeway, 
Outside sounds of a morning song bird
A relaxed place to stay.

Remodeled 1910 charm 
Blend of classic-old and Ikea-new
Neighborhood safe and free from harm
Small frig for leftovers too

Lovely original creaky hardwood floors
Simple chic, books, games, calligraphy notes,
Clean, shiny tile, plush towels, and old wood doors
World-traveled gracious hosts.
Richard and Hannah are very hospitable.  Convenient location.  Nice upstairs room.  Great stay!

We loved staying at Hannah and Richards! It was an awesome location and we ended up coming in the living room that night and chatting with Hannah which was fun. Oh and the main bed was amazing! We slept great!

Hannah and Richard were very welcoming. Their home is beautiful and in a great location. They were knowledgeable about the area, able to recommend restaurants, parks, and activities. We weren't sure how we would like sharing some spaces, but they were so kind and respectful that we didn't mind. It was nice to have access to a full kitchen. We enjoyed chatting with them both.

Hanna and Richard were really wonderful hosts. They are both warm, interesting people that made our stay that much better. Their home is centrally located, clean and comfortable. They have great taste in decorating making being at the house a pleasure. The whole experience was really nice and we would definitely recommend this special Airbnb to others. Thank you Hanna and Richard for such a nice stay. We had a great time :-)

Hannah and Richard have thought of everything to give their guests a pleasant stay. The room and house are beautifully decorated with many amenities - comfortable bed, tea and an electronic kettle, ample outlets for plugging in electronics. The hosts were great communicators - helpful and friendly. They gave me a plethora of restaurant recommendations (thank you, again!) and were happy to chat, but understanding when I retreated to my room. I would definitely stay again!

Wonderful, welcoming couple! Made me the best cup of cold brew a gal visiting St. Paul could dream of. Lovely hosts. 

Everywhere you look in the house you can spot a little detail that reveals Hannah and Richard's creativity and care in creating a pleasant air bnb experience -- from the ribbon tied towels to the hand written calligraphy info card, to the tea station in the room. 

When I booked the room, air bnb said I was lucky because it's usually booked. I can see why!! 

Keep it up guys, you are doing an awesome job!!

Hannah and Richard were very welcoming and provided a nice private room. Even though, it was a room in a house with other people I had plenty of privacy and was even able to get a little bit of work done. Nice location 10 minute walk to the metro station. I would stay here again in a minute!

Richard and Hannah are very warm, accommodating, and inviting. Their home is cozy, yet spacious, and sweet. I felt like I was visiting long-time friends, rather than staying in a stranger's house.

Their home is in close proximity to a variety of great restaurants and places to visit. I had no trouble walking, taking the metro train, or catching a lyft anywhere I needed to go. 

This lovely couple turned what is normally a boring business trip into a wonderful memory. After staying with them for two days, I dragged my feet about having to leave, even though I was departing to visit a city I love! I would absolutely stay with them again the next time I visit St. Paul!

Hannah and Richard were excellent hosts! We immediately felt at home in  St. Paul. We really enjoyed the proximity to downtown, and local food and beer spots. Beds were very comfortable and rooms very spacious with all the little details you need. (mirrors, outlets, travel size toiletries, comic books in the bathroom!). Would highly recommend, and stay again if we find ourselves in St. Paul again!

The home was perfectly homely - a lovely, comfortable USA/St. Paul home! Exactly what I was hoping for my stay in St Paul. Close to town and and everything I needed. Hannah and Richard were the perfect hosts. Flawless holiday experience!

Hannah and Richard are a kind and hospitable couple. You can tell that they enjoy hosting guests. We really enjoyed the nice conversations with them. Their house is gorgeous, clean and tasteful decorated. Eventhough we only stayed for two short days, we felt welcomed and like home because of the relaxed atmosphere.

I had great time staying with Hannah and Richard, their place is lovely as seen in pictures and very close to st. Paul downdown. They are also very helpful and make you feel welcomed.ill definitely stay with them again next time in town.

We stayed at Hannah and Richards for only one night, but they were lovely hosts and the room was perfect! Big comfy bed and they were really helpful with recommendations. Didn't get to see too much but it seemed like a good location. It was a great experience and I'd stay with them again if I'm ever in St. Paul.

This was my first time using Airbnb and I lucked out with a couple who were sweet as could be and had a great, old-world charming little home that was very much Chicago-like (my home city). The couple communicated with me before my booking to help me learn the system and answer a couple of questions I had. I had quite a full agenda for my first visit to the Twin Cities, so I wasn't able to enjoy all the nice amenities they had, but they have definitely set it up to make it feel like "home away from home". Comfy bed, too! As I said, I lucked out and I'm so grateful!
We had such a short stay.  Richard was very welcoming--we didn't cross paths with Hannah.  Their space is cozy and comfortable.
The experience was first class. Hannah and Richard were hospitable and thoughtful. Highly recommended.

I had a very pleasant stay at Hannah and Richard's house. The place is Cozy and comfortable. The couple is very nice, always let you feel you are at home, relax and warm. I like their kitchen and made big meals which is truly unforgettable ! Jane

Hannah and Richard's house was beautiful and inviting. The room I stayed in had many tasteful antiques and a nice selection of books. I could immediately tell how much thought they put into making the space feel cozy and comfortable. As far as amenities--Hannah and Richard thought of everything (right down to the power strip by the bed to charge my many devices!) I never had a chance to enjoy the breakfast they left for me, but I did take the fantastic cold press they made at home to-go, and, boy, was it yummy. I would definitely stay again.
Hannah and Richard are awesome. Great place and great location!

Absolutely loved our stay with Richard and Hannah in their cozy home! They made my father and I feel right at home. I was in for the weekend, running the Twin Cities Marathon and they were nothing short of spectacular. Richard greeted us before our check-in time and showed us the ins and outs of the house. Answered all of our questions and even made their mini fridge available for our use! They were a very humble and down to earth couple. Really enjoyed hanging out with them in the evening. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a quite and cozy place while in the St. Paul area!
hannah and Richard are really welcoming and friendly couple, Valerie and Philippe recommend this cozy room, more the house is located in a quiet neighborhood and home decorated with taste

Hannah & Richard are very welcoming and makes sure everything is ready before you get there. The house is beautiful and close to where I work. Highly recommend to anyone who have a visit to Saint Paul.
Hannah and Richard were super friendly and made my boyfriend and I feel at home. The house is an adorable home close to everything we needed in the twin cities. Would love to stay with them again! :)

Richard & Hannah were wonderful hosts. We arrived earlier than expected, but they were very accommodating. Communication was excellent. Their house was lovely, very cozy, clean and the beds were super comfortable. It was a quiet neighborhood in a great location, so close to downtown St. Paul. We look forward to going back for another visit!

We loved our stay at Richard and Hannah's place.  Close to the light line station and capital building.  The room was cozy and inviting.  The charm of an historic home with modern amenities.  Richard made a great breakfast and was a very pleasant host.

If you are in the twin Cities don't hesitate to book this listing.  I promise you will not be disappointed.  Hannah and Richard are two of the most genuine and interesting people you will ever meet and their home is absolutely lovely.   The location is great and the accommodations are very relaxing.  Take advantage of this opportunity to stay in a fabulous home with a dynamite couple.  If you are really lucky you might even get to meet Hannah's mom.  She's a true gem!
Lovely couple and a sweet house. Attention to detail in the guest room with many niceties.

My sisters and I had a wonderful stay at Hannah and Richard's place for our weekend get-away!  Hannah and Richard ended up being out of town so we had the house to ourselves.  Our bedroom was beautiful, the house was gorgeous, and they even had tea and coffee for us! 10 out of 10 would go again!
CHARMING Pleasant a good place to stay :-)

Richard and Hanna are the best! That is the first thing to mention when writing a review about this stay! They are very open, social and welcoming people who make you feel right at home!
Even though my stay was only one night it was probably the most comfortable of my whole trip. Not just because of all the available comforts, also because of the feeling you get while staying in their home!!
Great people, great home, just perfect!
Hannah & Richard are great host and I enjoyed my stay over there. I would recommend for any one to stay there...
Great hosts and a great space! If you're looking for delicious pizza delivery, call Zamboni's.
Thanks for the great accommodation. Beautiful home and super nice hosts.
Excellent location near Regions Medical Center. Old home charm. Nice place!
Very friendly hosts who showed me a different route that was less icy! Thanks guys. House is very charming and cute
Absolutely beautiful place with all the necessities. Great hosts cannot speak highly enough. The best experience I have had so far. If its open, you should book.

I had a fabulous stay with Hannah and Richard. Everything was as described, and better! Their home is beautiful and welcoming. The bed could not have been more comfortable - it was a welcome respite after a long day at work. Hannah and Richard are easy to work with and communication was easy. I highly recommend staying with them.
If this place is available take it. It was a great experience and Richard and Hannah are great hosts. Great location and super easy to find.
Absolutely, they were great!
I enjoyed stay over there and it was my second time. I recommend any one to stay over there.
I enjoyed 3rd time stay over there.

Hannah & Richard's home was lovely, and the room was very comfortable. I was able to walk to the Historical Society and get back down to the Union depot easily.  Everything was really nice, and Richard and Hannah were very flexible and wonderful hosts!

My mother and I stayed here, using both of the rooms available. I slept on the pull-out couch (which was extremely comfortable). Hannah and Richard were great hosts and I recommend staying with them wholeheartedly.
Hannah and Richard's home was beautiful and clean. They are great hosts (and decorators!). They were super accommodating and friendly. I would definitely recommend staying with them.
Great location, and value. Highly recommend for ease of access, great host and the home is historic and beautiful.
Richard and Hannah are delightful hosts. They have created a comfy and welcoming get away.
Very friendly and this was my 4th time stay over there

Hannah and Richard have a lovely home and they are wonderful hosts. I was definitely provided with a warm and comforting atmosphere. 
They made me feel welcome in their space and the common areas were open and available for use.
Their thoughtful gestures as hosts in leaving nibbles of food for me as a weary traveler were much appreciated. 
They were charming and a joy to stay with and I would definitely recommend them for the future.

Something happened during my stay at Hannah and Richard’s that never happened before.   I slept comfortably and soundly through the beeping of my alarm clock!  
Besides an ample-sized bed tastefully made of fresh and clean bedding – topped up with a handful of “just the right size” pillows, my room was furnished with an inviting upholstered chair, a nearby reading lamp, desk, a decent-sized dresser, and a supply of books neatly displayed on a wood-frame bookshelf.  Inside the closet I found a small collection of terry robes and a few pairs of house slippers (Asian-style hospitality), plus a good supply of empty hangers.        
When I arrived, Richard carried my suitcase into the house before giving me a quick tour of the place and basic house instructions.  
Both Hannah and Richard were very friendly and hospitable, and their house was very clean, orderly, and inviting.  Located just blocks from the Minnesota State Capitol and within walking distance of downtown St. Paul, you won’t find a more pleasant and affordable place to stay than here.
Beautiful home. Friendly hosts. Easy to coordinate. Would stay with them again!
Hannah and Richard are great hosts.  Enjoyed getting to know them.   It was very relaxing to come to their home after a long day at work.   Hoping to return if they have an opening.
Very nice place to stay, close to state capitol, wonderful hosts and a well maintained home.
Very nice place. Richard and Hannah are really great hosts.  The house is very comfortable and clean.  Walk distance form the Capitol building
Great hosts. Didn't see much of them for my stay. But they were very welcoming and lovely when I did see them.
Richard and Hannah's home is very beautiful and homely. My family and I had a pleasant stay, and the beds were very comfortable!

Hannah and her husband Richard are friendly, kind and accommodating. Hannah is the kind of person that instantly makes you feel as though you've been friends for years. Their place is clean and lovely, and felt like home immediately. I came for business and walked into downtown every day for a conference (about 30 min.). They're blocks away from the capitol building which is lovely at night. I would highly recommend staying here again.
I enjoyed my stay over there and they are nice
Absolutely lovely home and hosts!

Great place; great hosts. Well-equipped, super comfy spaces. Rich and Hannah made sure I was comfortable and had information I needed. They were warm and personable and great fun to talk to. Highly recommended.
Hannah and Richard made us feel very welcomed and provided very comfortable accommodations and privacy.  It's a lovely older home they make available to share.

Hannah and Richard have a wonderful and warm home with beautiful mid-century pieces throughout. The room and bed were comfortable and had an AC for the warm weather experienced during my stay. Couldn't have asked for a more convenient location to my training and great eats!
Came to Saint Paul for a bike race. Hannah and Richard were incredibly nice and welcoming. Their home is situated in a nice and pretty quite neighborhood.  My only wish is that I stayed there longer.

What a gem!  Hannah and Richard have a lovely historic home just blocks from downtown St. Paul and the Capitol.  They were very accommodating and communicative before check in.  I found my way to their home via the Metro Transit stop (public transportation here is amazing!), and would have walked around everywhere I needed to go except that I was wearing heels for the majority of my stay, so I just ubered.  The home itself is very quaint and still has a good portion of the original floors and exposed wood trim.  The room is quite large and has one of the most comfortable beds!  I had to ask what mattress they use.  I had ample space to sprawl out all my things and they have closet space as well for anything that you may need to hang.  Though their description mentioned that the street noise can become lively at certain hours, I didn't experience much noise at all.  In fact, due to the season, they kept many of the windows open and it was a nice change to hear the outside and get some fresh air.  The bathroom was also very spacious and clean, and included a claw foot tub!  Though most of my weekend activities and meals were planned for me, I can recommend eating at Keys Cafe (walking distance) or Nina's Cafe (short drive, but worth it, and also recommended by Hannah).  I would absolutely recommend staying at Richard and Hannah's home if you're in the area; I know I'll be back if my travels bring me back to St. Paul!  They are wonderful hosts!

Hannah and Richard were awesome hosts, and their house is amazing! We spent the weekend in St Paul and were located a short (and cheap) Uber ride away from all of the bars and restaurants we visited. From the minute we booked our trip, they made everything so easy for us. Thanks again! :)
Excellent experience.  I'd stay there again.

I had a great time staying with Hannah and Richard! They were really nice and always willing to offer help and advice with anything. The room is pretty comfortable for the most part. It could get hot at night (this was in July), but the window A/C and ceiling fans helped immensely, although the A/C was a bit noisy. The house is also within walking distance of the light rail station, the Capitol building, and numerous great places to eat. Would definitely recommend.
Lovely hosts, helped us find a nice place to stay for a last minute trip. Understanding and kind. We would recommend them to others!

Staying at Hannah & Richard's place was wonderful!  It is a lovely home, with intentional and thoughtful amenities.  Hannah & Richard were kind, and helpful-be sure to take their recommendations for restaurants & sightseeing!  Everything they suggested was a hit with everyone!
Great hosts and lovely place. Would highly recommend for anyone traveling in the area!

By far our best Airbnb experience to date. Not because of the comfy beds, thoughtful provisions and great location, but because Hannah and Richard are excellent people and hosts. 
We also loved the Twin Cities!

Hannah & Richard's home is comfortable and welcoming. We didn't spend much time there because we were visiting our daughter who lives in St. Paul and exploring the Twin Cities, but the bed was super comfy and the house's location is terrific.  Only thing to note to other guests is that the stairway is narrow and it might be hard to get a huge suitcase up to the 2nd floor bedroom. This was not a problem for us but if you have a huge bag, this might be an issue. Richard offered to take our bags up for us but we were traveling light so we didn't need his kind offer of help.  Great place, friendly and welcoming hosts, nice location close to downtown St. Paul.

Hannah and Richard showed great hospitality and were a delight to get to know. They were very helpful in finding places to eat and other things to do. They provided a stocked mini fridge for some staples which was lovely. Really enjoyed getting to know them and their space is beautiful and comfortable.

Hannah and Richard were very easy to communicate with and have a beautiful home. They made is feel like family! The home is located right downtown Saint Paul. It is within walking distance of beautiful parks, the capital, restaurants, the hospital and Saint Paul's Cathedral. Amazing!!
Hannah and Richard are great hosts, and their home is comfortable with a great location. Easy to get to from anywhere in the cites -- just head for the Capitol.
Warm welcome and happy nature of both Hannah and Richard.

Hannah and Richard were so kind and accommodating for us. They were flexible with the strange schedule we had due to supporting my brother as he recovered from surgery at a nearby hospital. Their house is so beautiful and unique with really modern decor. We highly recommend them.

Hannah and Richard were very welcoming into their home and made sure we had everything to be comfortable. Their location is perfect walking distance to downtown, which is a huge plus when events are going on and parking prices are spiked up to $20. Definitely will stay here again if we are back in the Saint Paul area.

Hannah & Richard are great hosts! Their quiet home is a quick walk from a bus stop that will take you into the bustle of downtown. If the bus isn't your style, it's not a bad walk - and you can go by the beautiful MN Capitol grounds along the way. The private space is very nicely appointed, and the sitting room downstairs is perfect for unwinding with a book after a busy day at work. Didn't bring a book? The shelves are stocked with a fantastic selection!
Very nice hosts. Clean and neat. Pleasant home, close to downtown area.
We had an awesome stay at Hannah’s and Richard’s. They were the most welcoming and nice hosts. We definitly recommend their place !
Terrific hosts and accommodations. Would gladly stay again.

Hannah and Richard are an amazing couple! I had a great time at their house!
They are excellent hosts. The house is very nice, the room is perfect, and all the services are excellent. I had a great time with them. They are lovely people! I would definitely go back to their house on my next trip to St. Paul.
Hannah & Richard are very nice people, they are very considerate and helpful. There home is sweet and lovely. The room is clean and quiet. I enjoy the days staying with them, nice place and hosts.
Absolutely best hosts, great room with all the amenities you expect and central location. I recommend highly.
Very warmly family，full of love and full of fun.Very close to the regions Hospital and market , Green line.
St. Paul, a pedestrian friendly city,  has a superb mass transit system. Best of all, Hannah & Richard’s place is in a good location to utilize one's legs & light rail!

Decent location. Charming home. Very welcoming hosts, greeted warmly upon arrival. Very quiet and peaceful stay. Can never go wrong with free breakfast! Very clean despite a toddler! Wow! Highly recommend especially if the area is of convenience for you.

Hannah & Richard truly go out of their way to make a comfortable and welcoming stay. Everything was clean and fresh. What's more are the small things, like having our own personal mini-fridge which was already stocked with eggs, milk, bottled water, and canned sparkling water. Way to go the extra mile! It's a genuine home housing a lovely family. You'll love this stay!
Hannah and Richard's place is well located, close to bus and train stops, they are super friendly and make you feel at home

We had such a wonderful experience staying with Hannah and Richard. They are so hospitable and welcoming, and their home is in a great location. They were fast to communicate with us and they offered us great breakfast options in the mornings - as well as local tips for things to do around St. Paul! The bed was very comfy and the house is super clean.  It’s a gorgeous historic home, but with great modern updates. We would definitely recommend this place and would absolutely come stay here again. Thanks for a memorable stay, Hannah and Richard!

Hannah and Richard were very open, friendly, gracious and accommodating. They were highly responsive to me when I sent updates on my arrival time. I felt very welcomed and comfortable staying in their home. They provided as much or as little interaction you wish to have during your stay with them.
A warm and friendly household from a very caring couple. I would highly recommend Hannah and Richard to anyone planning a trip to the Twin Cities.
A great place to stay, a few blocks from downtown St. Paul. Beautiful old house with tons of history and charm.

Hannah and Richard have a beautiful home in a lovely neighborhood. It was an easy walk to downtown, which I appreciated.  They were responsive and accommodating. I also appreciated the nice touch of a bathrobe to use while away!  Would definitely stay again!

You can expect a great place, in a great location, an included breakfast, and a charming young Mom and Dad with a toddler who will also charm you. Everything was as presented in their airbnb information.

Wow, this house is gorgeous! Hannah and Richard are kind and generous hosts and did I mention how beautiful their home is? The room was large and comfortable, the kitchen was pleasant and I had my own mini fridge containing treats. Pleasant neighborhood just a few blocks from a Green Line stop so it was easy to get around. The weather was a little colder than I had clothes for, and Hannah was kind enough to lend me a scarf. Only caveat is the steep stairs to the second floor, so anyone with mobility issues should beware. I would stay here again. Heck, I'd move in if I could! This was a really nice stay.
Lovely hosts and amazing place. Very comfortable and accommodating. This location is great if you want to explore some of downtown St. Paul!

I felt right at home at Hannah and Richard's place. My room was spacious, private, and a great place to relax and work. The bed is very comfortable and warm, even in cold weather. The common spaces (kitchen and living room) are very well appointed, and guests get their own fridge space.  While their place is excellent, Hannah and Richard are the real draw here. I have rarely meet such warm, genuine, and welcoming people. It was a pleasure to get to meet their family and share in their hospitality.

Even by Minnesota standards, Hannah and Richard are incredibly warm and welcoming. They are down-to-earth and easy to communicate with. In their home, they have left no stone un-turned, every amenity has been made one notch more convenient. I will not hesitate to find their listing again the next time I need a place to stay near downtown St. Paul.
Recommend to all

This Peace is amazing,  it's at perfect location just near to Downtown Saint Paul. They helped me in each and every small stuff  when I was landed as blank in saint Paul. Richard & Hannah are very nice and helping people .. !!! 
without a doubt you can plan your accommodation here.... :)
Hi All,  You can expect a homely stay with clean and neat rooms near the metro station close to St. Paul Downtown

Hannah & Richard's place is ideally located : downtown St-Paul and 5 min away by foot to the light rail station. From this station and at best, Minneapolis is approximatively a 30 min-train ride and the airport a 45 min-train ride.
All the amenities listed were found as expected. Hannah and Richard were very considerate as the weather became snowy, they kindly lent me some winter footwear. They were very helpful in giving me information about places to visit around St-Paul & Minneapolis.
I will definitely come back if I ever have the opportunity to!

Perfectly located, beautifully decorated, and such a soft bed! I was able to walk most of where I needed to go downtown. Suuuch a good sleep that night. The room is spacious and has many generous touches, with shampoo, extra quilts, and bathrobes and slippers in the closet. I’d stay again!

Hannah and Richard offer a very comfortable room and access to their kitchen with all the breakfast supplies one could ever need.   The bed is very comfortable and the location was excellent for me as I could easily walk to the hospital where a family member was being treated.  I definitely recommend their place for a restful room with many amenities.

Hannah and Richard were my first hosts on Airbnb so I didn’t know what to expect. But from the moment I arrived they were very welcoming and I felt right at home. They gave me good tips for breweries around town. The place was clean and very home warming. Great price. I would def. recommend for anyone looking to stay near the St.Paul Area.

This is a wonderful home and family.  I loved my stay.  Hannah and Richard treat their guest wonderful.  They calmed me down after a stressful day and even took me for a treat.  I can't wait to go back!
Hannah and Richard are rockstars! They have a very lovely house in a great location and they really enjoy making connections with their guests!
This place was fantastic. Richard and Hannah are friendly and respectful. Very peaceful environment. Would definitely recommend this place. Thank you Hannah and Richard!
Son una familia increíble y cariñosa. Siempre están atentos a tus necesidades y tus inquietudes. Son espectaculares.

This was my first time using Airbnb so I wasn't sure what to expect, but I'm not sure it could have been better.  Hosts we're great with flexibility around check in.  Fresh bread and great coffee in the morning.  Very nice home and room.  Wouldn't hesitate to stay at again.
Hannah & Richard  both  are very friendly.  Me & mom lived with them for 3 weeks. We just felt like home. Highly recommend  staying  with them.

Hannah and Richard are really great host. House is very conveniently located at St. Paul and easy access to Minneapolis through Green line. The nicest people I’ve ever met. Hannah was present at the check in time and she gave me a tour to my living room. Great people to chat with and Star war fans(what else you want 😃).
P.S. Look out Han Solo and Leah’s picture.

Hannah and Richard’s home was a lovely place. We had a great visit and I slept well. Their location was very clean and inviting, and very convenient to Regions Hospital, a few minute walk up a slight hill. Much nicer, closer and more like home, compared to a local hotel. The reservation and check in process was easy, and both were very accommodating. I highly recommend!

Everything was great! The house was well stocked with everything we needed. (from cooking to bathing to watching TV to playing a game)...It was sparkly clean and uniquely decorated which added to the ambience.  We were close to the Excel Energy Center and the Capital.  Hannah and Richard went above and beyond and added many little extra touches!  They were also very timely, responsive and helpful in answering any questions we had. Thanks for a great weekend.
The house is beautiful and the location is great. The hosts are very thoughtful and attentive.
Lots of 0
Very nice place bigger than we expected too. We were very excited when we found the Nintendo 64!

You will love this place- super clean and comfortable with lots of antique decorations and an artistic feel. The hosts were very responsive and helpful. A quiet and safe location. Plenty of space and a very nice kitchen.
Such a cute place!

- Pampered delights -
Our stay was extremely comfortable—Hannah and Richard’s place was both spacious and cozy. There was plenty of room for five adults to have their own space when desired, and wonderful personal touches in each room/area that made the stay cozy. Hannah and Richard were very fast to respond to all questions right from the beginning of our reservation, making it easy to iron out details since members of our party got in at different times. We very much appreciate their flexibility in accommodating early arrivals for some members of our party—thank you so, so much again! 
In short, we had a pampered stay in a great house  while exploring a fun city!
All the little details taken care of and some extra perks. Best Airbnb I e stayed at in a long time.
Richard and Hannah are wonderful hosts! When my plans changed, they let me check in early. They were friendly, inviting and their home was a peaceful place for me to relax.

This was such a pleasant surprise.  We’ve done many Airbnb rentals over the years and this one is at the top of the list.  Too many nice features to mention.  We’ve never seen this kind of care in detail providing numerous amenities.

This is a wonderful Airbnb. Loved our stay in this warm beautiful house with lots of space, surrounded by books and nice arts. The back yard is a big plus especially when the weather was nice. Highly recommended. Thank you Richard and Hannah for sharing your home.
Super helpful hosts. Delivered me groceries upon arrival! House was as described. Much bigger than I thought. Had a nice stay and would for sure come back.

We really enjoyed our month long stay.  Richard & Hannah were very accommodating and great hosts. It was really helpful to arrive with a stocked fridge after our 40 hour journey from Malaysia.  Anytime we needed something, they immediately came to help.
Loved the neighbourhood, kind of a crossroads of culture located a few blocks from the State Capitol.  Easy access to 35E & 94.
We would highly recommend for any stay, long or short.

Read through the description carefully. The hosts are very upfront about their space. It worked great for us, but you’ll want to make an informed decision about your stay. Our hosts were thoughtful and SO easy to work with. The communication from them was top notch! The house was well furnished and clean. It worked well for us to be central to thing we wanted to do in the Twin Cities area.
Richard & Hannah had fantastic communication. Their place in Saint Paul is charming and we especially appreciated the fresh food items they left us for our stay.
The house is amazing. Plenty of space. Perfectly set up and feels like home. Definitely staying here again.
Great house within walking distance to the capitol building

This host really thought of everything. Above and beyond what they claim to provide there are many details that they do not brag about or promise yet are there for use. I am always very happy when I am under-promised and over delivered. The things that I was not expecting were some if the things I needed the most. for example, my daughter forgot her toothbrush and we found that there was a small stash of them in the upstairs bathroom. Not that these things will always be there for every guest but I think they just keep some things they know could be useful for anybody. The house was very spacious and spread out. Lots if places to retreat if you wanted to have some time alone. The deck overlooking the backyard was very comforting as a place to get some air and relax. There is also a big back yard & front porch. They have some games and things to do as a family or a group. The kitchen was great! we spent a lot of time in the kitchen, it reminded me so much of the house I grew up in. Everything is organized very conveniently. There was a pleasant spell of eucalyptus in some places, which I really loved. Everything was clean! There was lots of natural lighting. I was very happy during out stay, this hostis the best and has set the bar extremely high! I have NO COMPLAINTS!

we loved staying in Richard and Hannah's home. every detail made our extended stay feel like we were in our own home. the neighborhood is wonderful, and is around great food and places to explore. highly recommend this spot !

Richard and Hannah are super responsive and awesome hosts.! We stayed here Jan through Feb 2022 after our St. Paul house sold and we prepared to move out of state for my husband’s new job. 
The kitchen and dining room have everything you need to spend hours cooking, eating and playing board games.
The house is also in a very central location to access both of the twin cities. A great grocery store is also less than a mile away.
We also easily settled in to work remote from this house. Excellent WiFi and tons of space on the two floors.
Best,
Jen
Fine.
It was so cozy staying:). Host is always helpful and everything that we need is in the house so much!
A nice Victoria style that has all the amenities and convenience and Richard was friendly… a very nice neighborhood

Richard and Hannah’s house was absolutely beautiful - so thoughtfully and tastefully designed and even more space than we were expecting. We had great communication with them before and during our stay. The house had everything we needed for our two week stay and was in a great location within walking distance of downtown Saint Paul and the metro green line. Highly recommend this beautiful accommodation!
The bathtub! The classic charm, everything is walking distance. Just quietly nestled behind the capital, and has everything you could need!

Richard's charming house was perfect for our family. The rooms were comfortable and spacious, the kitchen equipped for basic meals - vegetable oil, salt and other basic spices, pots and pans, plates, etc (including a starter carton of eggs, a 1/2 gallon of milk, half & half, coffee and cereal!). 
It's walking distance to a great grocery store (Lunds and Byerlys), the metro's green line to get to other spots in St. Paul (Fasika Ethiopian food and three floors at Midway used books on Snelling!) and downtown Minneapolis (Mary Tyler Moore statue at Nicollett Mall! Bob Dylan mural! Target Field!), and a Hmong market in the other direction for some great pho and other delights. 
And it's convenient to the Twin Cities' tangle of highways while being tucked away from the noise. 
The two porches were perfect for morning coffee. 
Richard was highly responsive, within minutes, whenever I had a question. I can't wait to return to this home!
The house was well kept and easy to navigate,  we enjoyed taking tours of the nearby Capital building and St. Paul Cathedral.

Richard's AirBnb is gorgeous, cozy, and has everything you could want. The kitchen has coffee, multiple types of tea, snacks, and even milk and eggs in the fridge!
It's conveniently located in a beautiful area. When the hot water heater went off, Richard immediately came in and fixed it. He also has great restaurant recommendations. 
I would definitely stay there again.
Excellent hosts, gorgeous house, stellar experience all around!
This is a beautiful St. Paul home with every appointment needed and wanted for a lovely stay.

This is a nice cozy home with 3 nice bedrooms. Each bedroom has it's own air-conditioner so you can set your temperatures as needed. The beds are very comfortable and the linens are very nice to sleep on. Its so nice to have access to a very nice washer and dryer. The kitchen is very nice to cook in and is very roomy. The frig is very nice and large.  There is a restroom downstairs just off the kitchen which is very nice and convenient.  A large table for all to eat. Easy and convenient check in. Nice place for a family to stay.

Richard’s house is beautiful! We loved our stay. He even left some food for breakfast which was very nice. We slept well and it was walkable to downtown. There’s a great fenced backyard which our daughter loved. Richard was also a very nice host. You’ll definitely love his place! Thank you so much Richard!

My family and I had a wonderful, month long stay at Richard’s place. Everything we needed was at the house, the kitchen especially was wonderful! Richard was very communicative, flexible, and incredibly nice. Thank you for letting us stay!
We had a huge project to do in town and needed a home, not a house to come back to to get the rest we needed. Richard's home was exactly that! would definitely stay again!
We loved our stay! Convenient location, great host, and a beautiful home! Thanks!

Had the pleasure of staying at Richard's house and everything was as expected or better. Spacious, charming, cosy and well equipped.
Especially the kitchen was very useful and with everything I could think of to use. 
I also appreciated that the bedrooms could go full dark for a good nights sleep.
Hope to be able to return :)
The house was beautiful, spotless very cozy. Check in was easy

House very clean and updated in spite of age.  Kitchen very well stocked with pots/pans needed, dining room large table!  Stairs were difficult due to our senior age, upstairs floors very squeaky  with each step but clean finished hardwoods. Claw foot tub somewhat difficult to get in and out due to no hand rails.  Host very responsive with any of our requested needs.

Absolutely great stay! We loved how close this was to many different activities. For being an older home, this was super family friendly with child locks and mounted furniture, kids toys and dinnerware. Lots of other amenities that made our stay easy. We would absolutely come back!
spacious clean house in a great location. big rooms and great air conditioning as well as fans. even some snacks and breakfast for your stay
Nice place with everything you need. Only downside was the neighborhood was a bit rough.
The house was spacious, comfy, clean, and had everything we needed for a GREAT stay! Would definitely recommend to anyone going to St. Paul.
Three of us enjoyed our stay in the comfortable, neat and clean house. The owner was welcoming and responsive!
Amazing! Very Kind and I love the vintage feel.
Classic style home with all the amenities... what more can you ask for! A+++
Great spot!

The House was Lovely! Cozy & clean. Nice neighborhood, tranquil area. walking distance to state Capitol. My family Loved it. We had a beautiful white Christmas there. Snow was Lovely & house was warm enough.  Host was very helpful. Thank you!

Great space for three law students to spread out with books. every bedroom was spacious. nice updated decor and super comfortable couch. Richard was sure to tell us everything we needed to know and he was very responsive when we had questions. 
would stay here again!

We were in town for my daughter’s graduation and this location was perfect!  Neighborhood was quiet and it was easy to get to both downtown St Paul & Minneapolis and everywhere in between.  The accommodations provided helped us not have to think about anything but celebrating our new graduate! Highly recommend!
we love the kitchen!

name: Cozy Clean Guest Studio and Garage w Kitchenette
description:
Beautifully decorated, completely separate, private guest studio attached to a single family home. It is clean and cozy, making it feel like Home away from home.

-1 queen bed
-1 sofa pullout bed
-1 full bathroom
-Living room with 55” HD smart TV
-Kitchenette with microwave, mini fridge, coffee maker
-1 car garage

neighbourhood.overview:
We are located in a beautiful, safe, upscale neighborhood. Without traffic, we are about 
35 minutes north of the Minneapolis (MSP) airport
35 minutes north of Mall of America
30 minutes northwest of Xcel Energy Center
25 minutes north of the U.S. Bank Stadium
20 minutes north of downtown Minneapolis.

We are just 5 minutes away from the nearest highway, MN-610, which conveniently connects you to I-94 and I-694. For groceries, there is a gas station right up the road with a well-stocked convenience store (including fresh produce and common pantry items) and a Hy-Vee and Cub Foods about 7 minutes away. Right down the road there is a CVS Pharmacy.

host.name: Lynnell
host.about: I have roots in Hawaii, I'm married to a Mexican, and I'm a mother of four. I enjoy learning about different cultures and appreciate opportunities to meet new people.

detailed_reviews.comments: This private studio was perfect! It is in a nice and quiet neighborhood and not too far from the cities. It is only about a 20-30 min drive to the cities, so it is in a great location. The studio was equipped with everything we needed and it was very quiet and comfortable. The hosts were so friendly and accommodating. We highly recommend it! We definitely plan on staying here again!

Lynnell’s studio was such a delightful, super clean, cozy place.  She was very responsive and attentive to our needs.  The note and the welcome treats she left for me and my friends were just a very thoughtful touch.  Highly recommend!  Thank you again Lynnell!

The studio was great.  Perfect for me to stay for over a week while transitioning between homes.  Beautifully decorated, quiet, great towels, a huge TV, and a garage (great for Minnesota in the winter!)  I really liked all the little touches in the kitchenette like sandwich bags, scissors, and a pen.  
Lynnell responded quickly to any questions and the keypad entry was easy.
I would definitely stay again if I was in the area.

I was privileged to stay at Lynnell's place, it was awesome and the family was nice. It's really great to have the whole place to oneself, especially a single female. Lots of privacy and I also ended up watching Netflix movies.
Gorgeous place and super clean!
Thanks for a wonderful stay. It was very comfortable, clean and relaxing. Had a little trouble with wifi but resolved the issue fast. I felt right at home
Great place to stay clean friendly and good amenities absolutely loved the movie apps on the tv would definitely come back to the same home if I get back to the city thanks
Everything was so amazing! She even brought us some homemade guava cake, delicious!

This was the first time I ever did anything like this, and I was not disappointed. Lynnell responded to me quickly and in a timely manner. The space was just the right size for what we needed it for. It was very clean and organized in a cool set up. I would highly recommend to anyone looking for a place to stay.

We loved the garage that went right to the apartment..
the large TV was great everything was sparkling clean comfy and cozy will definitely come back
This studio space has a homey feeling. I especially liked the private entrance and garage space. I highly recommend and would definitely stay again!
Great place to stay. Clean. Modern. Well furnished and set-up. My guest and I felt like it was a home away from home. We loved every minute of it. Would recommend to couples and single travelers.

This a spacious and beautiful place to stay.  The apartment is bright and sparkling clean with tons of amenities.  There is plenty of room to make yourself at home.  The homey touches are wonderful and being able to control the thermostat in the room is a real plus.  The bed and couch are both very comfortable and the kitchen area is well laid out.  I thoroughly enjoyed my time staying with this wonderful host.

Very clean & comfortable space. Perfect for a wedding weekend in the Minney.
Everything that you would need was included. Great Communication & Lynnell was flexible with our check out time due to a long night and later flight.  Highly recommended. Thank you!

Lynnell is a great host & her place is just as pictured. A cute & clean little studio in a good/quiet neighborhood. Easy instructions & quick responses. I would definitely recommend this place and book with Lynnell again.

The studio was absolutely adorable! Our host had thought of everything we might need. Very nice area and quiet. Bed was extremely comfortable and everything was clean. Having a private garage was nice too!
Spectacular stay. She made us feel right at home. She provided everything we needed and then some with this beautiful studio. Will definitely return!
Lynell's place is just like home.  Clean, comfy, welcoming, with great stylish touches.  A great stay!
This place is just great!!!!!
The airbnb was spotless, well decorated, and the attached garage is great. It made me feel at home during my say!

Lynnell's place is very comfortable, especially the bed, and the location was perfect for us. It was nice to have a garage to keep the car. Lynnell was very prompt in responding when we needed a response. We'd definitely look to stay there again when we're in the northern suburbs of the Twin Cities. Just a warning for coffee-drinkers, they supply hot chocolate mix but no coffee. Not a great hardship for most people but it was different than any other Airbnb we've stayed at in the past.

This place was so cute! Much better than I expected for the price. Lynnell has turned her space into an awesome little getaway. She had shampoo conditioner body wash all the necessities for the kitchen and even left out a Reese’s! It’s in a decent area and felt safe to us!

This place was so lovely! Miss Lynnell responded quickly, was helpful about the surrounding areas, & was very very helpful during our situation with the checkout time! It was LOVELY and definitely will look her up if ever in the location again!
Clean, comfortable space and a lovely host family. Easy check-in and quick responses. Would definitely stay here again.

We loved staying here at Lynnell's place! Everything was seamless, we had everything we needed in a well organized space, it came with a garage which we really appreciated.  The bed was comfy,  the shower was great,,,What can I say?? I wish we had a place like this to offer other Airbnb'ers in our city!

Great place to stay for the weekend. We had a blast. There was absolutely NO noise. It was a super nice place with a great tv with Netflix! We missed having an oven and a stove but we made do. The best and couch were super comfy, there was plenty of space. The closet was huge, the heat worked great in the cold MN weather. Absolutely excellent AirBnB stay.
It is a little farther out from the city than expected even though the address says Minneapolis but there is a cub foods and McDonald's as well as a couple of nice restaurants.

Staying with Lynnell was wonderful! We were in town for a wedding, and the studio was so nice to come back to and relax. It was also great having access to a garage in the middle of a Minnesota winter. If we’re ever back in the Minneapolis area, we will definitely stay with Lynnell again!
Would highly recommend this space for anyone traveling to the Minneapolis area. Great space! The garage was so nice to park a vehicle in. Lynell went above and beyond as our hostess
The Airbnb is one of the best I stayed in. It’s super clean. Perfect. Will stay here again.
The studio was very clean and stylish, looks a lot better in person. Nice host and even left a yummy Reese’s for us! Would definitely recommend and stay there again.
Super clean and stylish place to live... me and my gf were super glad that we found this place for her trip visiting MN

Lynnell’s place is super cute! Everything was very clean and the stay was pleasant. She wrote a personalized note giving us updated weather advice. Also, she leaves a Twix for her guests. I would definitely rent again and would recommend to anyone. Thanks Lynnell!

This is an excellent studio with all amenities, super clean, very nice, especially compared to hotel rooms! I really felt comfortable and at home.
Recommend to all!

I am glad I stayed at this place, it is in a very nice and safe neighborhood, look like a beautiful house from the outside, the studio is very roomy and clean, even have a nice tv.  Highly recommended
Great place to stay. Very clean. Beautiful room.
It’s a very nice place and it’s really comfortable and quite
Our stay was great. The place was spotless, and very stylish. Their communication was clear and always responded right away. The hospitality was perfect.
Nice accommodations. About a half hour from downtown St. Paul.
Great place, Lynnell is an outstanding host. Definitely recommend staying here. The place has that home away from home feel.
This is a wonderful place to stay.  Quiet, convenient, clean and restful.  You won’t be sorry you stayed here!
Awesome space, clean, quiet and wrote a thoughtful note along with some Hersey chocolate. My 1st airbnb was an great experience due to Lynnell's hospitality.

Lynnell was an absolutely outstanding host! She checked in on us and our plans before we had even left as the weather was going to be a little dicey. The check in was incredibly smooth and everything in the studio was exactly as described and more. It was sparkling clean and you could tell she had taken great care to make the place very comfortable and welcoming. There was a problem with the garage door opener when we needed to leave one night but she was very quick to respond to us, get it figured out, and we didn’t have an issue with it for the rest of the trip. Lynnell was so helpful and consistently checked in on us to make sure everything was going okay and if we had questions. All in all, I would stay here again in a heartbeat!
Clean and well appointed.  Great to have the garage!
Extremely clean, very comfortable and wonderful amenities. If I’m back in the twin cities will definitely stay there again!

My mom and I traveled to Minneapolis recently, and we loved Lynnell's place as a home base for our excursions to central Minneapolis and Anoka. It was clean with hotel-like amenities and a comfortable pull-out couch with a large flat-screen TV. The attached garage was great and would be wonderful in inclement weather, since garages are so rare to find on Airbnb! Overall we couldn't have been happier with the trip and would highly recommend Lynnell's place to travelers of all kinds.
Awesome space and great hospitality!
Lynnell's space is stylishly decorated, extremely clean and she has terrific touches such as travel information for the area! The space would be perfect for a traveling couple.
It was perfect.
super cute, stylish and clean. quiet neighborhood and very private. highly recommend!
Very quiet, clean studio apartment with garage. Small refrigerator with microwave, electric tea pot and toaster. Perfect for two to three people who plan to use this space for showering and sleeping.

This was our first trip to Minneapolis and these accommodations were perfect for what we were looking for. Quiet, private, and safe. We were close enough to the city to get everywhere we wanted to in under 30 minutes, yet far enough way to not have any city noise, traffic, or distractions. The private garage was an added bonus! 10/10 would recommend! Clean, relaxing, comfortable. The perfect spot for a kid-free weekend getaway. Also, this is located five minutes away from a hidden tourist gem; Coon Rapids Dam. Easy access to the MS River and a walkable dam. 
Thank you, Lynnell!

Lynnell's place was spotless and quiet.  There were nice touches around the apartment.  I appreciated that it was close to major roads but in a quiet neighborhood.  I was there for a business trip, and I enjoyed that it was rather close to a shopping area with some restaurants.  I hope to stay there again in the future when I have to be in the Twin Cities.
We loved the space but did not find any extra blankets. We ended up having some in my car that worked fine. Otherwise the space was amazing. We would definitely return!!!!

Was on a trip cross country and needed a place to stay in Minneapolis. This place was great. Definitely in a suburb, about a 20 minute drive from Minneapolis, but perfect place to relax. Clean and comfortable. Also shower has perfect pressure.
Sparkling clean. Lynnell is a fantastic hostess. Tucked into a quiet neighborhood on the north end of town. Highly recommend.
This place was very clean and cute!! Lynell was very quick to respond when we had an issue with getting in. I would highly recommend staying here!!
Very responsive to requests and went the extra mile by asking my daughter if she wanted to use her dryer after my daughter hand washed her clothes after a tournament and hung them outside to dry.

Lynnell’s place was perfect for my wife and I.  It was comfortable, super clean, and the exact size we were looking for.  Lynnell was always quick to reply to messages before check in, and the whole process was simple.
Loved the place it was perfect for my stay

Lynnell's place was just perfect for us!  My adult daughter and I were only visiting Minneapolis for two days so needed a place to stay for only one night. It was so nice that Lynnell offers single night stays.  The location was quiet and safe, and the studio was very clean and stylish. Both the bed and the pull out were very comfortable.  There were brochures and travel guides to look through, so we did not even turn on the TV. And the check in and check out procedures were easy to understand. If I could rate this higher than a 10, I would!!

There was a bit of miscommunication and a mix up in dates when staying at Lynnell’s place. Fortunately, she was 100% understanding and made everything work! She made room for any special requests I had and was so friendly about it! The bed was comfortable, the studio was cozy. The directions for check in/check out were easy! Great communication and the place was SPARKLING CLEAN! The shower was one of my favorite parts! Definitely in a secluded area, but close to everything you need! I will definitely return someday!

We rented Lynnel's studio as it was a convenient location from Blaine where my daughter had a frisbee tournament. We had a great stay at her place. The studio was really clean, cozy, and it was a lovely place to relax after watching Ultimate all day.  At first,  I was not too sure about not having a full kitchen but at the end, it worked out great. We went to Whole Foods every 2.5 days to grab some deli food that we would keep in the fridge and warm in the microwave.  We met Lynnell who is really nice and really responsive with her emails. I highly recommend you consider her place if you are going to Blaine or even Minneapolis as it is really not that far to reach the city.
Super host very understanding

The studio apartment is very cute and clean! Close to a lot of food options and the highway to get where you want to go. Communication & check in was very easy. Even though it’s near their home, privacy was great!

Lynnell's place is wonderful! She did a really did a great job working around our hectic schedule. I loved that their placed had a garage. I also loved how clean and well maintained her place is. I would have no problem recommending her place to anyone.

I stayed two nights at Lynnell's place and it was fantastic.  Lynnell always responded quickly to my messages and the space itself was immaculate.  I felt right at home and genuinely appreciated the privacy, including the garage spot!  I wouldn't hesitate to stay again.
Clean place, private, quiet and very cozy. I definitely would stay here again.
Very comfy and Tucked-away stay with all the essentials. Host answered questions with speed and accuracy. Perfect location away from the bustling city. High recommend!
Great stay for 2 people!
Easy contact free check in.  Good value in exactly the location I needed.
Lynelles place is great! The attached garage was a real plus in the winter. Highly recommended. I would certainly stay there again!

Best experience I’ve had on this app! The unit is the perfect home away from home. Lynnell has put so much care & thoughtfulness into every detail of this beautifully updated space. Will definitely stay again.
Amazing space and people! Will definitely stay again!
Excellent place to stay!
Absolutely a prefect place to stay at every level. The hosts and place was was perfect. I will definitely stay here again. I highly recommend this host and this location.
Clean and affordable!! A great place to stay with very nice hosts! Definitely recommend!
Great, clean stay in a quiet neighborhood. The studio felt like home and was very comfortable to be in.
Great host & wonderful to work with. She was very helpful & generous & responded very quickly to any concerns I had. She made my stay exceptional!!!

Lynnell is everything you want in a host. She is kind, understanding, helpful, & responsive. She knows the area very well & is helpful with any concerns or questions. Her Airbnb was clean, modern, up-to-date, & felt like home. The location is safe & quiet. It was a true pleasure working with such a great person & I would highly recommend this location to anyone!
This Air Bnb was lovely to stay at. Very clean and very well decorated, it felt cosy.
I will definitely keep this as my permanent stay if available when I visit again.

Lynnell's place is great if you value privacy, comfort and cleanliness. It felt homely and the neighborhood safe. She was a responsive host and took care of an issue  as soon as I brought it up. I would definitely stay there again.

My daughter and I had nice stay at Lynnell’s. It’s small, but the bed and sofa bed were very comfortable and it had everything that we needed. The garage is definitely a bonus! We would definitely stay again.

This place met our needs perfectly.  Small and cozy with all the features needed for a comfortable stay.  The place matched the description and has a small kitchenette and no washer/dryer, which might be a concern for some on longer stays.  For shorter duration stays, it’s not an issue.   We found the location, in a quiet suburban setting, to be close enough to area restaurants and coffee shops.  Host was a very effective and efficient communicator.  We would stay here again.
This was a perfect place for my mom to stay as she had mobility issues. Only one step getting into the unit made it easy for her. Cozy studio with everything needed for a comfortable stay.
The small studio is well equipped and convenient to everything we wanted to do. the space was quiet and clean. The bed was very comfortable and the shower had great water pressure!
Really nice place and was very comfortable

Lynnell's place was great, 
 easy to get to, and not far from the city center. And to top it off, there's even a garage to park in.
This place is peaceful and a clean spot. The host is very responsive.
Lynnell’s place was designed having “LOVE AS THE BEST INGREDIENT.” I’ve got all I needed, like a true “home away from home”. Two thumbs up to the fantastic hosts.

This is a great spot. I like the privacy and the accessibility. I even had my own parking spot with controller to garage door. Also Lynnell is very responsive. In fact don’t think twice about this spot. Lovely stay. Will be back.
This was a great place to stay! The garage parking was amazing and it was super easy to get wherever we needed from the airbnb. It was a good place to come back to each night
Absolutely perfect for what we needed. Great communicators and an overall awesome experience. We’ll be back!

Very responsive host, excellent space and went the extra mile to ensure our stay was wonderful.  Well taken care of home and host even alerted us to an on coming storm.
Located in a woodsy suburban neighborhood and bonus having our own garage.

absolutely amazing place!! i could not have asked for a better first-time airbnb experience. the space was everything that we needed and more. everything was easily accessible and there were plenty of cleaning supplies and replacements for everything in the room. lynnell was also an absolutely amazing host and went above and beyond in every way. absolutely recommend, recommend, RECOMMEND! 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

This is a gem of a little place in a really nice area. Lynnell is a wonderful host - very communicative and helpful. It was clean, comfortable, pleasantly furnished, and felt very cozy. 
The neighborhood is very close to Downtown Anoka which is a charming little town and although I didn't make use of them, I thought I saw some trails for hiking or biking.  Very easy highway access. There is a small gas station  and neighborhood convenience store a short walk away too which came in super handy to purchase some bread, coffee, cream, and toiletries. 
Lynnell thanks so much!
This is my second stay in one of Lynnell’s properties. Exactly the kind of place I needed. I’d stay again next time I’m in Minneapolis.
such a perfect and lovely place to stay. i loved it so much.

Great location for family visit
Walking and biking trails very close
Cute little place. Clean, host was helpful and made sure we had what we needed. Overall, great price for the price!

Lynnell is a great hostess, very responsive and friendly. We were in town for a wedding and it felt like we had a home away from home to get ready, take naps, and hang out with extended family. Highly recommend!
used the space for remote work. internet speed was great and as advertised. unit was quiet and well located. private garage was really awesome! will return in the future.
Very nice, private and clean place. Fast on responding. Great location.

Everything was as described. The guests enter the studio through the private garage. It was super convenient for the loading/unloading as it was raining on the day I left. It's a very quiet and clean place. I will come back for a longer stay if there is an opportunity.
Second time staying here, very nice stay overall
Lynell was extremely helpful and responsive, nice location relative to what we were in Maple Grove for.
Lynnell was very understanding and helpful with a sudden change of stay. She quickly responded and was very extremely helpful!

Lynell’s studio was a lovely stay! Clean, updated, and great for me to work from home. The only thing is I wish there was a duvet or I was notified that there would be no big blankets, as there were only sheets. Luckily I brought my own! Besides that, Lynell was kind, accommodating, and easy to reach. Thank you so much!!! Definitely will recommend to people from out of town.
Best Airbnb I’ve ever stayed in! Host was very communicative and nice!
Really enjoyed my stay if I could I would rent the place!!!!
Great studio with an attached garage. Had everything we needed for a short stay. It was clean and quiet. Wouldn’t hesitate to stay again next time we are in town.
It was nice and comfortable. Everything was clean n host is really responsive and kind.

Wonderful couple, kind, responsive, and prompt in addressing my concerns.  Though I checked in after the published time, they indicated on their site that they were flexible.  I did have an issue with refrigerator, heating, and sink plug but hosts responded in record time.  I was given my privacy but knew that I could get help at any time.  Hosts messaged me to ask how I was doing.
I appreciated their willingness to  share information, as I am new to Minnesota and this was my first time visiting.  My purpose was to check out real estate and I wanted to speak to people who had come from elsewhere and made Minnesota home.  My hosts were very open about their experiences and took the time to engage with me by phone and in person.
I feel fortunate to have had such a positive experience!
was great stay

Such a lovely alternative to a hotel in the north metro! A garage stall to park in made it even better. Would stay again and recommend to anyone. Impeccably clean and comfortable. Lynnell was such a hospitable person, making sure I got in ok, etc.
Very clean , great neighborhood. Easy to communicate with. Definitely will use Lynelle again

Stayed for the weekend to hangout around Minneapolis as my gf grew up here, the place was very clean and cozy and Lynnell was very helpful, as well as instructions were very clear and easy to understand. The studio was private and easy to get in and out of. I would totally stay here again with my gf in the future!
off street parking, very quiet and the bed is very comfortable. exactly what I was looking for.
Felt right at home…..
everything was great but we had noisy neighbors at one point
fantastic place, the bed is comfy and it's quiet with off street parking.
Will definitely come back

Lynnell was simply a fabulous host. She was always immediately responsive to any questions that I had, and handled them with grace and kindness. She was very accommodating of my schedule, allowing a flexible check-in time. I felt safe and right at home, truly because I knew I was in good hands. 
The space is exactly as described, and incredibly clean. The bed is more comfortable than my own! It was exactly what I needed functionally, while being beautifully designed and decorated at that. When I visit the area again, I truly hope to book with Lynnell again! They made my first Minneapolis experience so welcoming. Thanks for everything!

Lynnell's place was clean, located in a quite neighborhood and exactly what you see in the pictures. The 3 pictures on the wall showing where she and her husband were from along with where the airbnb was a nice personal touch. Will recommend her to family and friends in the future!
Lynnell was very quick and helpful with her responses to any questions or concerns I had during my stay.
Awesome as always!

great price, great location, great host!
will be back soon, the attached garage is a super great feature

For the most part Lynnell's place was good.  It was clean,  shower facilities were good and the bed was comfortable.  There was a bit of an annoying humming sound (suspect the baseboard heaters) that kept us awake at times.  Checkin was a little confusing at first perhaps because we thought Lynnell lived in the main part of the house so when 2 parties showed up at the rental, there was a little confusion.  Instructions on how to get in were good.  I blame myself for not reading them closely before arriving.
Lynnell was always responsive right away with any questions/issues I had and took care of things while respecting my privacy and the comfort of my stay. Great host!

It wasn't cold yet, but accessing the room through the garage was so nice! The space was clean. It had everything listed and a little more. Host was very responsive and helpful. I was very comfortable and would happily stay again.

The space was exactly as described and shown, modern and very clean. Check-in was very easy and flexible. Included all of the necessary amenities for any duration of stay. I absolutely recommend staying here!

I have stayed at some great airbnbs and also experienced some not so great places. This is definitely one of the greats. There is attention to detail here. You can feel that they are not just renting out space but instead making this a home away from home. Very clean, tons of storage, incredible to have to the attached garage. Owner was responsive and friendly. I very much enjoyed my time here and would definitely rent again if I’m in town!

Lynnell’s studio was perfect for our stay. It was bitter cold, and having a garage to park in and go straight inside was amazing. The studio was super clean and had everything my husband and I needed. Lynnell’s communication was top-notch. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

We were glad to find a place not too far from our daughters in Coon Rapids. It was especially clean and neat with everything conveniently placed. 
One thing I would have appreciated would have been a lighter blanket since I am a hot sleeper. Luckily, there was an afghan, which I was able to use in place of the comforter. 
Enjoyed having the convenience of the garage.

I'll start with the negatives: My opinion, I thought that the bed and couch were not comfortable, they were way too stiff for my liking. My wife on the other hand thought that there wasn't a problem with either the couch or the bed. So take that information as you'd like. Other than that, the location was perfect. The host was very nice and responsive and the place was nice and cozy! If you want just a comfortable vacation get away for yourself or with a spouse, I highly recommend this place. I also really love the extra security of only having access to the room through the garage.

name: The cottage.
description: It's located 12 minutes from downtown 15 minutes from the airport.  12 minutes from the U of Minnesota-5 miles from the stadium. Surrounded by a beautiful garden. Easy to park. One huge attic bedroom carpeted heated/cooled with a King bed. Two regular bedrooms with queen beds in each room. One queen sized futon sleeper in the lower level. One full hide-bed/couch in  a porch like room heated. Two kitchens two bathrooms with a nice living room, and dining room.

neighbourhood.overview: We are walking distance from Minehaha creek.

host.name: Alex
host.about: I am a lecturer/Teaching specialist at the University of Minnesota for the last 20+ years. I teach American Indian Philosophy, and Indians of Minnesota. I love to travel, and have traveled extensively around the world. I love to have friends over for cheese, and wine. I love garden parties, and gardening is my passion. I bought next door house so that I can have a bigger garden. I love trekking around Sardegna, and usually I try to make it every August.

detailed_reviews.comments: The cottage is so cozy and welcoming!  We thoroughly enjoyed our visit!

The large central dining room is perfect for playing games and enjoying delicious meals. The fireplace in the front room made for cozy reading by the fire and the back sitting area was great for a quiet escape from those watching TV! My son loved the downstairs room to watch his own programs. Alex is a very helpful owner. We would highly recommend this property!

Alex's house is warm and comfortable. The location was great. I would recommend it. The living spaces were perfect for our needs, and the bedrooms were comfortable. There are 2 bedrooms and a bathroom on the main floor. There is a very nice attic bedroom, but there is no bathroom up there. The basement is large, and has a full kitchen and bathroom. It was perfect for what we needed for a long weekend.

"The Cottage" so graciously hosted by Alex is the perfect place for family and friends to gather and just be during their stay in the area. What brought myself and 5 other family members from across the country to stay was my son's wedding - it was lovely having the cottage be our home away from home during  this time.
Alex was very responsive and appreciated that he likes to show the place to you when you check-in. The house is very nice and has a lot of space and very clean. Location is great as well.

The cottage was a wonderful place to stay. Being our first AirB&B we didn’t know what to expect but Alex made our first experience a truly wonderful one. He is a great host and goes beyond to try and make everything just right. WTG Alex keep up the good work.
Had a great stay, thank you, the house worked great for our family. Love your gardens!

Staying at the Garden House was a perfect option to prepare for a wedding with friends. There were 4 individuals and we each felt we had our own space with common areas to share time together. We very much enjoyed the opportunity to sit outside in the garden!

Alex’s cottage was beautiful.  For our first BnB experience, it exceeded all expectations.  Great locals close to the city and Minnehaha Park.  Comfortably slept 6, but could have ha sled more with ease.  The amenities were areaome.  Other BnB owners will need to really step it up to exceed this experience.  Worth every penny and yet, so much less expensive than a hotel for six.

Our family of six adults were in town for a wedding and Alex’s Cottage was the perfect place for our visit. It is spotless, has plenty of room to accommodate a large group and Alex is a warm and welcoming host. We enjoyed both the beautiful gardens from the windows in the den and the nice outdoor sitting areas. Great location- quick drive to downtown and nearby lakes. Lovely neighborhood for walks too.
We will certainly be staying at The Cottage again in the future.
Alex went above and beyond to make our stay special. Rhe gardens are beautiful!

The host was really thoughtful about making sure the place was well stocked, clean, and really responsive to any questions we had. The location was also really convenient to get to downtown, mall of America, and the airport.

My family really enjoyed our stay. Wonderful location. Prompt responses from owner. I recommend if you enjoy sleeping in to let Alex know in advance as he is a meticulous gardener. Home is comfortable but some furniture is due for replacement. 
We would stay here again if the opportunity arose.
Alex's place was wonderful!  So appreciated the communication ahead of time and was a great place to stay that I'd highly recommend!
The cottage is a fantastic place to stay. Very comfortable home, and amazing surrounding gardens. Alex is a wonderful host: welcoming, candid, honest, and responsive. This was perfect for our family.

Wonderful stay in a really neat house with a great neighborhood. We were not able to explore the neighborhood because we had a specific itinerary for our trip, but what we did see made us wish we had more time to explore. Coffee close enough to walk as well as several other establishments. Close to Mall of America. All amenities needed were there and plenty of room for our six travelers including teenagers. Not much down time for us, but they have several board games the teens played that was an unexpected touch.  Really enjoyed our short stay and would love to stay again and relax! Great place!
A great home with a caring and attentive owner!  Spacious, clean, and comfortable with a wonderful large dinning room table for entertaining.  Nice area for walking too.  We will be back!

Beautiful South Minneapolis cottage!! 
We had a very comfortable stay in Alex's home. The house is very spacious and the cottage had all the amenities needed for our group. This is also in a great area, very convenient to DT, Uptown, Northeast, etc.

Alex was a wonderful host. Our family stayed for a week for my grandfathers surgery and everything you would need for a Air B N B they have it. Plenty of dishes and Linens. This was perfect for us. When we visit we will probably try to book another stay.

We used The Cottage to have our family Christmas at which involved nine brothers and sisters and their families from all over the United States. We could not have found a more perfect location! We made a huge feast using the extremely well stocked kitchen that did not lack any kitchen utensils needed. We had originally planned on buying plates for the dinner but were pleasantly surprised to find over 30 pretty glass plates for us to use along with more than enough silverware. The basement was the perfect spot to hangout and play some of the many games that were at the house while keeping warm by the fireplace. We would reccomend the location in the future and appreciated our host’s communication and hospitality.

Alex's place felt so much like home we didn't want to leave. Extra touches everywhere and so much room! Comfortable, welcoming, and convenient. Great home-base for a family in an awesome location. Alex was a thoughtful and warm host. We'll be back.
I have used Air Bnb’s throughout the country and this was one of my best experiences. The Cottage was remarkable and cozy. Great location a short drive from Downtown. Felt right at home immediately.
Great central location, very attentive owner and everything you need to stay in MSP.
적정한가격

This place was amazing 6 stars for value and hospitality. Great location, close to airport and downtown Minneapolis. Lots of space for a party and guests. Loved it, 100% Would go back for another visit
