The cottage is a great space with a lot of room, and a feeling of “home”.
The home is cute and quite spacious and the location is near everything...downtown, uptown, city lakes, U of M and Dinkytown!
Perfect for our quick "gateway"!
We had an amazing stay at the cottage. We loved all the extra space. The game room is fully stocked and the garden provides a quiet spot to rest. Alex was an amazing host. You won't be disappointed.

This cottage was the perfect place for hosting my 5 college friends reunion this summer! It is cozy, comfortable, home away from home! We slept six easily. Everything was absolutely spotless, and furnished with everything we needed, from towels, sheets and linens, to every kitchen utensil one would ever need. And that's not even mentioning the tropical like gardens, patio, shady pergola with table and chairs, and flowers abundant!  The location was also amazing! Portland south took us to Crosstown Hwy #62 where we could go west, to the Arboretum, east to St Paul to go on our riverboat cruise,straight  onto 35W south to go out of town, or 1 block over to Park, to head downtown to Stella's Fish Cafe rooftop for a wonderful evening. So convenient! The owner is available, friendly, and made us feel so welcome and at home! I couldn't recommend this more highly. The perfect get away! Thank you Alex and Brie!
Clean, comfortable, equipped with everything imaginable, great location......we would love to stay here again.
Great location.  Very comfortable.

Very pretty house and beautiful neighborhood.
It is very convenient place to go everywhere. 
Great host! AAAAA
will be back this place when I go to Vikings game again!

What a sweet find in the city. Spacious, well equipped, comfortable with a beautiful garden. Be sure to come at harvest time and you will enjoy fresh herbs, peppers, squash and other hidden delights. Alex is a warm and welcoming host. We felt cared for but never intruded upon. He has a supportive and generous spirit. We recommend staying here when you are in Minneapolis.

This was our first Airbnb in Minneapolis and boy we made a good choice.  This house is next door to the owner's residence and your first impression will be to be overwhelmed by the gardens, front, side, and back.  Alex, the owner, is straight-forward and friendly and I personally greatly enjoyed talking with him.  We need more people like Alex.  The house itself was very very comfortable with all expected amenities.  Everything worked.  It was clean and very comfortable.  The decor of the den, in particular, was unusually comfortable.  This is not to say the rest of the house was not comfortable - it was.  At night, it was quiet.  The airport is perhaps 15-20 minutes away.  The location for us was perfect.  Simply put, this was a great place for us to stay for a week.  You will not be disappointed, and if for some reason you're in a bad mood, the gardens will put you right, every day.

Beautiful home in a quiet section of town.  15 minutes from the airport and a short walk to great restaurants. 
 The flowers and gardens are truly amazing.
Very nice place with lots of character! The house provided everything we needed and more, including a well stocked kitchen, games, books, and comfortable places to relax. Great neighborhood.
Charming home close to everything.  This home has all the amenities you need & more.  Cozy up to the fireplace with a good book or share family games, we did it all. We will definitely stay again.

Like visiting grandma’s house. Really clean. Great kitchen and really well stocked. Comfortable living room. But, I would not stay here again for one very important reason: the beds ranged from fair to poor. My back hurt so bad after our stay here.

We had a nice stay at Alex’s cottage. Alex is one of the nicest and accommodating hosts I have had. His place is in a great location to get around the city. We enjoyed playing a number of the games on the cool, wet days.
This house was amazing!! It was very clean, and inviting. Alex was great! he made our group  trip feel very welcoming and always made himself available. He should be a Super Host!
Wonderful place, just like in the photos.Quick response and very easy check-in process.
The cottage was just what we needed for a great girls weekend.

This house has it all! We were so pleased to stay here as a family of four with a teenager and a toddler. There are several living spaces and comfortable rooms. It is also well air-conditioned, which isn’t always the case in Minneapolis. Bonus: beautiful gardens, a chicken coop (but no loud rooster!) and a kind host. We definitely recommend a stay here!

We absolutely loved our stay at The Cottage. It was spacious and our group was comfortable throughout the trip. The amenities were lovely and we had a great time cooking in the kitchen, sitting in the garden, and playing board games. The house was well-situated in a quieter residential neighborhood yet less than 20 minutes to various Twin Cities attractions, which we had a blast exploring. Bree and Alex were great hosts and made us feel welcome throughout our entire visit, and the chickens were friendly and entertaining!
We had an amazing time—the house is beautiful, the flowers are gorgeous, and the time was wonderfully spent. Thank you!!

Alex’s home is a nice place to stay. The location was excellent, very central to everything and the communication from the host was informative and timely. The flowers in the garden were lovely and it is easy to appreciate the wonderful place that this is.

For those looking for more privacy and anonymity, just a heads up that the owner, a delightful individual and master gardener,  lives next door and spends a chunk of time in the yard each morning just outside the sunroom window watering plants and feeding chickens.   Also for those big into cooking, you may want to bring a chefs knife and your favorite pot or pan. Apart from that the kitchen is well equipped.
I would stay again, charming older home. The attic bedroom was great for young couple with new baby. Stairs up to it were steep but nice space. Bathrooms small but adequate.

We had SUCH a great stay! Alex’s place was perfect for our family and we loved the central location to all that the Twin Cities has to offer! Alex kindly offered use of his herb garden and building bonfires in his fire pit a couple evenings was a blessing on some beautiful MN fall evenings! An unexpected offer for a late checkout worked perfectly for our international family whose flight didn’t depart until evening. Thank you, Alex!

This is a wonderful,  well stocked, conveniently located and fully equipped charming cottage. We were amazed at the size and number of comfortable beds. There were many family games, pillows,  comforters and spaces to explore.
We will look forward to our next visit.
The “Cottage” is the perfect place to stay when visiting Minneapolis.  Close to downtown but situated in a nice, safe area.  This is our second stay here, and we love it.
great property loved the privacy and neighborhood,
Less than 15 minutes from downtown and less then 10 minutes to Mall of America!
Wonderful place to stay for the weekend with seven adults.
Great location, slept the six of without any trouble at all and very clean.  Definitely a fair price for what you get.
The best AirBnB I have ever stayed at! So much space, but also so cozy. Alex the host is extremely kind, and made us feel at home.
Great Place!

Alex’s cottage is bigger on the inside than it looks from the outside! It was very spacious and in a great location that provides quick and easy access to anywhere you may want to go. Laundry on site is a great bonus too. The home is well maintained and the beds are comfortable, would definitely stay again.
Fantastic location, comfortable, and cozy.
Loved our stay. Alex was very friendly and available for questions that may have popped up.  The children loved being able to feed the chickens.
Wonderful property and host. Very accommodating and always replied in a helpful and timely fashion. Would love to visit again.

Older charming cottage which you can see from the pictures. Amazong location for Mall Of America, Downtown Minneapolis, and St. Paul amenities and activities. Didnt drive more than 20 minutes anywhere. Located between so of the best Minneapolis ciry parks (Minnehaha Falls, Lake Nokomis, And Chain of Lakes, so plenty of restaurants and large outdoor spaces to enjoy nearby. 
We came for the location and the chickens. Kids loved checking on them daily. Alex was super friendly and available if we needed anything. I was pleased with the stay and the house suited our needs for the trip. We would stay here agaiin.

lots of space. LR is nice, but we sat in the game room and watched the chickens. Neighborhood is great. Alex was very happy to give us a tour of his garden. We did a load of laundry, very easy  
downsides: no BR on attic floor with king bed. chickens will wake the east BR, no alarm needed. some light switches and outlets are awkward. large temp differential between floors, central HVAC good for only one floor at a time  
full disclosure: after booking, I found out Alex is a co-worker for my brother-in-law. we will probably try to stay here the next time we visit

Alex was such an amazing and friendly host! Place was fantastic, great location, had everything you could possibly need in a kitchen, and was surprisingly kid friendly for my 5 and 3 year old. We had a blast and can’t wait to be back. 
Thank you so much Alex!
We all loved staying here. Nothing like having your morning coffee outside with the chickens. The garden was absolutely stunning. And. The. BEDS. We’re absolutely amazing and so comfortable!!

Very nice house. Was Roomy and comfortable. Alex responded quickly if we needed anything. We will definitely use this listing again
Susie Q
We loved staying at your place Alex! Plenty of space to spread out, very comfy, kitchen well stocked, and so fun to see the chickens as well!

We stayed 8 days in this house and regret booking it. No garage. Parking on street. The yard was not maintained. Very messy with dried leaves all over.  Very very very old and very small house. And everything else is also very old. The furniture, area rug everything is so worn out. Built in 1940s. And not much is done to modernize. 
The kind bed is in attic with no toilet and no heating. 2 bedrooms on first floor with 1 bath on first floor and 1 in basement, which was not mentioned in the listing.  Bathrooms were small and not clean. The main level bath didn’t have a lock. Basement has no heating. And way to basement is from kitchen. Very narrow small staircase, (step is smaller than length of the foot) 
Cobwebs in Places and the whole front door covered in cobwebs 
No garbage disposer in sink. Sink in laundry room filthy dirty. Fireplace in basement wasn’t working and no heating so couldn’t use the basement. The fireplace in main lever was fixed on the day fifth of our stay.
Great place
Nice old house with lots of space in a great neighborhood and location. The yard/garden outside was well maintained and the chickens were entertaining!
The house is so comfortable and spacious - we feel right at home! Alex is friendly, helpful, generous (sharing his chicken’s eggs!), but never intrusive and respects our privacy. Thank you Alex!

We enjoyed staying at Alex’s Airbnb. It was clean and had everything we needed. There is street parking and a spot in the back alley if you prefer. Only thing I could think to mention is some of the house does need updating and the second bathroom is in the basement. Our 4 year old loved going out in the morning to see the chickens. Alex even let her her feed the chickens

The house was beautiful, though indeed old. The neighborhood was gorgeous and the garden made it very cozy. However, parking was difficult because the plants were in the way so he had to squeeze through those to get all our stuff inside. But not a big deal. Bath time for my kids was a bit difficult because the bath tub didn't fill up very fast. The beds were comfortable. There were no locks on any doors. The biggest issue during the stay was the smell coming from the basement because there was some carpet cleaning done, however there was hardly any ventilation so it began to stink of mold or mildew. Alex was very kind and he did give us a discount. Otherwise, the place was very cozy and fun to stay and an excellent location. We had a great time.
We really liked the house and the neighborhood.

Alex’s place was perfect for our needs! We were here at our niece’s /granddaughters wedding and we felt at home here. It was so peaceful in the mornings out back on the patio enjoying our coffee and listening/watching the chickens! It was very convenient to everything to do in Minneapolis.  We had everything in the kitchen for our needs and would highly recommend Alex’s house for a stay.
The cottage was a quaint home we enjoyed for our family weekend.  Alex was very helpful with anything we needed.

Front the moment we walked in, we felt right at home. Alex and Bree’s home had everything a family could need. From a reading room with a large window with a view to the chicken coop, which was the coolest ever! To the well setup living room and bedrooms. The fireplace downstairs was very inviting to the multiple choices for bath soaps, they had it all!! I still can’t get over the cool chicken coop, the chickens were so friendly and not loud. They sounded like cat purrs when you walked up to the fence lol. Lastly, this location is very accessible to everything, I’d give them a look if you are coming to Minneapolis, we will look them up next year. 
Thank you, from our family to yours, this was the home we needed given the reason we came to visit.

Alex was an amazing host. Super friendly and welcoming! He gave us a tour of his beautiful garden and even offered a basket of fresh eggs from his pet chickens, which was such a nice gesture! The place was lovely and felt just like home.

name: Cabin/ Condo #310 off Mille Lacs Lake in Isle, MN
description:
4 BR with Loft, located on the Thaines river which leads to beautiful Mille Lacs Lake. Spacious and fully equipped kitchen, living room with gas fireplace, deck with gas grill, large flat screen TV and air conditioning. Located at a modern resort, McQuoid's Inn that offers all the amenities of home. We also have launch boats, atv and side by side rentals, canoe rentals, snowmobile rentals, and more. Additional 3% resort fee due at check in.
There  is a fee of $25.00 per night, per pet.

detailed_reviews.comments: We had a great time! We will be back!
Tim was a great host, very responsive and accommodating for my husband and his friends on their trip. We definitely recommend a stay at his place!
Fun for big family gatherings

The cabins at McQouid's Inn are perfect for your next family get-together, bachelor party, or big group gathering. Plenty of space, nice beds, cozy vibes, and a pretty good kitchen and grill for your cooking needs. The deck and backyard space was perfect for chill vibes, late night fires, and more. Just don't forget to bring bug spray! The mosquitos were relentless!

Tim was very helpful in helping us plan our stay! he gave us lots of local recommendations and answered our many questions quickly! the cabins we stayed in were very clean and well equipped with everything we needed!

Wi-Fi never worked and they were never able to fix it or give us a refund. It was a duplex and the PARTYNEXTDOOR was a big group of men lots of drinking and a huge fight at 2:30 AM that woke us all up. Noise from the highway pretty loud.
It's part of a resort.  The internet was spotty.  It was clean.  Not a lot of communication was needed.  The resort management were helpful with anything that was needed.
Great place, great location, and great price.  What else can you ask for?

name: Cozy Upstairs
description: Beautiful owner-occupied house located in Howe area: centrally located with 10 minutes away from downtown Minneapolis, downtown Saint Paul, UMN, University of St. Thomas and many bars and restaurants within walking distance. Enjoy the peaceful neighborhood and a nice walk to the Mississippi George Regional Park!

detailed_reviews.comments: Very inviting home in a beautiful area. Zhao was very accommodating and helpful. I recommend this place if you're looking for a quiet place with easy access to the cities!

Zhou was amazing from the first moment till the last moment! 
The place was exactly like the picture. It was clean and beautiful. Highly recommend this place to anyone! The surrounding area is quit and you can access public transportation very easily.
房东互动：fantastic

My stay with Zhao was comfortable and relaxed. Communication was clear and enjoyable. The home is open and welcoming. I particularly enjoyed the access to the Mississippi River Gorge for hiking and bird watching.

A peaceful, quiet, comfortable establishment. It was close to where I wanted to be while I visited family and the neighborhood was easily within walking distance to points of interest. 
While! I did not take advantage of the common areas of the hous, my assigned areas were comfortable and clean. 
Access was easily found from the command area.

Way better than the pictures and description. Such a beautiful peaceful location. I stayed upstairs which was more like a suite with its own bathroom. Everything was clean and comfortable, a walk-in closet, I mean come on it was fantastic!
There are two other units on the first floor that share the bathroom, I didn’t have a need to use it. Kitchen is available as well as laundry facilities, coffee, den, and dining room. Everyone was quiet and respectful, such a peaceful setting.
Exceptional location just north of 38th which is an amazing street to explore for food. I could walk to the light rail, bus 23 is very convenient if you don’t want to walk. Host was gracious and kind, Internet was rocking. The perfect stay. 
No TVs in the bedrooms, but I like that. Some people don’t, that’s why I mentioned it. Always best to manage your expectations. This is a peaceful, respectful, safe setting.

Zhaojun is an excellent host! We felt right at home and enjoyed the privacy that the upstairs provides. Zhaojun was very friendly every time we interacted :)
We will definitely be back.
The attic apartment was larger than expected, clean, well lit, and charming.
Absolutely a good choice when we stay for a swimming meet. Quiet and clean, would stay again in the future.
Great host and great space to rent

name: Cigar Lounge Vibes, Bourbon & Razorbacks
description:
✔ 1 King Bed 
✔ Living Area – Two leather club chairs 
✔ Mini Fridge/Freezer, Microwave 
✔ Coffee Bar 
✔ Newly Remodeled Bathroom – Large walk-in shower 
✔ Free Onsite Parking – Hassle-free access
✔ 1/4 Mile from Downtown Prescott – Close to shopping, dining & River

The bourbon bottles in the light installation are decorative only—they’re filled with colored water as part of the room’s theme. As tempting as it may look, it’s art, not an open bar.

neighbourhood.overview:
Discover Prescott, Wisconsin: Where Riverfront Charm and Scenic Delights Converge

Nestled along the picturesque St. Croix River, Prescott, Wisconsin, offers a captivating blend of small-town allure and natural beauty that captivates the hearts of all who visit. Known for its charming riverfront setting and award-winning scenic route, this hidden gem beckons travelers seeking a harmonious blend of outdoor adventures, local flavors, and timeless experiences.

Riverside Tranquility:
Prescott's greatest asset is undoubtedly its stunning location along the serene St. Croix River. Immerse yourself in the calming rhythm of the water, whether you're strolling along the riverwalk, embarking on a scenic boat tour, or simply enjoying a leisurely picnic with the gentle breeze as your companion.

Charming Boutiques and Shops:
The heart of Prescott beats in its charming boutiques and shops, each offering a delightful array of unique treasures. Explore antique

host.name: Megan
host.about:
Hi, I’m Megan! As an Airbnb host with a passion for bold design & unforgettable experiences, I transform properties into destinations.

Every space I host blends style, comfort, and adventure to leave a lasting impression. Whether a cozy retreat or group getaway, I love creating spaces that make every moment unforgettable.

Cheers to adventures in comfort and design! Book your next stay with me, and let’s make it extraordinary.

– Megan

detailed_reviews.comments: Room was very clean and decorated very cute and unique.  Prescott was a great location.

Wonderful place. Looked just as described. Had everything we needed. Clean, beautiful, and peaceful. Was exactly what we needed while in the area. Would definitely stay there again.  Megan kept in touch and was prompt to respond. Definitely worth the price

Surprised on how well they remodeled this place. My wife absolutely loved it. She wants to try all the rooms. Convenient restaurant right next door, that gave us a bag of ice. Prescott is a beautiful town. we will be back

Our stay was OK. The place was very clean and tidy. Easy to find and check in. There is a loud bar/restaurant located right next to the hotel that we unaware of. Megan did not communicate with us at all outside of her automated messages. I messaged her days before our stay, many times on different platforms trying to get an early check in (which was listed as an option on her automated message) with no response. Very disappointed in the lack of communication. Another thing that was very disappointing to us is that this room is supposedly “bourbon” themed, with the description, “Whether you’re preparing a quick snack or a gourmet cocktail, you’ll find everything you need at your fingertips.” There are also multiple photos of full bourbon bottles on the listing which gave us the assumption these could be used by guests. When we arrived, they were all completely empty. There are absolutely no supplies to make a “gourmet cocktail” outside of a few pieces of old ice in the freezer.
The place was perfect and everything from check in to check out was great!
Very quiet area. Lots to do around the area. Would stay there again! Great host!

Had a great stay! Room was very clean and exactly as described. We would definitely stay again. 
However there were a few things that weren’t major issues but would have been nice to know ahead of time. 1)the Arkansas room is VERY close to, basically shares parking with a restaurant/bar. That being said, although we were worried about noise, we didn’t hear a thing even though it seemed very busy one night. 2) Internet was pretty spotty. 3) There is no closet space. Not a huge deal but a couple extra hooks somewhere in the room would have been super helpful. 
Again none of these things are deal breakers, we had a fantastic stay, but just a heads up😊

This place was amazing! Very warm aesthetic, very clean. Loved the added touch of light snacks, waters, and mints. It was all we needed, and the restaurant next door provided delicious menu options! We didn't have any issues with noise coming from the restaurant or traffic nearby. We felt very comfortable here.
There are local eateries very close by with good food/drink options. Next time we come we will come earlier to walk into the main drag and visit the local shops (these didn't pop up on the map for me during my planning stage, so we were unaware that there were shops nearby!).
We did notice that the water takes a really long time to turn warm/hot, so initially we were concerned that it was a one heater establishment and it ran out, but it just needed a good 5ish minutes to run until it got warm/hot.
We would definitely return. Megan and her team have really done amazing things with this place and the theme of different states! Thank you!

I will absolutely be back! The room was comfortable, spacious, had a cute theme that wasn't over the top but made it feel special and fun and the communication was fantastic.  I'm looking forward to 'visiting the other states'.
Great place to stay . Very comfortable accommodation.
The room was very nice and clean, the host was very kind and courteous. The location was great as the driving distance to multiple little shops was within minutes.
Great stay!
Great place, with great amenities :)
easy check in, great communication, clean, nice space
Great location restaurant next door and noise was not an issue safe space lots of things to do nearby.

name: Modern Main Level Studio No Steps By Lux Life
description:
Stay in a one of a kind modern studio unit in the heart of the vibrant West Uptown and SLP area.

This wheelchair accessible studio is on the main level and is perfect for couples, business travelers, and solo travelers. Includes fully stocked kitchen, coffee bar, 2 workstations, 55" Smart TV, in unit W/D, comfy beds.

The building was built in 2018, studio was newly added in the beginning of 2022 with brand new everything.

We are pet friendly for up to one pet with $50 fee per stay.

detailed_reviews.comments: nice place. and very good host! 5 starts

We loved this place! The unit was safe, safe and well-stocked. We were pleasantly surprised by all the extra amenities including exercise equipment and a stocked laundry room. The hosts were very responsive and very nice as was a staff person who I met when I needing help reconnecting to the wireless network. There isn’t much in the neighborhood in walking distance but we were on a working vacation so we were fine with that. I would say it’s great place for business travelers and couples.

Had a couple hiccups, but Ryan was very responsive and accommodating - so in the end it was a great experience for us.  
I liked the area, layout, and it had everything we needed.   My son thought the inside was ‘awesome’.  The kitchen is great and has everything and very usable.  
Had a very ‘mod’ feel which I liked a lot.  
Not having assigned parking made me nervous at first, and we did have to walk a little, but less than when we stay at Raddison blu.  We always had a space so really it was no issue.  
Overall, it turned out to be a great time for us and we really enjoyed ourselves.
Everything was great.
Buen alojamiento anfitrión muy amable lo recomiendo…
Great stay! Amazing host. Very responsive. Highly recommend
It's  been an awesome experience and I hope we have been just as awesome guests.
Thank you for all that you do. Great overall service.
It was fine

This efficiency was a good deal for the price, and it was clean and quiet.  I chose it partly because it was all on one floor, and it was easy to get into.  There was road construction that made it a bit hard to find (some road signs were down), which wasn't the host's fault, but it's good to know this ahead of time.  Google maps got me there.
Excellent little unit, comfortable and well furnished with all the essentials for a nice stay.

name: Spacious Furnished Townhome!
description:
Plenty of room for everyone in this spacious townhome, centrally located close to downtown and conveniences. Large living room and dining room plus lower level additional tv lounge. Spacious patios and gardens to enjoy. 1-car attached garage. 

Rest easy, you're working directly with Lisa, owner of a local corporate housing company for over 20 years. If this townhome is not a fit, please reach out. We have over 60 properties and are happy to help find the right one!

name: Home w/ Lake Access-3BR-2BA-1 level, Month stay Ok
description: This beautiful 3 bed, 2 bath home home built in 2017 is just walking distance to downtown Elk River. Enjoy the beautiful sunsets with view of the lake and access to dock just a quick walk from house. Paddle board or bring your own boat to tie up to the dock. Walk or bike to the dam to fish, library just up the road, dog park and beautiful beach at lake Orono park just a short walk away.

neighbourhood.overview: Quiet neighborhood tucked back against the Lake Orono

host.name: Ellie
host.about: Hello!! My name is Ellie Lee, my husband Brian and I own and operate FinalLee Home Real Estate out of Elk River, Mn. We are Realtors and investors and take pride in our community. Our goal is to deliver out of this world customer service to our clients and guests. We love adventure and offering vacations that we also enjoy. If we aren’t working you can find us spending time with our daughter Lainey on our boat or enjoying one of our properties!

amenities: Clothing storage: walk-in closet and closet

detailed_reviews.comments: There is a large floating dock overlooking a beautiful lake. The house itself is beautiful and spacious. It contains everything you’ll need for a quick weekend or long term stay. The bedrooms are beautifully decorated and comfortable! Ellie the homeowner is quick to respond and helpful. I stayed for over a month and was sad to leave!
Great place and location. It was nice to throw everything open, and let the breeze come in.

We stayed here for a month! It was great ! Close to downtown elk river and fishing on the lake was our favorite! 
Highly recommend checking out amor ice cream! It’s the best! 
Definitely recommend this air b n b!
Peaceful relaxing stay. All amenities provided. Would stay again.
This house and space were perfect for our  girls getaway time. Ellie was very quick at responding to our questions. We would definitely stay again!
Had a great stay. The house is nearly brand new & is in a convenient location.
Cute, comfortable and very clean. Great for a small family. Well stocked, nice beds, quiet location.

We had a great time at Ellie's house over labor day weekend. We were a group of 4 (was supposed to be 6 but two friends got hit with covid right before the trip) so the house was especially spacious but I think it would've been very comfortable still with all six of us there. The living room is huge and was a great place to hang out. We loved the enclosed patio too. One note about the dock access -- it's a pretty small little dock and covered in duck poop, so not great for hanging out at like we were hoping. Was still a nice spot to take out the paddleboards from though. Would definitely stay here again!
Beautiful clean house thanks
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.  Everything we could have asked for.
Great location and very comfortable set up. Ellie was responsive.

House in Elk River is very nice.  Close to many things including Hiking, golf, shopping.  House has a very nice screened in porch, open living room with large couch for many people.  Beds were comfortable and this is a great house for a visit to family.
Ellie’s place was great! Loved the patio area and the living room.

This house was perfect for our team retreat!  The open floorplan was great for sharing meals and conversations. The countertop and dining table were ideal for spreading out. It was filled with sunshine from the large array of windows, and made it extra cozy.  Ellie was a very responsive host, and very accommodating.
Great location for attending events in the area!

First, let me say that Ellie was absolutely amazing. She was professional yet approachable, and her accessibility made the booking process seamless. Once we arrived, we were astonished at the ambiance and decor. The quaint yet spacious lake house was exactly what our family was looking. The contemporary decor was done tastefully and provided an inviting and spacious open concept. The beds (mattresses) were better than the ones we had at home! Lol The bathrooms and kitchen were updated and more important CLEAN. It smelled great and there was even an enclosed porch with a fire pit! I couldn't have been more pleased with our stay. We even decided to stay longer because we were so comfortable. The washer and dryer, the towels provided, the cleaning supplies, and the spacious garage all made us feel at home while away from home. The host even asked me if i needed anything and honored our request for sugar free liquid creamer! I took the time to write this 5 star review!! We will be back!

We really enjoyed our stay!  The location was great for us and the house was very open and felt like home with a decent space to gather for our family.  The beds were very comfortable.  We had no issues with the home. In floor heating was a plus especially with the time of year we were there.  The place was clean and comfortable would definitely stay again

So for start, Ellie had the place ready for us earlier, clean, ready, shine and warm. When you walk in first you fell in love with the place and you start feeling like home. The walk-in closet on the master bedroom is beautiful, but my favorite part was the king bed, is so comfy I wish I can take with me.
If you need a place for stay,  you should definitely rent Ellie’s house.

Ellie’s place was perfect for our needs. We had 6 ladies for a state bowling tournament weekend. We were all very comfortable and had plenty of space. We had most everything we needed for cooking.. could use a couple more baking sheets/pans but we made do! The place was very clean and organized. Very easy to communicate with and helpful! Thank you for a great stay!
Ellie was amazing and more than accommodating to our needs. She went above and beyond to help us in many ways. I would highly recommend Ellie and her Airbnb properties to anyone.
Great location and easy access thank you

This place was cute and just the right size for what we needed. I did have to reach out to the host for instructions on how to enter the property once we arrived because I never received them after check in time. For the most part the place was well kept, but it was lacking quite a bit in the way of kitchen utensils and cooking supplies. We found there was garbage and food under the couch from previous guests. Then we started to have an issue with ants. They came in under the baseboards in the master bath. We found some ant traps in the closet and used those, but eventually had to buy ant killing spray to take care of it. We occasionally found them in the kitchen as well. The grill needs a major update. The cooking grate was very rusty. We had to put foil down first to cook our burgers. Otherwise, we did have a good stay. We really enjoyed the kayaks on Orono Lake. It was nice to have that so close by. Ellie was very attentive and quick to respond.

Great space for our family vacation. If you plan to do much cooking, be aware that the kitchen is minimally stocked with dishes. (No measuring cups, small number of full size plates and glasses, small fry pan, etc.) 
Also the dock and lake access is located down the block but there wasn’t any information given when we checked in as to where the access was. We walked around for awhile before we found it. If you like to sit on the dock, note that there is no bench or chairs  so may want to pack camping chairs to take with you. We enjoyed swimming and kayaking and traveled to the beach across the lake which was very nice. Overall, it was a nice experience for our family.
Beautiful home. The screened in porch was a small slice of Heaven. We enjoyed our time there.

Definitely will be back next year!  
Beautiful home,  clean , comfortable and great Host! Amazing Place! Thank you!!!

Ellie’s place was fantastic for the family! Felt like home away from home, very centrally located! Easy access to everything! Beautifully appointed rooms and bathrooms, and lots of living spaces, relaxing covered porch with a water view, front porch, bar stool seating— and a cozy couch big enough for everyone. 
And— our hosts were very responsive to any and all questions. 
If and when we come back to Elk River , we’ll be staying here again. It was perfect!
Ellie went above and beyond what a  host is expected to do. I definitely recommend staying in any of her properties. Very clean. Very responsive. Very Helpful.

Very Nice home.
Wonderful community.
Right by the lake.

Perfect spot for our family get-away of six adults, toddler and sweet old husky. Kitchen set up is great for family meal preps and eating together. Multiple gathering spaces allowed for the much cherished time to hang out, play games, and keep our toddler in sight with the open design. Beds were comfy. Very rejuvenating time together. 
Made use of the kayaks and paddle boards. Lake has easy access a short walk to a shared dock down a few stairs. Helpful to have a nearby store for groceries and coffee shop. 
Very warm and responsive communications with Ellie! Would highly recommend!
5 star!
Ellie's place is one of a kind. I would love to go back again and again, I was very satisfied and my guests were also satisfied.

Ellie’s place is a nice Airbnb- it is spacious and clean, easy to get to and get in to. It’s in a great neighborhood close to a lot of things to do. She was very personable and reached out often throughout our stay. The house and beds were extremely comfortable and we felt safe. However, the Airbnb was poorly stocked- we had to go out and buy more toilet paper, no extra blankets, very minimal cooking supplies or simple seasonings like salt. The doors on the bedrooms and bathrooms are missing locks. We also felt like we had to do a lot of cleaning after being charged a significant cleaning fee. Overall good experience, would recommend the home & the area, but hopefully is more prepared for the next guests.
Wonderful home, easily accessible, pet friendly!
Great home!!!! Close to everything we needed. View of the lake at night was perfect!!!
Host was very responsive. I wish the weather had been better so I could have gone for a walk and sat in the seasons room.
Great place to stay, very clean, organized and peaceful. Communication was excellent! Definitely will return
Overall great trip and enjoyed the property. Good quiet neighborhood.

This was a perfect stay! Ellie is an amazing host and we would definitely stay here again!  The house is very comfortable and was a perfect fit for my elderly parents. Ellie did an amazing job making sure we had everything we needed and was extremely proactive in checking in to make sure everything was smooth through out our stay, my only regret was that I wish we would of booked a few more extra days! We loved it! 
Thank you Ellie for the amazing hospitality!

I can't thank Ellie and Brian enough for accommodating my stay. We were so impressed with absolutely everything-start to finish, top to bottom! Fantastic host, amazing property, excellent location.  Cant say enough good things and would stay again any time.  Highly recommend.
Thank you Ellie and Brian!!
Thank you! We had a great time staying at your cute home.

The home was everything as described. I stay in Airbnb's quite often and this property was at the top of the list as far as quality, furnishings, decor, cleanliness, location. The view of the lake was beautiful and ease of getting to the beach area across the lake were very convenient. The openness of the living room/kitchen/dining area made it easy for relaxing and eating. The kitchen was amply stocked with dishes/cookware, etc., and even some condiments if needed.
Bathrooms were clean and well supplied with linens. My favorite spot was the screened-in porch...just to relax and view the lake. (And watch the little chipmunk and rabbit that came up on the deck outside!)
Our host was quick to respond to our questions, which was greatly appreciated.
We were familiar with the area, having grown up nearby, so getting around was simple. Access to stores and restaurants was easy and plenty of them. 
If we were to visit the area again, this house would definitely be one of our choices.

A very pretty place to stay both inside and out.  Would like to have had instructions provided on how to operate the tv.  Also would like to have had direct access to lake instead of walking down the street carrying kayaks and paddle boards.
Ellie's place was very nice, well furnished, and was a great place for our family to stay!
Beautiful place with a lot of room to hangout!
Awesome place. Very well maintained. Great hosts.

name: Retreat in the Minnesota River Valley
description: Quiet, secluded setting in the Minnesota River Valley near Carver. Includes kitchenette. A place to retreat to, rest and just "be". Short drive to the MN Landscape Arboretum and Chanhassen Dinner Theater. Kitchenette and private bathroom included. Guests don't want to leave and want to come back again. A great place to enjoy nature and the outdoors.  Easy drive to the  Minnesota Valley Wildlife Refuge,  Carver Park Reserve, Canterbury Park, Mystic Lake, great area restaurants and shops.

neighbourhood.overview: Very quiet country setting off the beaten path in the river valley, neighbors within walking distance.  A place for nature lovers. This property is surrounded by woods and farms.

host.name: Jayne
host.about: Nature abounds here. Birds, deer, turkeys, etc. We're within 15 minutes of 6 towns - Chaska, Chanhassen, Carver, Jordan, Belle Plaine & Waconia - and various local attractions (restaurants, lakes and parks, Renaissance Festival, Chanhassen Dinner Theatre and the unforgettable Landscape Arboretum).

amenities: Clothing storage: walk-in closet and dresser
Pack ’n play/Travel crib - available upon request

detailed_reviews.comments: We had the pleasure of being Jayne’s first Airbnb guests. Her house was beautiful, the bed was comfy, and the bathroom was spotless. Throughout our short stay Jayne was a great host and was very genuine and kind. Although Jayne was new to Airbnb her hospitality made it obvious to us that she was used to hosting others in her home. We would recommend Jayne’s place to anyone staying in the area!

Incredible views from the back porch, beautifully decorated and clean home, and wonderful host! So many cute little touches from matching robes, to mints in the room, to extra items in the bathroom. We will definitely be back!

A great place! Jayne’s place was super clean. The house comes equipped with everything you might need from a laundry and dryer to a fully furnished kitchen. Jayne is a friendly and accommodating host. 5 stars would stay again if in area.
Jayne's place is wonderful, the location is private with beautiful surroundings. A quaint and tastefully decorated home.  Jayne is quick to respond with the smallest request. Overall a delight!

We had a wonderful, peaceful stay at Jayne's home! 
The house is tasteful, clean, and comfortable, and Jayne's beautifully landscaped garden (with an abundant variety of birds) is worth the visit all by itself. The property backs up on woods with huge oak trees, and her whole property is surrounded by rolling farmland, including small farms with sheep and horses. 
The house is spacious, but the bedroom we were in felt slightly snug with two adults and our clothes, books, etc. It might feel a little closed in for guests who are inclined to keep to their room, but then they'd miss out on the heavenly second floor screened porch, serene living room, gardens, and other common spaces! Next to the bedroom is a very clean and roomy bathroom and laundry area, with counter space and a full sized fridge we were free to use—a big plus.
On top of all that Jayne is a kind, generous, good-humored host. I highly recommend this getaway! THANKS, JAYNE!

Jayne's places wonderful.  The bed was comfy and I got a good night's sleep.  In the morning she had a delicious breakfast set out for me.  She has a lovely 3-season porch that overlooks her garden and the trees between the river and her house.  It was very relaxing.

Jayne’s country cottage is neat and cozy; adequately furnished, well-kept, and clean — the perfect layover for my trip from St. Louis, Missouri to Bottineau, North Dakota!
The zen ambience of the place, the vibrant, mood-enhancing decor; plus Jayne’s warm welcome, exceedingly cordial accommodation, and generous hospitality made my short-but-sweet stay truly meaningful, fun, and memorable for me. 
I would definitely want to stay there again, next time I find my self wandering near the area. 
Thank you, for everything, Jayne!!

Jayne was very welcoming and made us feel at home.  Everything extremely clean and the yard and garden is beautiful.  Location was convenient to the Scott County fairgrounds where my dog nose work trial was being held.  Very quiet location.  I only wish I could have stayed longer.

A quiet, charming place that is beautiful both inside and out. A large bathroom and full size refrigerator available for use along with washer and dryer. Fresh fruit, yogurt, homemade muffins, and coffee for breakfast, eaten on the screened-in porch overlooking a lovely garden. The bedroom was cool and comfortable. Simply but tastefully decorated rooms make one feel right at home. Jayne is a gracious hostess and her friendly, welcoming smile and personality are a treasure. We will be back!
Jayne is a great hostess. Her home is beautiful and immaculate and gardens were amazing.  A soothing sanctuary after a long journey. We felt very much at home.   I recommend this home to anyone!
Jayne is a treasure with special touches that truly makes your stay very special! Jayne has a gift of ministry and love that is a blessing!! Thank you Jayne! Truly felt like with family!!!
Great place to stay with a great host!

This place was fantastic! Everything about it! Jayne was amazing! The location was perfect! Just the right distance at from anything you could want to do! Her home was gorgeous! Very comfortable! Even had breakfast set for us!! Definitely check out for home! You won't regret it at all!!
A well maintained place to stay I recommend it to anyone willing to stay away from the noises of the city

Jayne's home is a beautiful atmosphere and tranquil retreat! Jayne is a Blessing as she exhibits the highest level of professionalism and Love!! Thank you Jayne for the beautiful time sharing You are a Blessing!!!!~
Jayne's home in Carver, MN is an impeccably kept home in an idyllic setting. Jayne is an attentive and caring host who leaves nothing to chance.

Jayne's place sits on gorgeous property in the Minnesota country. We enjoyed the peace and serenity of her home, and Jayne's warm and welcoming personality! It was the perfect stop for my boyfriend, cat, and I as we made our way from NY to WA. I definitely recommend staying here!

Jane was the best hostess you could ask for and we look forward to vacationing in Minnesota again and staying with her again. It was definitely a bed and breakfast, with light breakfast fare and unlimited coffee and bottled water. We own a furnished rental listed on AirBNB and picked up some tips to make our place better too.
Jayne’s place is just perfect! We had everything we wanted! Jayne is friendly & welcoming! I highly recommend this accommodation!
You will NOT be disappointed! If you are searching for relaxation but close to shopping and fun, this is the place to stay!Jayne is the perfect hostess!

Thank you Jayne for the great stay! We loved your beautiful home, especially the screen porch.  I HIGHLY recommend Jayne's home. She's very friendly while still respecting your privacy.  A quaint home in a beautiful setting.

Jayne's an exceptional hostess, her home is open and inviting. The room was beautifully furnished and  very comfortable. Jayne adds thoughtful touches throughout the shared space so you feel safe and right at home.
Jayne’s home is beautiful and she provides the best hospitality.
Super sweet place out in the country.

FANTASTIC value
FANTASTIC value
FANTASTIC value
Nice (outdoor) cat
Fun (outdoor) chickens
GREAT host
Breakfast every morning
Comfortable bed
Ceiling fan
Plenty of parking
Full size guest fridge
Laundry option
Clean bathroom next to bedroom.
I don’t know how to describe Jayne’s country home — the shared spaces all look like Magazine covers.  I was really really impressed.  A welcoming and relaxing vibe is what it felt like.  The cornfield on the other side of the road was a bonus.

Would highly recommend Jayne's Airbnb to anyone! Very quiet, lovely home with exceptional hospitality!!
Missy and Kayla
Great Time. Great place. Great hostess.

I cannot say enough great things about Jayne and her beautiful home. The best hospitality, fantastic value, excellent communication, and she is the sweetest person on the planet. Serene cottage with your private bedroom and bathroom in the basement and a lovely breakfast from Jayne each morning. You will regret not booking with her. She is the best ❤️
Amazing hostess and house! Location is approximate to everything and the house is spectacular. Very kind and welcoming, recommend 11/10!

Jayne's accommodations were just right for us! I had planned a solitary getaway which turned into late arrival and additional guest due to a family illness. Jayne was so hospitable, kind, and patient. I will most certainly return for that solitary retreat!

We enjoyed the peaceful surroundings, comfortable bed, and great hospitality at Jayne’s. Within a 15 minute drive from great restaurants while staying in a secure and beautiful rural space. The best of both worlds!
Jayne was a wonderful host, and the stay was exactly what I was lookng for.
Jayne is a fabulous host with a beautiful home. Our stay couldn't have been better!
Jayne's place is sparkling clean, a place for everything and everything in its place.
I had a great stay at Jaynes.  It's a cozy, welcoming house in a quiet area; the bed was comfy, so slept well every night.  Really enjoyed the bird watching from the kitchen window!
Even though this is my first Airbnb experience, Jayne took to the next level with her amazing hospitality. I really felt it was my home too. Jayne is simply awesome

Jayne has a lovely home! It's comfortable and  peaceful with  natural beauty out each window. I extended my stay from one weekend to an additional week - a total of 10 days. It was a great environment for me to rest and enjoy. The house is about a mile down a gravel road - a picturesque setting. The screen porch off of the sitting room  overlooks gardens in the backyard and woods behind the house. A great spot where I will spend time on a future visit in warmer weather!   It's one of my favorite aspects of the house. Guests have access to nearly the whole house -  kitchen, living room, sitting room and more. The roomd are very comfortable  and  aesthetically pleasing. Be sure to ask to buy fresh eggs from her chickens for a good breakfast! The Minnesota River Valley is a beautiful area  just a few minutes away. Jayne is a lovely host! I hope to return again.

Jayne has a lovely home. It's comfortable and so peaceful with  natural beauty out each window. Inside and outside it's aesthetically pleasing.
I enjoyed my stay! I extended it from one weekend to an additional week - a total of 10 days. It was an easy environment for me to rest and enjoy. The house is about a mile down a gravel road. The setting is rural  and  picturesque  with woods and flower   beds and chickens. The screen porch off of the sitting room looks into the trees  and overlooks the lovely backyard. On a future visit, in warmer weather, that will be my favorite spot!  Be sure to ask to buy fresh eggs from Jayne's chickens for a good breakfast!

Not only was Jayne a perfect host who went above and beyond to make us feel comfortable and welcome, her place is absolutely stunning both outdoors and indoors. It was actually our favorite place we have stayed. The rooms were all extremely comfortable and beautiful to be in, and the back screened in porch was awesome. Would definitely recommend and would definitely stay again!
Jayne' s home is a beautiful quiet restful space. Had a lovely 3 night stay.
Jayne is warm & inviting- her home is beautiful.  I enjoyed working in the screened in porch & listening to the birds.    The breakfast & coffee were a very nice touch.  It was a great stay!
Jayne’s home is clearly a labor of love and definitely the place to stay when you’re visiting the area! So much attention to detail and Jayne is such a kind and hospitable host. Highly recommend!

Great to stay at Jayne's place.  I enjoyed playing the special piano and going for a nice long walk on the country road.  Amazing how much I benefitted from the quiet time out there.  I appreciate how Jayne communicated with me.  Good to have a guest fridge for storage.

Hemingway once wrote a short story entitled, "A Clean, Well-lighted Place."  And that applies to this airbnb.  In addition, we can add homey, wonderful amenities, Americana decor, friendly, and comfy.  Great spot, great hospitality, great value.

If you're looking for a secluded and cozy place with a bed and breakfast feel, this is the place for you. Very clean, homey, hospitable, quiet yet still close to lots of activity - this is the place if you're looking for somewhere to get away. Kudos to Jayne for being an exceptionally kind host.
Everything about this experience was positive!

The location was perfect for a retreat I was attending in Jordan.  The house is adorable, clean and very homey.   Jayne is the perfect host. I look forward to returning for this summer for some quiet time. Who needs to go north. This place is gem.
Great place to stay, wonderful host , beautiful country setting.

Jayne has been such a blessing to me.  I feel like I am going home every time I stay with her.  She is so hospitable and the surroundings are so peaceful.  I love watching the birds as I am drinking my morning coffee.  I feel comfortable staying there by myself or traveling with my husband.  I didn't get to write a review the last time because the website was having issues, but I have stayed there several times as I visit my father close by.  Jayne has truly been a huge blessing to me...and she is a great writer.  You should check out her book on amazon!
Great place to rest and recharge.
Jayne is a fantastic host, we loved our stay. Her house and property is beautiful. You can tell Jayne enjoys hosting others.
Highly  recommend!

Quiet and restful with lots of room in bath and bedroom.
Tremendous value.
Beautiful home and property, birds, flowers, and country and within 20 minute drive of several small towns.
Amazing place full of peace.
This place is an amazing Airbnb, Jayne makes the stay feel like your home away from home!
It's a beautiful place to stay and Jayne is a wonderful person and shares her home. Would love to stay again.
Great little hide away off the beaten path of traditional Minneapolis/St. Paul area.  Beatiful home and gardens along wonderful hospitality!  Hope to return one day.
Jayne's house is an amazing place to stay!

Jayne is an amazing host! She is great with communication and knows how to take care of her visitors. She has a useful guide book to help you know what to do in the area. Her attention to detail and gracious personality enables her guests feel right at home! I will definitely refer her place to friends and family :)
A peaceful environment full of country charm at it's best.  Comfortable and relaxing environment. Gracious host.

WOW! When we first stumbled upon this home, it seemed almost too good to be true. There must be a catch! But everything was perfect. Quiet and relaxing home nestled in the Minnesota River Valley, including views of the woods, birds, and wildlife. It also feels close to many attractions, including restaurants, coffee, and much more. Jayne is the most thoughtful, gracious host. We'll be back for sure!  - Tim & Kelsey
Jayne was fantastic and very accommodating for my weird travel schedule. Very happy that I got to stay at her home.

This country get-away is nestled along a gravel road  and is perfect if you're looking for a peaceful setting to relax. Jayne has a wonderful garden to investigate, along with a few critters like chickens and frogs, etc. An awesome place to "unplug" and re-center.
We had such a lovely time in this location. So beautiful and not a kinder host!

Jayne was a great host! Whenever I messaged her, she replied within the hour, which was great for answering my questions! She found out my fiance's birthday was during stay and even left a cute birthday cake and candle for him. She really goes the extra mile for her guests! :)

Jayne has been such a blessing to us.   We stay here every time we go to visit family.  What I love most is knowing that I can travel without my husband and have a safe place to stay.  I love the abundant wildlife that we can watch and the bedroom and bathroom are very convenient and comfortable.
Jayne kept in contact with me and was very kind even when my schedule changed.   As I was new to Airbnb she was very helpful with the whole process!

Jayne's place was perfect for us. We were thinking about staying at a local hotel, but I'm so glad we didn't. This was a much better value – the bedroom was clean, comfortable, and quiet; the bathroom was spotless and big too, and just a few steps from the bedroom. Jayne was a great hostess who went the extra mile with extras: coffee, fridge, easy come-and-go access. I really think this is what it looks like when an Airbnb rental does it right: plenty private but we still had personal access to the host when we needed it. I highly recommend it.
Jayne was kind and helpful, had a lovely home, and was worth the price!
Jayne is so nice, and her house is perfect for anyone who wants to be close to the cities, but likes it quiet and peaceful. 10/10 recommended.
We love staying with Jayne. Make sure that you drink your morning coffee in the kitchen.  The birds and squirrels are so wonderful to watch!
you can expect a friendly host, a very clean and accomodating place to stay, a lovely country location, farm animals nearby, a friendly outdoor kitty and peace and quiet and ease.

A lovely retreat from the city tucked into farmland and a bend in the river. Jayne is a gracious hostess whose kindness made my weekend stay a true pleasure. The space is quiet and offers all of the amenities needed, plus a wonderful garden setting. I only wish my weekend plans hadn't been so filled with family and friends, rediscovering parts of Minnesota I'd once loved. You'll be treated to your own entrance, space that is private and all of the amenities you'd expect from an Airbnb quality experience. I'll be visiting again.

If you want to have a get away from the hustle and bustle of the cities...this is your place. You feel calmer as you drive there. The property is a beautiful sanctuary and Jayne is a wonderful host.....providing all you'll need to make your stay very comfortable. You won't be disappointed.
Lovely, clean and quiet room in a country setting. The private bath was well stocked and the bed was comfortable. Jayne was a welcoming and kind host and I would definitely stay with her again!

Our accommodations and the setting exceeded our expectations. 
Regarding the price, this was a tremendous value .
Very nice home in a quiet rural setting.  This property is my first choice when I am visiting Minnesota.

Jayne’s home is absolutely amazing. It’s clean and quiet. Everything you need is there and communication with Jayne is superb and she responds quickly. Inside and out Jayne’s home is great. You will not go wrong staying here.
Jayne was a wonderful host! She communicated with my family and made the stay so comfortable. My daughter said it was like staying at her grandma’s house. ❤️❤️❤️

Hi Jayne,
Enjoyed my visit to Carver and loved the opportunity to stay at your place! I really enjoyed the peacefulness at your place and appreciated everything being ready for me when I arrived! 
Justine
Every time I stay here, I am reminded of how fortunate I am to be here.  Jayne is a great host.

Jayne was an amazing host and the property was gorgeous. She is very knowledgeable of the area and provides you with great suggestions on where to go and where to eat. The place is out of town enough to have those wonderful quiet nights but close enough where you're not driving very long to get to town.
Great place to stay! Friendly and helpful host! Definitely want to come back again soon!

The place was clean, quiet, and private! It was perfect for the two of us, and the private kitchenette and big bathroom were great. We felt very safe and comfortable and it was an easy place to crash during our Renaissance Festival weekend. Jayne was very welcoming and communicative.

Jayne is the perfect host: kind, communicative, clean and accomodating. Her house is quintessential urban Americana. With the autumn leaves changing, the dried corn stalks and the red barns dotting the landscape, her beautiful yellow home and its location was something right out of a Norman Rockwell painting. Our room was in the lower level--which isn't usually my favorite--but this was well-appointed, quiet, clean and comfortable and came with our own bathroom, full-sized fridge, microwave and Keurig. We stayed with Jayne to attend the Minnesota Renaissance Festival (conveniently 20 min away), but it would be a lovely place for a couple's retreat, too. Can't recommend it highly enough!

Jayne was very responsive and accommodating which we appreciated!  The place was very clean and just as it was described. Our only regret is that we didn’t stay long enough to take a walk to see the Fall colors.
Jayne is a welcoming & cordial host. Great communication.
Jayne lives in a beautiful area and her property is beautiful inside and out. It is an easy drive from the city. Her place is clean and pleasant!
This is a beautiful area. It is a cozy place to stay.

I was initially hesitant about staying at a host-occupied property. But Jayne quickly dispelled those fears—basically by anticipating all my travel needs. She is like a wait staff at a fine dining place: she takes care of your needs without you asking, and with you barely noticing her presence. She was very unobtrusive, but happy to chat when approached. The property itself is magnificent, peaceful, and remote. Highly recommended!
Jayne was a fantastic host. I did use lyft/uber for transportation, and the driver's were a little fussy about the gravel road, but other than that everything was as described and an A+ experience.

I would definitely recommend staying here. It's quiet, beautiful, and Jayne is so friendly and helpful.  The gardens are just lovely!  And it is a little gem of a place in the country, but still close to the city and Arboretum.

I originally booked for 6 nights. But then it was so great I stayed for 9. And then 2 more (11 total). Jayne was born to be an Airbnb host. She is extremely personable, welcoming and friendly but not the least bit intrusive or invasive. The space was very private and larger than I expected. The laundry room was a huge bonus as my stay was so long and I had a child with me. Coffee and Keurig, bottled water provided, which was a nice touch.  I am quite picky but I must say her home was perfectly clean, with good quality towels and soft linens and I had zero complaints.  It is in the country so expect a VERY quiet environment surrounded by gorgeous gardens and flowers. I saw hummingbirds every day on the patio, which was a real treat!

I drove up to Minnesota for a friend's surprise bday party and wanted something close to Excelsior. Jayne's space provided me with an open country feel with an easy 20 minute into Excelsior.  My GPS easily found Jayne's beautiful home.  The bedroom is in the lower level; providing a dark and quiet space for a restful sleep.  The room is  comfortably furnished w refurbished antiques and its own bathroom with shower and kitchenette area.  Jayne's space was spic-and-span clean, neat and ordered - it was wonderful!  I enjoyed time on the large porch surrounded by well manicured and blooming gardens .  I stayed for just a night on this trip and look forward to a longer stay in the future.  Jayne was exceptionally friendly, accommodating (as I asked and was granted an early check in) and delightful!  THANK you Jayne :-)

Jayne’s home is in a rural setting, quiet and peaceful. She has a beautiful flower garden and her property is well kept. Your area is clean and comfortable. I enjoyed my time there and you will too.
Jayne is a gracious host, responds quickly and enjoys conversation plus has many recommendations for things to do.
Just a great place to stay.

Exceptional... of the desire to live. Everything as described, Jeane is helpful and makes you comfortable. In addition, there is Mimi (your cat) who always asks for affection. It goes perfectly with Jeane's life. I definitely recommend it.

Beautiful home and grounds. She introduced herself and showed us where the kitchenette, bathroom and bedroom. We were impressed by the beautiful landscaping. Flowers. Trees. Hummingbirds. Quiteness of her home. We were able to unplug and unwind.  Nature all around. I have missed the sounds of crickets. Birds. Frogs etc in the nighttime
serene neighbourhood to get out of the city. great host, friendly and approachable. highly recommend

Nous avons passé 3 jours extraordinaires chez Jayne, difficile de quitter son logement. Le lieu est calme, paisible, un véritable havre de paix à quelques minutes en voiture de Minneapolis. Nous avons pu profiter du porche et du jardin pour nous ressourcer, il y a de magnifiques promenades et randonnées aux environs pour profiter de la nature. Jayne est d’une gentillesse incroyable, c’est un plaisir de discuter avec elle et d’échanger, moi qui aime discuter avec les hôtes et échanger nos expériences.
Le logement était plus que parfait, confortable, Jayne pense à tout pour que le séjour soit agréable et qu’on ne manque de rien.
J’ai envie de revenir dans le Minnesota juste pour passer quelques jours de plus chez Jayne.

I stayed at Jayne's place for 6 days.  It was everything described in the Airbnb information, and Jayne is worthy of the SuperHost designation.  I was there to visit my niece and her family who live in Chaska and nearby.
    Jayne gave me a lot privacy but was available if I needed information.  We took a walk around her beautiful garden, and one night sat on her front porch and chatted while rocking in rocking chairs.  She anticipated my needs but didn't force anything.  
     My bed was very comfortable, and there were convenient drawers and electrical sockets.  The area for coffee was large with a refrigerator and microwave and a couple of counters.  The bath had great fluffy towels and was very clean.  
     The cost was very reasonable for all that was provided.  Jaye works hard to make the guests feel at home and comfortable.  I will stay there again when I am in the area.

Jayne’s home was a wonderful place to stay for the weekend! She was so communicative, friendly, flexible and welcoming. I felt comfortable and peaceful. Minnesota is such a beautiful place to visit. I give Jayne my highest recommendation!!

I liked the place and nearby surrounding a lot and it was smooth check-in. I highly recommend this place, if you are looking for close to nature, peaceful and fresh air , you should checkout this place is for you🙂

Jayne was the perfect hostess. A perfect mix of giving one space and being near by if you wanted company. I highly recommend Jayne place. Her home and gardens are stunning. Jayne will go above and beyond to make you feel welcomed and settled. 
I especially enjoyed sitting on her deck watching the humming birds with coffee in hand. 
I enjoyed having the opportunity to know Jayne.
Thank you.
Beautiful grounds and house, especially good in nice weather.  About 15 minutes drive to most cafes and restaurants. Jane was a great host.
Jayne’s country setting is quiet and beautiful. Our accommodations were squeaky clean, and Jayne was very accommodating and friendly!
This was my second time staying at the place. It’s peaceful, fresh air and nice surrounding area. I would highly recommend to consider this place if you are planning to visit Minnesota.

What a gem! Truly enjoyed the opportunity to stay at a quiet Airbnb, especially after a busy and social conference that brought me to town. The lights in the bedroom were perfectly dim to set the mood to wind down at the end of the day. Loved the small touch of chocolates and the natural light upstairs is wonderful! Wish I could have stayed for another day with no plans other than enjoying the peace of the area. Recommend for anyone looking to have an entire downstairs to themselves in a cozy environment!

Love Jayne's place
 Perfect 🥰 for a couple to spend a couple of nights. Very quiet and peaceful 😊
Thanks Jayne's for your place!
Peaceful place in the country with beautiful surroundings.   I wouldn’t hesitate to book again.
Jayne has always been my go to place whenever I needed to visit my father.   A few things have changed over the years,  but it has always been a safe,  peaceful place to lay my head down at night.
Jayne’s yards and the space around it were lovely! She is very responsive and takes great pride in being an excellent host! We appreciate such a wonderful stay!
we had 3 nights there and it was very peaceful. Beautiful garden and home. Jayne was wonderful. The setting is in the country away from all the noise. Loved it. Thanks Jayne!

Jayne is a lovely, friendly and welcoming host. She helped me with my bags. She explained everything very well, so that I had no questions. The serenity of her home is just what the soul needs. I would go back there easily.  She is also very kind. It was a joy being there.
Staying at Jayne's home was peaceful, and Jayne is an outstanding host.  I would definitely recommend her airbnb to anyone!
Jayne is very nice and her place is clean and quiet. It’s a beautiful house in a gorgeous country setting.

Excellent host, understanding and accommodating 
, beautiful clean place.
Great place in the country to relax at night while I worked that week.

Jayne’s place was very peaceful, cozy, welcoming, beautiful, and restful.  Jayne had a great mix of being friendly, interested, accessible, and helpful.  The bedroom had lovely decorations…bird paintings, beautiful lamps, and antique wooden furniture.  The kitchenette and bathroom were spacious and very clean.  
I’d love to come back and spend more time here and check out the local attractions.

Quiet, welcoming haven in a beautiful setting. Lovely private bathroom and kitchenette area (with good coffee!) Clean and comfortable bedroom with homey touches like robes. Even enjoyed the sunrise from my bedroom window in the morning, and experienced incredible bird-watching from the porch after a long day. The sweet host was there if you needed her, but care was taken to make sure the space felt like your own. 
Looking forward to returning!

I had a wonderful peaceful stay with Jayne. I worked throughout the day, but sleep peacefully and awoke to the birds singing everyday. The description met the actual, but being in the reality of it is even better.

Jayne’s place is gorgeous!!! I loved staying there. It’s so incredibly peaceful and the surrounding landscaping is just stunning. I wanted to stay for so much longer. Jayne was very friendly and proactive with communication. I appreciate her patience with my late arrival! I would definitely request to stay again if I’m in the area 💖

host.name: Yuyang
host.about: Hi

detailed_reviews.comments:
I liked my stay.  The room and bathroom were clean, along with the rest of the house that I accessed.  Nice & quiet, possibly because there were no other guests in the place.  The neighborhood was also quiet & pleasant.  I could park my car in the garage which I liked.  Tang Tang was extremely helpful, showing me the way to the Univ. area which I had to go to several times over two days.  My continental breakfast was cooked up and served in an orderly & expeditious manner at the forewarned early time of around 8:00 a.m.  It was perfectly fine.

I would recommend the place and the people managing it to anyone interested in my opinion.

I had a lovely time with a delightful Chinese couple.  They spoke very limited English, but Tang arranged for all of my needs to be met.  Their daughter took me to the grocery store which was great as I did not have a car.  I enjoy meeting and learning about other cultures, so this was fine with me.

Unfortunately did not got to meet Tang Tang but she made arrangements with her boyfriends parents to furnish eyes to get into home. Although there was a language barrier they were as nice to us as possible. Did everything in their power to make us comfortable. Made tea for us the night we checked in. Also had breakfast ready for us in the morning . Tang even provided tooth brushes for our use. Very convenient location for those wanting to check out The Mall of America with it's 520 stores ! Thanks Tang
We had a great time living in this house. The couple are very nice; the room is clean and comfortable. They also gave us some useful suggestions about our trip.

We had a lovely stay at Tang Tang's house. The bedroom was clean, the bed was comfy and the neighborhood was soooo quiet !
I would totally recommend this place. Even if Tang Tang's parents did not speak english, it was easy too understand each other with signs :o)

Tang Tang is very nice, easy to reach, available and very helpful.  Her parents are very kind and very accommodating. The house is on a quite street, very calm surroundings, and very close to the airport.
I would recommend staying at Tang Tang place.

Tang is very easy to deal with, and she is highly responsive via email. The home is in a quiet, and peaceful. Room has a mini fridge, and is clean and comfortable. Bath right outside bedroom door! Located in pretty, and convenient part of town, Richfield. Loads of shopping, restaurants, and cafes close by. Walking distance to a park/lake called Wood Lake. Nice walking/running trail around lake through the woods. Really enjoyed my stay here, I would definitely recommend, and stay again! Thanks Tang! Sincerely, Bruce

I enjoyed a very comfortable, stress free stay in this residence! Tang's family were very accomodating to my changes in arrival and needs for breakfast. A colleague of mine and I were attending a three day intensive training at Bloomington Embassy Suites, just a few miles away. It was very restful to return to quiet but cheerful, home to rest and prepare for the next day. I would recommend this airbnb residence without qualification. I thank Tang and her family very much.
We were well received and taken care of. It is located not too far from the airport which made it nice for us to get to the airport in the morning.
Great place to stay. Centrally located with very friendly host family.
We had a good stay with Tang. She was helpful in every way. This house is located close to the Minneapolis airport which made it very convenient for us.

We had a wonderful visit and really enjoyed our time in Minneapolis. Tang's is a short drive to Eat Street and not far from the Mall of America. The place was very clean and breakfast was provided every morning. Also, Tang was very easy to get a hold of when needed.
We had a great stay and look forward to staying again!

Everyone in Tang's family is lovely and kind.  She doesn't live there, and the language barrier can seem hard to manage (especially for someone new to air bnb), but then you realize that true warmth and hospitality can always be understood.  I definitely recommend this listing!
I had a great two weeks stay at this house.  It was above and beyond my expectation.  The owner is very nice and made me welcome.  The house was clean and comfortable.
We felt very welcome and had a wonderful experience.
It's very nice stay here, let me feel like home, I will come here again and again, I also recommend my friends to stay here when they are in Minneapolis。

My 3 night stay in Richfield was overall a pleasant experience. This house is located in a homey neighborhood. Great place to just walk around if you're waiting to get picked up or if you just want to explore. Tang's Uncle & Aunt who live in the house were very joyful and hospitable even though there was a language barrier. We were able to communicate well with just the basics. They really give you your space and let you do your own thing. They provided cereal and tea for breakfast. The Aunt and Uncle asked if I was cold at night and I told them it was. They immediately adjusted the temperature in the house. You can make the adjustment yourself which is located right outside the room.

I enjoyed staying with Tang's family. Her uncle and aunt were excellent hosts and took good care of me. I had a good and calm experience during my stay in the 'beautiful house rental'. The house indeed was very beautiful. I hope I can stay here again during my next visit.

So-called "Beautiful House" looks nothing like the photo.  It's in a lower-middle class suburb of Minneapolis called Richfield.   The home was cluttered, with a Fisher Price pool table in the living room and some odds and ends on the dining room table. I never actually met Tang Tang, just an older couple who did not speak English.  The room was a small bedroom, clean and neat.  However, the bed was hard as a rock.  Our bathroom tub's finish was worn down and looked grimy. At 1:45 am, someone started running the washing machine downstairs. The tumbling of the machine was so loud it woke up both my husband and me, and kept running for an hour.  Needless to say, we did not get any sleep that night.  The next morning, there was no indication of what breakfast was supposed to be, although there was a box of corn flakes, a bowl full or oranges, and a container of instant coffee on the dining room table.  There was no note about anything, just those two older people who seemed nice, but who spoke no English.  We left after one night, even though we paid for five.

I felt very welcomed from the moment I arrived, my fiancé and I were met with open arms and greats smiles! the neighborhood was great and very comfortable. I loved the hospitality we were given everyday and it made us feel right at home. We will definitely be rebooking at this home in the future.

I hope this review helps Tang be more accountable and better look after her listing's visitors in the future. Here's my experience with her: 

1. She was not responsive.
On the days leading up to my visit, she would not reply to my texts or answer my phone calls or Airbnb messages. She did it eventually. But it took me several attempts to get to her and the delay made me worry. 

2. She did not communicate our needs to her aunt and uncle. 
The day before, I told Tang what time I would be there. When we got to the house, no one was home. My sister and I waited outside for nearly 30 minutes, which shouldn't have happened if she had at least told us ahead of time that no one would be there.

3. She over-promised. 
She stated in her description that airport pickups, rides, and breakfast were included. That did not happen and she did not compensate for it. Every morning we only saw a container with cereal and crackers on the table and I had told her twice that I had special dietary needs. The place she listed is fine. Not as clean or beautiful as she made it seem. 

If she can get her act together, your visit will be a lot better and less worrisome.

Tang Tang has a cute home and her aunt and uncle are super nice. This  place centrally located to everything and easy to find. I forgot stuff at her home and she called me to let me know and then offered to mail the items back. Very nice

My friend and I stayed here for a few weeks. That's a great experience for both of us. It is a good, comfortable and clean environment that people can stay for their next trip. I had great experience and funny life with friendly people who lived in the house.
I had a wonderful stay. would definitely recommend this BNB.
