Communication was a issue although there was another guest there who was able to help. We were told laundry was ok to do but we finished two loads and where told 10.00 more for any other loads. the place is nice and quite as well we for the most part enjoyed our two weeks here. The aunt and uncle who live there did go into the room a few times we where not there to open our windows and empty the garbage I felt uncomfortable about this but I also didn't lock the door with the key they gave us  so my own fault as well. ( I want to note I don't think their intentions where anything other then good.) the bus line was close. Their are many shops in the area.We cooked most our own meals there the  however it is difficult at time to know what to expect from the uncle and aunt. One of the times they asked we cook in the garage for a beef roast I made still not sure what that was about. They have stuff in the kitchen you can use and some you cant by way of dishes and cookware. The meals in the ad are no longer being served. I read the reviews from prior so I was aware of this but the ad hasn't changed as of this time. Never did meet Tang. Those that i did meet where all pleasant. I do however think that the aunt and uncle who live there are not happy with having the home invaded by renters from time to time just my perception I could be wrong. There was also a renter in the basement who didn't seem to like others in the house but didn't see her often. Overall I think it was a good stay and I would return.   (P.S. Writing down things will help with talking to aunt and uncle.    They read better then understand spoken English.)

Tang Tang was not at the house while I was there, but when I texted her with questions, she responded immediately by phone, which was very appreciated. Mr. and Mrs. Huang were excellent hosts at Tang's house. Another person who lived at the house translated for them since they only spoke Chinese. Mr. Huang was very good at explaining everything. He got me in contact with a relative in China who was in my field of study. Mrs. Huang made me feel very welcome. She showed me how to make sticky rice balls. 
The house and room were clean. A refrigerator was provided in my room of stay, along with a desk. I had a key for this room. The location of the house was very convenient for me in attending a conference, the Mall of America and other sites. There were restaurants within 2 miles. 
Overall, it was an excellent cultural experience visiting this home and I'm glad that I could stay there. Mrs. Huang invited me to come back. Staying at this AirBNB house enhanced my visit of Minnesota.
Thank you, Tang Tang!
Very nice people good location good place to stay for anyone that is going to the cities would stay there again

Quiet neighborhood, quiet room with our own bathroom just outside our bedroom.  The house caretakers are a wonderful older couple, very welcoming. Comfortable bed with your own personal mini-fridge in the room. Pleasant stay.
Clean, comfortable stay.  Hosts were wonderful couple - nice and friendly.
The listing was just as described.  I had a very comfortable and enjoyable stay.  Thank you Tang.

The room is a bit small but lovely (looks like it used to be a kid's room). The hosts (an elderly Chinese couple) are very nice and friendly. The neighborhood is quiet and safe. It is about 30-40mins from downtown using public transportation and very close to the airport and Mall of America. 

This was my first airbnb trip so I was a bit skeptical at first. It turns out to be a very worthwhile experience. If what you care about is safety and a private place to crash at night while visiting Minneapolis, this is a very good choice.

Even though did not speak English, they were great hosts. They showed me to my room and made sure I was comfortable and had a clean towel and hairdryer. The neighbours are very nice as well and the neighbourhood is safe and clean.
Tang's place was great and comfortable.

Great place to stay. The location is perfectly close to the airport. The neighborhood is really quiet. TangTangs aunt and uncle that live there are super friendly. However, TangTang does not actually live at the house. You have to reach her by phone for any questions or concerns that you have while staying there. She was very responsive to any questions that I hade, just wasn't at the house at all. 
Overall I would choose this place again if I am ever in town.

Although Tang was not entirely prompt in communication, the host experience was good. The location is very far from downtown Minneapolis, but enjoyable for those wanting a quiet, secluded suburban experience. Space was quiet, simple, and clean.
The experience was nice and homey. I was able to use their amenities with no issue and I am very thankful I was allowed into their home!
The neighborhood was very quiet, and Tang Tang was highly responsive to my requests.

Background 
-3 months stay for student  on externship & studying board exam
-Tang does not stay at the house, her uncle and aunt (Mr. & Mrs. Huang) run it
-Room pictured was not the room I stayed in, mine was slightly larger
-Great location and value 
-2-3 other basement tenants 
-as a tenant, I keep to myself, cooked large meal once a week, always cleaned up, compromised and respected the house rules to the best of my ability

Beginning 
-majority of requests granted, kept to myself and house rules were manageable 
-broken showerhead holder which was never repaired despite request
-recurrent moth appearances, problem apparent to host but not dealt with
 
Incidents during stay
-increased electricity bill resulted in host decreasing room lighting causing me to rearrange the room to use desk lamp
-kitchen use was revoked without clear reasoning and was given microwave & toaster oven to cook in room; other tenants were still allowed to use kitchen, instructed to clean dishes in bathroom sink which caused severe clog
-restricted schedule for washroom use as a result of my early work schedule & no use of washroom after 11pm.  Length of shower time was also enforced
.Got blamed for blowing the fuse, probably because I had 3 appliances in my room, a fridge, the microwave & toaster oven.
-room temperature during Fall days were 63-65F but was provided with extra blanket, eventually requested for increase in temperature but was reprimanded for it
-Wifi was broken for ~1/3 of my stay

Positive Aspects
-laundry machines are brand new
-Mrs. Huang is a great cook and periodically prepared meals for me, extremely appreciated 
-I did not get kicked out of the house, also extremely appreciated since I was studying for my test

Bottom Line
-Environment was very tense due to strict house rules
-I tried to adhere to all house rules, be respectful and compromise because I did not want to be kicked out of the house before the rental term ended.
-poor experience resulted from poor communication and solutions leading to more problems
-Great location and value for SHORT TERM STAY ONLY
-They did not kick me out despite clear desire to do so which cannot be overlooked
Host is very good.

Really lovely home filled with lots of culture! I love chinese culture so it was great. The hosts don't speak english but they are very accomodating. They tend to keep it rly cold in the house but if you mention it it warms up rly quick. I hope to stay here again!!
Close to Airport

I have stayed at Tang's place multiple times since I work in Minneapolis from time to time.  Her aunt and uncle, that live in the house, are very kind and respectful.  They make my stay very enjoyable.  I recommend Tang's place without reservation!  Thank you!

Overall pleasant experience bt check your bedding when you arrive. I had thick throw pillows unsuitable for sleeping the first night but didn't realize it until the hosts went to sleep. Also, they seem to not include a top sheet, just a comforter.
Very nice host!
Good place with great value
Great location, friendly family, beautiful area, home was very clean, room was spacey and overall welcoming.
Very nice family! Overvalued accommodation.
Friendly owners

The hosts were very nice even though they spoke little english. The location was very close to mall of america and downtown. The bathroom and bedroom was standard. We needed forks and they provided them to us. If you need water they only have tap water. Overall, it was a good experience living there. Would come again.

the home is very nice, tang manages the listing but you actually stay with her aunt and uncle. They dont speak much English but are very accommodating hosts and the home is clean. They were very understanding with my odd work schedule. I would gladly stay here again.
Just make sure to get in contact with her ahead of time. There is a small language barrier if you want to communicate with the adults.

This is an excellent home with wonderful hospitality. The accommodations were great. Safe and so comfortable. 
I would definitely stay again.
Nice place nice host! I would recommend this place!

Nice cozy, spacious place with a private refrigerator and walk-in closet in the room. The actual occupants of the house are an elderly couple who have slight difficulty communicating in English, but have outstanding hospitality and are genuinely one of the nicest people I've met. Communicating with Tang should be done through phone or text since she doesn't respond to messages within Airbnb. Had slight trouble during check-in process as no one was home, but the stay overall was very worth it. Would recommend!
Good host
Very comfortable place to stay. The room was large and had a fridge inside. Tang was readily available by text and her aunt and uncle were friendly and helpful.

Clean and quiet. I do second the advice to hammer everything out with Tang ahead of time as the people in the house speak little English (super nice though) They have indoor slipper/shoes for you there. Great stay.
Close to the airport. Great and quiet place to stay.
Location is good if you are staying one or few nights

Mr. And Mrs Wong are very warm and nice people. Like previous reviews, they are very welcome and great people to stay with. You will feel home here. Of course if you can speak Chinese is a plus.  Cheers :)
Five stars !

The hosts do not speak English, but they are super friendly and genuinely sweet people. We had to charade our way through conversations. I was offered a few dinners on occasion. The room was basic, but you get your own mini fridge and have access to the kitchen. They were kind enough to let me store my bicycle in the garage overnight. The neighborhood is quiet and centrally located.
It is a very nice place to stay. Bed is big and very comfortable.  The hosts are very friendly and thoughtful.  The bus system here is also much better than I expected.

name: Spacious Cottage Grove Haven Near Downtown St Paul
description:
Furnished Deck | 2,184 Sq Ft | 23 Mi to Downtown Minneapolis

Make the most of your time in the Minneapolis area when you book this family-friendly home in Cottage Grove. This 4-bed, 2.5-bath vacation rental is conveniently located near major cities and attractions, allowing you easy access to everything on your to-do list! Explore the Mall of America, catch a Golden Gophers game, or visit St Paul for dining options, museums, and breweries! Later, relax and unwind in the large backyard.

neighbourhood.overview:
- 5 miles to Cottage Grove Ravine Regional Park 
- 7 miles to Mooers Lake 
- 7 miles to Mississippi Dunes Reserve 
- 11 miles to Carpenter Nature Center 
- 11 miles to Afton State Park, Afton Alps Ski & Snowboard 
- 13 miles to Downtown St Paul: Xcel Energy Center, Science Museum of Minnesota 
- 17 miles to Allianz Field 
- 19 miles to Mall of America® 
- 20 miles to Huntington Bank Stadium & University of Minnesota 
- 19 miles to Minneapolis–Saint Paul International Airport

detailed_reviews.comments:
Will definitely consider this location on our next trip
Thank you
Lynn

Thank you worked perfect for our needs.
Lynn

We loved this stay! There were so many small touches that made this stay feel extra special. From the welcoming tray and note, to the quality of all the amenities, we felt truly like it was a home away from home. The home is pristine - very clean, and full of cushions and throws, artwork and decor that added warmth to each space. We would definitely choose to stay here again, and would recommend to anyone in the area. Additionally, the host is personable, friendly, and responsive. We could not have had a better experience!
Perfect location for visiting nearby family.  Main level bedrooms easily accessible for those with mobility issues. Plenty of room for all!

Good place
Solid furnishings including full kitchen with dishwasher and bathrooms stocked with soaps and hygiene stuff(floss picks, cotton swabs etc.) Plus hair dryers.
Really cool that their were auto night lights activated in bathrooms when lights were shut off
Shower had great water pressue
Bedrooms all had tv's plus large tv in main den/living room
Great house
Worth everything me and my family enjoyed our still for my daughters birthday she was very responsive and very friendly and understanding loved every bit of our stay

Contact with the host was great with clear check in and check out instructions. House was clean and in a good quiet neighborhood with very little traffic. House has 3 bedrooms and 1.5 bathrooms upstairs with a full bathroom and bedroom downstairs. Beware if you are tall the down stairs bathroom has low ceilings. Beds were advertised as queen beds but they are not queen beds they are all full beds. Upstairs bathroom has grab rails in the shower as well as the wall. They are not secured and would not hold you up if you fell they will come out of the wall so if you are elderly beware. Those are the only two cons to the house the stay was pleasant and would stay there again.

The house was nice, and it would have been perfect if we were staying in all weekend. We went to the downtown Minneapolis area - and it was a bit farther away than we realized. The house was tidy - but small details were missed - there was a lot of dust: mirrors, ceiling fans, and windowsills. When there was a plumbing issue - we were offered 20% off of our next stay, and that was a bit disappointing. It would have been nice if a discount or refund was given to the current stay. Overall it was a great weekend.
Our Team was very comfortable!! It's likely we'll teach in the area again and I would certainly reach out for another stay at this location.

name: Clean & comfortable room in quiet neighborhood.
description: My home is located on a quiet cul de sac in a nice suburb just outside of Minneapolis and close to everything. Within blocks of the house, there are restaurants, shops and several grocery stores. My home is kept clean and free of clutter, and you will find the room is as well.

neighbourhood.overview: My home is located in Golden Valley, a nice suburb just outside of Minneapolis and close to everything. There are several restaurants, shops and grocery stores nearby. Public transportation is very close as well. We are within a 2 minute drive to Tenant world headquarters and about a 5 minute drive to General Mills world headquarters. If you are in town on business related to any business headquartered downtown (Target, Wells Fargo etc.) we are less than 15 minutes from downtown with traffic, even less without.

host.name: Ryan
host.about: Hello! I like to travel as much as our guests do. I know what it’s like to want a comfortable place to stay while on the road. I believe that I have done everything possible to create comfortable space for my guests by paying attention to the details and having my listings professionally cleaned and sanitized after each and every guest visit. I look forward to hosting you.

amenities: Free driveway parking on premises – 1 space

detailed_reviews.comments: Ryan’s place is kept clean. The location is close to restaurants and shopping. Ryan’s hospitality was great.

A warm welcome, a comfortable and clean home, plenty of access to extras that hotels can’t touch - you’ll find all of this and more in Ryan’s home. I was more than pleased with the stay and would highly recommend Ryan to future travelers. A+
every good thing you missing at hotels. you find it at Ryan's place.
Nice place
Great place, convenient location, great host. Tremendous value
Ryan has a cozy house in a great neighborhood. He was very hospitable and fun to interact with. The room and bed were great! I'd be happy to come by again.

I stayed at Ryan's house for a week as I relocated to the Minneapolis area. The whole house was in tip top shape as well as the bathroom and bedroom I used. Ryan is very knowledgeable about the area and gave me great suggestions on different apartments. I would stay again.
Great value! Quiet, clean and well organized.
Ryan's place was the perfect combination of comfort, convenience, and value! I would most certainly book again!

Ryan is an excelent host
I would definitely go back again

Place was super clean!!
Easy to communicate with Ryan as he responds SUPER quick. Bathroom was perfect for getting up getting ready and getting on the go.
Great stay
clean, quiet, stylish and functional.
Awesome place to stay!
great stay! comfortable sheets.

Ryan's place was just as described and then more. The house was super comfortable, there were fresh towels, soap, toothpaste and toothbrush available when I came in, the room was super clean, and I had some extra blankets just in case I wanted to use them.
Ryan also was quick to respond every question I had for him, and the chat I had with him when I met him in person was really nice. He's a great host all around and I would totally recommend his house for anyone coming to Minneapolis.
Ryan is a good host
Great place to stay!
Nice location in quiet neighborhood, which is close to downtown Minneapolis

I was flying back to back in the mornings so my interaction was brief with Ryan. He was very nice and so were the other guests in the short time we did have. The house rules are written up for you so everyone can respect each other and there is a curfew for the TV so you won't disturb other people which is very considerate.

This is a great value—a room in a comfortable house on a quiet street just a few miles from downtown Minneapolis and just about everything. Ryan is hands-down the best host I’ve stayed with. Friendly and helpful and will leave you to yourself if you like. Everything is set up for guests, including nice travel touches. More and better instructions for everything are provided in the house manual, and If you forget things there are labels around to help you navigate.
Quick responses, very friendly and professional. Very clean and orderly place. The carpet is heavenly.
Beautiful place and convenient location and receiving personality
confortable, affordable, great lo ation
Great location, very quiet.
Ryan was an amazing host, thank you for being super friendly and hosting such a clean house.
Very well organized, everything set up well.  Easy about extending stay and flexibility.  Keeps everything shipshape.  Good place.
The location is quiet and it's a short drive from downtown. I would stay again!
a bit too cold inside the house but very clean and cozy
Good location. Quiet and Ryan was very hospitable.
Very clean, easy self check in and out, reasonable and appropriate house rules, close to restaurants/gas, easy to find, quiet - would definitely recommend
Great location, quiet neighborhood. Easy access and works great for me.
Easy. Quick. Seamless. No hassle. Straight up. Just what I needed

Ryan's place is extremely clean, comfortable and easy to check-in. Very quite neibourhood. Everything in room is arranged and prepared well before you check-in. Detailed instructions everywhere makes it easy. Would certainly recommend him.

The space and home is precise and organized, which provides confidence in safety and cleanliness.  You will receive your check-in details on the day, the street parking is always open, and the bedroom lock is operated from the inside only.
Great stay
Convenient location
Another great stay. Will be back in a few weeks.
Good size room. Bed felt a little old but still better than new foam mattress. Host is smart enough to have handheld shower head, the only sensible way to bathe and sadly a rarity in Airbnb space.
Good place
Have stayed multiple times, always a great experience.
Good place
Great organization
Completely as advertised.  Stylish public areas.  Sparkling clean everywhere.

The hosts are amazing! Very comfy cozy and peaceful place.  Extremely clean and loved the little extra touches to make the stay great.
You won't be disappointed with your stay!!!
Great place for short stay
Very nice and warm spot I felt like I was back home and slept amazing. Would book again.
Great room, good communication, detailed information and instructions. I will rent this place again!
Room was clean, in a quiet location, and far exceeded my expectations. Ryan is an excellent host, and I'd definitely be staying there again in the future.

Ryan’s place has nice homely touches and amenities that were great! location was perfect and everything was super clean and comfy. Also he was very communicative and had a really convenient check in process. Would stay again!
My room was clean, bright, cozy, and comfortable. Quiet, safe residential neighborhood. Great kitchen downstairs with guests private frig Ryan very friendly. Great value
Nice, convenient place to stay. Friendly hosts.
Personable host, comfortable accommodations. Highly recommend.
Great host! Very attentive and I would recommend for a stay if you're looking for something quick and clean
Very clean and nice place in a safe neighborhood
Great area, and very quiet. Enjoyed my 3 night stay here. Recommended!
Nice clean space, quiet always and nice location!
Nice place
Great spot. Would stay again.
Good location and stay - Communication was great on check in/out, rules.  No issues - quiet neighborhood
Nice neighborhood! Super clean and comfy room with quality mattress i would recommend to any traveler
Super clean house and a very kind host!
The room was nice and clean! I felt very comfortable there and Ryan is super nice! I’d definitely stay at his place again :)
Average place to stay
Came here stayed for a week very nice space. Would definitely recommend.
Excellent value, great neighborhood, quick responses. Second visit and just as wonderful as the first!

Ryan’s place is a perfect fit for me to live for an extended stay (over 4 weeks). Besides all you can expect from an Airbnb home for a few days, you will have kitchen privilege and can do your laundry for a long term stay. Everything is labeled properly so that the guests will know where to find what. The location is an extra plus, easy to access the main throwaways in the Twin Cities metro area. I highly recommend whether if you are a out town visitor or a corporate relo for an extended stay,

Very clean and comfortable stay. Also this place was relaxing , peaceful , & private. There was also a T.V. in the bedroom for the guests personal accommodations. Great place to stay , i had no problems there what so ever. Definitely a property i would book again 👍🏾👍🏾👍🏾👍🏾

My experience was super.  Clean, great quiet location.
I will be staying there again for sure.
Very nice place, in a very nice location, hosted by very nice people!
Ryan’s place has everything you need. Comfortable bed, friendly host, and clean environment.
Very clean and quiet place

Ryan's place is great. This was my second stay at his place and I've already booked my third. Ryan is really easy to contact and he always keeps the driveway blowed and shoveled. looking forward to my next stay.
Ryan's place is the best airbnb I've stayed at. This was my third time staying here, I would definitely stay here again or recommend to a friend.
Stayed here once before.  Perfect again.
Great place in a great location at a great price!
Comfortable stay and super smooth process. Ryan’s got the system down! I stayed for a few nights and will gladly book again when passing through.
Great place! Clean! Very quiet.
Easy, straight-forward, no-nonsense place to stay on a budget. Clean and good amenities for the price. I have stayed at Ryan's twice and I highly recommend to anyone visiting the Twin Cities area.
First Class Host!
Great place to stay! Ryan was an awesome host and super helpful.
Great room!
Convenient and comfortable stay in the Twin Cities

Extremely clean and well appointed.  Quiet location with close freeway access.  Host lives on the premises but is not the least bit intrusive.  Provides great cable TV access on large flat screen TV in comfortable living room, as well as smaller TV in bedroom, for guest use until 10PM quiet time.  
Ryan is a highly self disciplined entrepreneur, who ensures a positive experience for every guest.
Very comfortable

Would definitely stay here again, you get a calm, cozy, clean and peaceful room that you just cant beat the price, highly recommend for anyone that’s looking for a place to stay without breaking the bank. Everything was clean and i will definitely be looking to stay here again next time i come visit, also anyone worried about the fact that your just getting a room, your room will come with a lock thats only accessible to you and you will never be bothered
Very clean and peaceful place, definitely worth more than what I payed for. Will book here again if I have chance to come back Minnesota :)

I give this beautiful home more than five stars along with the hosts !!! They definitely earn the title of being Super host !!! They are so kind and very thorough in their check in process. I love the extra blankets in the rooms !!! I felt so comfortable and warm. I loved every minute of being here !!!
Great place to stay, clean, quiet, friendly host, would stay again.
Overall, pleasant experience. I had some nice exchanges with Maci and the other roommate Mark. Exceptional commute to the Greater Minneapolis area, adequate food storage , and adequate parking.
Good location and everything you could need for a longer stay. Nice home shared with host who is very accommodating. Ryan, thanks for being a great host.
Very good and hospital host who is very knowledgeable about Minneapolis and surrounding areas! Clean accommodation and safe neighborhood as well.
Clean house. Friendly atmosphere.

I would recommend for quite short stay for staying overnights.  The location is in a safe residential area that is centrally located for quick trip to downtown Minneapolis or venturing out to other areas.

Ryan offered a great room, value,  etc. in a great suburban neighborhood that was very quiet at night. In addition to having access to the Three Rivers biking and running trail so close by, you are close enough to downtown Minneapolis and a host of other towns as well.
Ryan's house rules are very detailed,  which is designed to root out any riff-raff. Upon meeting him at length only once, he was genuinely a nice guy.  Ask about his Podcast channel as well!

This is a very convenient location either you’re commuting to downtown Minneapolis or driving your own car. With all the sights, sounds, crowds, stress and what not that comes with travelling and doing business at downtown Minneapolis, the coming home and having a quiet, soothing and comfortable rest and sleep in the evening at Ryan’s place is something that every traveller won’t exchange for. There’s lots of rules and guidelines in the house but all of these make our stay in order!
Good place to stay if you’re alone and appreciate quiet.

Ryan and Maci are great hosts. This was a clean and cozy stay and the quietest Airbnb I’ve stayed at. If you’re looking for great value and a central location in the Minneapolis area this is the place!
Easy to come and go. Nice room. Great place to stay.
A quiet and comfortable place to stay at a convenient location close to a gas station, grocery store, restaurants and a short drive away from almost anything Minneapolis has to offer.
Great location, Ryan is a great host. Really enjoy it here!

Good and quiet neighborhood. The house is beautifully decorated and ideal for short stays, for longer stays it gets a little inconvenient as the shared bathroom is used by two other roommates (was always occupied when I had to get ready for work in the morning) and the guest refrigerator is old and inefficient. Also the hosts did not respond to my questions which contradicted what the other reviews say.
Wonderful quiet cozy place. They are a great couple & wonderful hosts. Thanks for having me.
very nice and very clean home , like my stay , will definitely say again
Clean, comfortable, and very affordable!
Great place to stay. Clean, quiet, comfortable bed and great location for getting around. Thanks so much.
Great location and value.
great place and very comfortable,  would stay again
Ryan's place is plenty comfortable and peaceful. It's only a short distance to many parks and downtown Minneapolis.
Clean, cozy, and comfortable stay !
The room was clean, comfy bed, and very affordable, I’m personally highly recommended.

Ryan and Maci are such wonderful people! Very fun to sit and talk to and very willing to make your stay as easy and comfortable as possible! If I ever needed to stay in the cities again I wouldn’t have to think twice about staying here again, it would be an easy decision! Very quiet neighborhood and a very cozy place to stay! Thank you so much guys for what you do!
What I needed
it was a great time staying at Ryan's place. Ryan and Maci did an excellent job as hosts and made sure my needs were met. highly recommend!
Incredibly accommodating host — overall a great experience at an even greater value.
Affordable and nice Airbnb room for someone who needs a place to stay in Minneapolis/ Golden Valley.
Another stay in the books and another great experience. Will continue to come back as work dictates.

The dwelling is situated in a tranquil and serene locality. The residence and its amenities are precisely as stated on the website. Ryan deserves gratitude for furnishing concise guidance that facilitated a comfortable stay for all lodgers, from check-in to checkout.
Would stay again, great place!
Everything was as described and well-thought out. Comfortable house and attentive host made for a great stay.
Ryan is great host and will visit again.
I would happily stay here.
Nice, quiet, clean.  It's a bedroom at a good price.   Host is friendly.  Rules are specific but make the place function well.
The stay was delightful. He is a very accommodating person who is caring and kind. The neighborhood is super safe and it is relaxing environment.
This was a great place to stay for me as I needed something that was quiet and peaceful. It meant all my expectations.
Great place to stay for my busy few days. Nice bedroom, great facilities. Easy access to uber. Within walking distance of places to eat and stores. Would stay again!
This is the 4th or 5th time I've stayed at Ryan's place and is always my first choice when I visit MSP.

Ryan and Maci are very nice and I am happy with my stay. I felt comfortable and had good rest every night. The home, neighborhood and overall area feel very safe. The directions are clear and the description is accurate. I would stay again and recommend it to others as well. 
Thank you for having me!

As someone who has stayed in many Airbnb’s, I want to give a fair review from my experience - the room was clean, bed was comfortable, the bathroom was clean, and Maci was kind. However, I do not recommend this place. There are truly an absurd amount of strict rules, some of which conflict, to the point that it’s difficult to really exist while staying here. No parking on the street, but also no parking on half of the driveway, even if the rest of the driveway is full. No food in the room, but also no using the kitchen past 10, so if you have a slightly different schedule you’re out of luck. Leave the fan on for 15 minutes after showering, but don’t you dare leave it on past that, and no being in the bathroom longer than 10 minutes to turn it off. This is just the start of the list. And Ryan is not afraid to bang on your door repeatedly while you’re obviously on a call to ensure you’re following these rules exactly. I would never come back. Not welcoming.
Place was Awesome!!! This place is a hidden gem in Minnesota. Ryan and Marci were great hosts. Place was great and clean.

Una fabulosa estancia con Ryan, habitacion y toda la casa en general muy limpia, los anfitriones muy amables, 100% recomendable hospedarse con ellos, yo pase 2 semanas ahi y sin duda me volveria a hospedar con Ryan
Nice place!  Instructions to check in are great, and house rules are clear. The host is also friendly.
Nice clean comfortable house quiet house you can relax and feel just like your home
Nice place
Great host

Ryan's place worked out great for me as it helped me relax after a tough day at work. The way everything is maintained made me feel at home. The amenities and instructions are as detailed as a hotel but homely when you need it.
5 star place need to stay here while in town. Ryan and Maci are awesome!!!!
The room was much cleaner and more comfortable than I expected.
Great place. Quiet and peaceful. Thank you for everything

This is a challenging review to write.  I booked this stay for an employee who was doing training in the area. We tried to keep the host's perspective top of mind, as they are renting out a bedroom in their home, and that can be very challenging.  Ryan is a clear communicator with excellent instructions but definitely comes off with an edge.  The rules are  strict and a bit intolerant.  It is not welcoming at all.  Go to your room, stay there, and do not make noise.  The list of what you are not allowed to do is significantly longer than what you can do.  I can't say I blame him, BUT it did make for a less-than-enjoyable stay.  If you want a place to sleep and don't mind sharing the host's home, this is great.  If you have any downtime and want to be on your phone past 10:00 pm, this is not the place for you.  I would not put another one of my employees here again, but that doesn't mean it wouldn't suit someone else.  Worth the price if you are good with the rules.
I stayed at Ryan's for 2 months, home away from home. Both Ryan and Maci are Great Hosts! they made my first Airbnb experience a good one. If I have to revisit Minneapolis, I will choose their place.
Thank you
Very friendly atmosphere and clean space. Ryan is excellent at communicating and very nice in general. Thank you for opening your home to me
good place to stay
There was a microwave, fridge, AND TV in the room. If and when I revisit Minneapolis, I would love to book with them a second time.

Had a great stay with Ryan and Maci. You can tell they work in the Remodeling industry because their home was very well thought out for accomaditng guests. Great hosts and would recommend their place to anyone thinking of staying.

Ryan and Macy were great.  I was needing peace and quiet at a reasonable price.  I got exactly that. Close to restaurants and convenience/grocery stores.  The rules for the house were common sense.  Be respectful and courteous and you will get that in return.  Thank you for opening your home to me.

Cozy warm room during very frigid week. Can control temp by opening and closing vent in room. Well laid out room. Nice light. Very convenient to have fridge, freezer, and microwave in room. Convenient to have bathroom next to bedroom. I require a locked bedroom- code was easy and lock worked well. Mellow, quiet atmosphere. Thanks!
Great place, great host
Quiet and clean perfect for me.

I will leave 5 stars as it was everything he said it would be, but in all honesty I was constantly reminded I was in someone else’s house, I brought a friend not to stay over, but it was seen as a big problem, but that is just my opinion, in terms of how accurate the description was it was very accurate.
As described clean and comfortable. Would stay again hopefully soon.
As advertised great place to stay
As always a great stay. Enjoy staying there.

name: Private One Bedroom Suite
description: Hidden gem 15 miles south of Minneapolis and Saint Paul in residential neighborhood.  900 square foot private mother-in-law apartment with dedicated entrance and garage parking. Apartment comes with full kitchen, in unit washer/dryer, full bath, stylish living room and bedroom, and all utilities included.  Large windows throughout unit provide beautiful natural light!  Apartment is fully furnished, just bring your suitcase.

neighbourhood.overview:
Close-knit neighborhood with a mix of young families.  Neighborhood started being built in 2014, and most of the families on the block are still the original owners.
These are my lifelong friends, so guests are a direct reflection on how I respect my neighbors.

amenities: Clothing storage: walk-in closet and dresser
55 inch HDTV with Amazon Prime Video, Disney+, HBO Max, Hulu, Netflix

detailed_reviews.comments: Kevin is a great host and is eager to make your stay comfortable. He is proactive with communication and is ready to accommodate any requests. I have enjoyed it here while I am looking for a job and longer term living arrangements. I have extended my stay here and I feel comfortable with that decision.

Kevin is a wonderful host, very attentive and willing to help. The place was clean and was exactly what I needed. Apple valley area has all the needful places to shop with quick access to the city without feeling like you are in a downtown. Parking was a little tricky but I was able to fit my GMC 1500 in the garage so I did not have to worry about scraping and brushing my truck off every morning. I had a great time staying there and it was perfect for the job hunt. I would definitely recommend Kevin and this location.
Very happy with my stay. The place was very clean, and a great deal for what you pay.

I planned for 2 weeks and because it was ideal for me, I extended my trip by a few days. Kevin was quick to respond to any request which made for a perfect stay. I would definitely stay here again and highly recommend this listing.
This unit is connected to the main house. If you want complete privacy and autonomy this is not the place. Owner has control over the heat and A/C.

This was exactly as advertised, great place, location is right where you want to be, close to whatever you need including outdoor parks and activities. Apartment was as pictured, nicely furnished, cozy and had a nice kitchen for such a small place. A friendly host and great location made this a great stay. Highly  recommended!
This was one of the highest quality Airbnbs I stayed at! Book ahead this place fills up!
this was an excellent place for me to stay.  i would be pleased to stay here again anytime.  if it worka out, I may try to stay there again in December.   Thanks so much!!

I loved this place like home for me. Loved the washer/dryer in the spacious bathroom. Comfortable bed, loved the big kitchen and living room. Was perfect. Very clean had all the cookware in the kitchen.
Loved the location. Close to target, parks and quiet neighborhood.
Kevin responded right away when I had questions.
Thank you Kevin
Had a wonderful 2 week stay here! Place is lovely, spacious, clean, quiet, and very comfortable. The hosts were friendly and welcoming. And a spot in the garage! Would definitely stay here again!
Great location, comfy and clean!

name: Terrace Haven:Cozy 5-Bedroom Retreat near Downtown
description:
Welcome to Terrace Haven, a cozy 5-bedroom, 2-bathroom home in a quiet Minneapolis neighborhood. Perfect for up to 10 guests, it’s ideal for business trips or getaways. Enjoy a spacious interior with a touch of rustic accents and a large three-season sunroom. 
Located approx. 25 to 30 minutes from MSP Airport and 10 minutes from downtown, with easy access to parks, shops, and dining. Relax, unwind, and feel at home. Book your stay today!

neighbourhood.overview:
Peaceful neighborhood

MSP Airport approx. 25 to 30 mins

Minneapolis Downtown approx. 10 mins

Lots of grocery stores and restaurants nearby

detailed_reviews.comments:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at this wonderful Airbnb, and I can't recommend it enough! The place was absolutely lovely, with a warm and inviting atmosphere that made me feel right at home. Every detail was thoughtfully arranged, creating a cozy environment that was perfect for relaxation. 
The communication with the host was outstanding. They were incredibly responsive and attentive, ensuring that all my questions were answered promptly. It made the entire experience smooth and enjoyable. 
Overall, this Airbnb exceeded my expectations in every way. If you're looking for a charming place to stay with excellent communication, look no further! Five stars all the way!
We enjoyed our stay, hosted a shower it was, had a great experience!!! The space was perfect for the occasion!

I had a fantastic weekend stay in Minneapolis! Muneeb was a great host—very responsive and accommodating throughout our visit. The house was spacious, spotless, and exactly as described. It comfortably fit our group of 8, with plenty of room to hang out and relax. The location was super convenient too. Would definitely recommend this place to anyone visiting the area, and I’d gladly stay here again!
solid location and solid price

This place was absolutely beautiful! It exceeded our expectations in every way. Very spacious, clean, and a great price! The neighborhood was peaceful! I would 100% recommend this place to anyone who comes to Minnesota. Muneeb was a great host! Very responsive and kind.
Wonderful stay! Thank you!
Place is beautiful open and spacious and clean. Muneeb is straight forward and clear, they also are very responsive. I would definitely stay here again!!!
This home was beautiful! Pictures didn’t do the house justice, it was stunning in real life! I will definitely rebook this home my next visit
spacious home in quiet suburb. comfortable and convenient stay.

name: Private Room in Beautiful House- Midtown Phillips
description: We have a four bedroom, two bath house, but there are only two of us.  Your bedroom is comfortably located on the first floor with your own full bathroom.  We are only blocks from Children's Hospital and Abbott Northwestern if you need to be near loved ones. We are just over a mile from the new US Bank stadium (Vikings) and right off of the greenway if you like to bicycle. Our neighborhood is diverse and accessible.

neighbourhood.overview: We are very close to Midtown Global Market, Midtown Greenway & Bike Path, Eat Street, US Bank Stadium, Target Center, Target Field, The Minneapolis Convention Center, First Ave Nightclub and more.

host.name: Suzanne
host.about:
We are teachers in Minneapolis. We  came here in July 2015 from Mexico City where we taught for three years. Before that, we were in Chicago where I lived & taught for 14 years.  I was born in Brooklyn, NY & raised in MN. 

We've been together more than 18 years & have lived in Mexico, Chicago, & Thailand together. Jen grew up in Indonesia. 

We love meeting fellow travelers & offering a comfy place to relax & settle in after a day of adventures.

amenities: HDTV with Hulu, Netflix, Apple TV, Amazon Prime Video, Disney+, Roku

detailed_reviews.comments: What a beautiful space. The first floor bedroom and bathroom are newly renovated in this gorgeous old home. Suzanne and Jen provide excellent information about accommodations and area activities. Easy interstate access. I wasn't in the home much but I felt very "at home" while there. I'll stay again!

Suzanne and Jen are wonderful hosts and their home is lovely. Everything is decorated beautifully and very clean. Their home is in a good spot, close to the major highways which makes travel easier. I would definitely stay here again.

Amazing hosts and great location. I walked downtown each morning and back and it was the perfect distance. Close to Eat Street and public transportation including bikes. Home was clean and comfy with tones of character. One of the highlights of my trip. I'd definitely stay again.

This place is just so nice and so are the hosts. I think this is the best air bnb I've been in and loved all the little details and enjoyed having a garden to chill in as well. Would 100% recommend it!
It's a great place to stay with clean and comfy bed. Located centrally they have a nice place and the rooms were so clean well organised. Don't miss just take it and enjoy your stay.

This is a great place to stay in Minneapolis! A comfortable bed, immaculate house, and friendly hosts make for a cozy place to stay while visiting this great city. There's a park with a playground and splash pad less than a block away, it's easy to get downtown and to tons of great restaurants nearby, but also easy to get to the freeways so you can go anywhere in the Cities. My daughter and I share a bed, and were very comfortable.
Suzanne and Jenn were great hosts! They were super nice and let us use the kitchen and we had our own bathroom. Such a cozy place and near all the main attractions.

This is a great place. The hosts are amazing and friendly. The room and bathroom was very clean and comfortable. The neighborhood is very close to downtown and the freeway, so it's easy to get everywhere from this location. Parking was a breeze as well. 
I plan on staying here again the next time I visit the Twin Cities.
Super friendly and laid-back hosts. Beautiful room and private bathroom. Ten min walk from Midtown Global Market and a ten min drive into downtown. Also close to bus stop. We had a lovely stay!
The room is comfortable, bathroom semi-private, the hosts are friendly and accessible, the cats sweet. It's a quiet neighborhood, a good place if you have a car to get around.

I loved having a clean private room and bathroom, with access to kitchen if needed. Using public transportation and walking back and forth to the bus stop gave me a great sense of the vibrant diverse urban neighborhood. The cats were warm furry greeters every night when I came back to the house.  Because our schedules didn't coincide, Suzanne and I only talked twice, once when I arrived and once when I was about to leave, but we texted back and forth  and I felt very welcome.
The hosts are very very nice. Everything that I needed either in the kitchen, the bathroom or the bedroom was available and free to use. The rooms were clean. It was a beautiful stay.
A lovely, clean home in a quiet neighborhood in Minneapolis. Suzanne and Jen were great hosts and the cats were so fun to have around!
Great hosts. The bed was super comfy. Great location, everything was about 15min away! Would stay again!

We had a great stay at Suz's and Jen's place! The bedroom feels very private while we could use the kitchen, laundry room, and other facilities as if we were actually living there. We really felt at home and we strongly recommend this place!

Beautiful house, great location, very comfy. Quiet neighborhood near a park, just a few minutes from downtown. We were pretty busy doing stuff for a friend's wedding, so we didn't see a lot of Suzanne and Jen, but they were very friendly during check-in and made us feel at home. The cats are super sweet. Highly recommended.

Suzanne and Jen were super accommodating during my time in Minneapolis. The room was comfortable, house was quiet, bathroom was private, and I loved the neighborhood! Couldn't ask for a better place to stay.

Majoitus oli mahtava. Huone on tilava ja siisti. Oma kylpyhuone on ihan huoneen vieressä ja sekin oli erittäin siisti. Suzanne oli mukava ja ystävällinen majoittaja, auttoi ja neuvoi tarvittaessa muttei häirinnyt millään tavalla. Talo oli hieno ja siisti, Suzannen 2 kissaa olivat rauhallisia ja ihmisystävällisiä. Talo sijaitsee suht kaukana keskustasta, kävellen noin 40 minuuttia, mutta taksilla tai uberilla matka ei ole pitkä. Myös bussit kulkevat suht läheltä taloa. Suosittelen lämpimästi ja majoittaudun tulevaisuudessakin tänne mielelläni.

I was there for the Twin Cities Marathon, and it's proximity to Downtown Minneapolis was great since that's where I mostly spent my time. The room and bathroom they provided was cool. The bed was really comfortable. Overall their house was great. Amazing hosts.

Suzanne and Jen are just the most thoughtful and helpful hosts. Their home is simply beautiful, and a wonderful place to feel cozy and welcome. They made my first trip to Minneapolis a lovely one! And their cats are adorable and snuggly. Thank you both so much for a great stay!

Suzanne and Jen were great hosts who put a lot of thought and care into the space.  They went out of their way to make sure that they could meet me for check-in, provided an incredibly clean and beautiful room, and were generally kind and warm.

Prolly one of my best stays ever! Suzanne’s house was huge, clean, and really cozy. The room was spacious and comfy as well, and the bathroom (which was all mine) couldn’t be cleaner. Suzanne and Jen were very accommodating for my check-in and super nice to talk to when we met. Location’s great too since it’s fairly close to downtown, and safe since it’s right by a school. Really really enjoyed my first visit to Minneapolis because of this place. And oh, the two B&W cats were definitely a plus.
Everything was as stated. I felt welcome and had privacy too. Slept longer than I have in a long time. Cozy room and everything was spotless. Location was superb. Two thumbs up!
Comfortable and welcoming, with privacy.   A five minute walk to public transportation, then a 10 - 15 minute bus ride downtown.

This was a wonderful experience. As a first-time user of Airbnb my expectations  for my stay were definitely exceeded; it was pretty much perfect! The room and bathroom were clean, pretty, and comfortable; the hosts were friendly and kind; and the cats are adorable and snuggly (although it would be easy to keep them out of your bedroom, and not interact with them, if you wanted to...they aren't too bratty. For cats. ;) I chose this place based on the many 5-star reviews and I can now confirm that they were 110% deserved! :) My favorite small touch was the scented candles available in the bedroom and bathroom.

This is a beautiful home in Minneapolis, close to everything downtown and off street parking.  Suzanne and Jen were the perfect hosts.  We were made to feel welcome and wanted.  They offered tips on where to go and what to see.  The room and bed were comfortable.  We loved every moment of our stay.  All the little extra touches made it even more special. (Coffee was ready and waiting in the morning!)  Their two cats are very friendly without being in the way, we made fast friends.  Every part of our stay was over the top wonderful!  Thank you both for all your hospitality!
I really enjoyed staying with Jen and Suzanne.  Their home is comfy, clean and was in a good location.  Next time I'm in Mlps I'll definitely check to see if their place is available!
This is a great location and place to stay. Suz and Jen are the best hostesses and the house is great!

We stayed at Suzanne’s place for a weekend and we had a lot of fun. Their place is close to everything we needed. They are really great hosts to talk to and very generous. And their place is very well put together. And they have a really awesome doormat.
I was very impressed with Suzanne’s place. Everything was very clean and she was very responsive and helpful!

Suzanne and Jen's home is a wonderful home away from home! Their hospitality was outstanding and their home beautiful. They are super friendly and are easy to carry on a conversation with. They provided a light breakfast with coffee in the morning, the bed was very comfortable, the bathroom spacious, modern and fully-equipped. I highly recommend their home and would gladly stay there again.

Suzanne was a great host. She was very welcoming and responsive. I enjoyed my stay at her place.  The room was very clean as well as the rest of the house. Very beautiful house. She has very adorable cats (Yoda and Bear)!! So, I highly recommend to book this room if you are planning to visit Minneapolis. Many thanks, Suzanne!:)

My son and I stayed at Suzanne's place for Super Bowl 2017.  Yea Eagles!  We had a wonderful experience in Minneapolis.  Suzanne's home is exactly as advertised.  Clean, warm (I know, hard to believe in Minneapolis in early Feb), and perfectly located a quick Uber ride away from everything.  What makes Suzanne's place so excellent though is Suzanne (and Jenn).  They are beautiful people, loving, generous, and terrific "ambassadors" for Minnesota.  We were well cared for, and slept quite comfortably.  Well done!

A clean, comfortable, and convenient place to stay! Parking was always available on the street and I never worried about my car. It's just a 10-15 minute drive to downtown, and even less from Eat Street, which has a passport's worth of cuisine options. Suzanne and Jen were courteous and accommodating hosts. Highly recommended!
Great communicator.   Love the location, near downtown.   I would come again and stay.  A 10+ rating.
Quiet, didn't even see hosts while we were there which suited us well. Walking distance to hospital also needed by us this stay.

Clean, very accommodating and good communication even after midnight 
 and cute cats!  Would pet again

Outstanding Airbnb host. Just the perfect location, room and house. Despite the fact that they were out of town, we got welcomed by her friend and the information and the communication was perfect prior to arrival. Also, having a smaller issue late at night, that problem was solved within minutes thanks to great response and plenty of help from. Again, places like these are what Airbnb is all about!

Suzanne's place was very clean, stylish, and comfortable. I visited with my friend and Suzanne was great at making sure we had everything we needed and she even had snacks for us. The bed was comfy and it was nice to have our own private bathroom (which was super clean by the way). I would definitely recommend staying here!
Had a great stay here and in Minneapolis in general despite the April blizzard. Room and private bathroom were clean and just what I needed for a short weekend trip.
Great house, great hosts, great city. What more can I say?

Suzzane and Jen were amazing hosts. My wife and I felt welcome throughout our four night stay. The home was upscale - of quality of which you hope for as you travel. We enjoyed the Global Market down the street on several occasions. We felt fortunate to have sound this stay.
Great location with serval minutes’ walk bus station
Fantastic hosts and a perfect base for me to explore the city and beyond.
The place is great.
The room is comfortable. The house is in a convenient location to take public transit around the city and easy to reach from the airport. Suzanne and Joanna are super hospitable and welcoming.
This was my first airbnb experience and it exceeded my expectations! I'll definitely be using Airbnb again and I hope my next hosts are even half as good as Suz and Jen!

Suzanne and Jen were lovely hosts - both provided info about the city, and Jen drew me a great map of the area that helped me every time I went out.  My room was clean and cheerful with big windows and a comfortable bed.  Private bath was clean, ample size, and well-stocked.  Their big kitchen was available for my use.  A secure, off-street parking space was nice to have, and motion-sensor lights made after dark comings and goings comfortable.  Unfortunately I did not get a chance to use the hammock in their grassy back yard.
Great place! Would absolutely book in the future.
Great hosts, super clean, convienent location.  Highly recomended.
Fantastic hosts in a fantastic space!
Very beautiful place to stay.
Great price for a clean and quiet space to relax after a day in the city. We enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend to others.
Very comfortable
Great experience! Close to downtown and highway access while being on quiet street. Suzanne is an amazing host and I look forward to staying here again the next time I am in town.
Lovely hosts. We had lots of space and felt very welcome. Location was close to downtown.
Suzanne has a great place with much amenities. She’s very easy to get along with and very helpful

If you like comfort and privacy, then you should stay with Suzanne and Jenn. They  went way out of their way to accommodate us on our three stays with them. The added plus is their two friendly cats,  Bear and Yoda.

Suzanne has a lovely, thoughtfully restored home in midtown Minneapolis that was so comfortable and clean. (I've never seen a home with cats that had zero cat hair before.) The bed was comfortable, the wifi was great, and the hospitality was friendly but unobtrusive.

This place is cute, extremely clean and close to the city. The room is perfect for two. Both Suzanne and Jen are great host, they make you feel right at home.  I did enjoy their cats....they both are friendly and cute!
Jen & Suzanne’s place is great! They are very nice people. Their place is very clean. The house is conveniently located. Seriously it’s everything you could want in an Airbnb!
Great location, close to Vikings stadium and downtown. Both ladies were very welcoming and offered advice during our stay. Highly recommend and would come back!
Very nice, clean, affordable with kind accommodating hosts and cool cats.

I had a lovely stay here. I appreciated having my own separate space and at the same time felt welcomed. Everything was clean and comfortable. I am definitely keeping this location in mind for future visits!!
Clean, comfortable and super friendly, this was an awesome place to stay while we were in Minneapolis.

I had a wonderful stay at Suzanne and Jennifers home.  Everything was straightforward, I did not need to ask for things like towels, soap etc...  Their home is very clean and peaceful and you get the privacy.  Their cats are well behaved and friendly too.
It a nice place to stay,comfortable and quiet. Great hostes.

Cannot thank these guys enough. Excellent in every way. Friendly, great company, the place was clean and tidy. Clearly veterans of Airbnb. Their house is an easy walking distance to downtown.  They have the comfiest couch and not only will you make a friend on them but their cats too. 
Thank you for an amazing stay!!!
It was a great place to stay!

Suzanne and Jen were great hosts! They were very accommodating, even with my flight arriving late and had some great local recommendations for food. I would definitely stay with them again if I return to Minneapolis.
Suzanne’s place was clean and quiet. The kitchen was stocked and she and Jen were amazingly accommodating. Cats were sweet too!

Good central location next to hospital. 
Clean place to stay.
This is my second time staying here, and once again it was an absolutely lovely stay in a clean and pretty space!
Suzanne was very flexible and understanding. Communication was quick and easy.
Very clean & cozy space. Plenty of space and private bedroom and bathroom were very nice. Close to everything. Suzanne & Jen are superb hosts - very welcoming & smooth communication throughout!
Suzanne’s place is great. Her and her partner were really lovely and made us feel welcome. Their cats are also delightful. Public transport was close enough. We’d definitely stay again!
Great house! Very cozy and welcoming. Close to transit and a cool market house. Highly recommend.

Suzanne and Jenn were great hosts. Their place was very clean and any instructions were clearly communicated. They were accommodating, friendly, and very responsive. I enjoyed my stay and would recommend to the others.
Great place and hosts. Highly recommend.
We absolutely loved staying here for a few days. The home was very clean and the host was so incredibly nice. Would definitely stay here again if we are ever in the area!

Suzanne is a great and gracious host. She was very accommodating of our arrival time, allowing us to check in a little early, and her house is cozy and in a great location — we walked about 8 minutes to catch the bus, and otherwise took cars, which weren't very expensive. Plus you're living with two very sweet cats.
The bedroom and private bathroom are very clean, and I appreciated that Suzanne took care to leave out detailed instructions and notes to inform of you everything a guest needs to know. I would definitely stay here again!

AWESOME home and hosts! I stayed with Jen and Suzanne for work and the location was great. They are so accommodating and provided everything you could possibly need. I felt like my privacy was respected but also that I could make myself at home and was welcome to use the kitchen, living room, laundry and join in when there was stuff happening! Lots of tips for getting around and what to do. The bed was super comfy. I was staying with total strangers but it honestly felt like family! Would recommend to anyone traveling to Minneapolis and I hope to stay again! 
Thank You! :)

Suzanne and Jen were fantastic hosts! They were flexible with my later arrival time and made me feel very welcome in their home. The space was clean, comfortable, and had all the amenities I could have hoped for. I would definitely recommend their home to others!
They have a nice and clean place and the hosts are amazing!

Sparkling clean, comfortable, private accommodation, tastefully decorated, with colorful artwork on the walls. Classic, well-maintained and updated older home with wonderful architectural details. Two friendly cats. Great kitchen. Off-street parking. Convenient to Downtown. It's a 2-minute walk to the bus stop, and you can easily get anywhere. This is an urban neighborhood in the process of renewal. As you walk through this area, you will see a variety of properties and conditions. That said, I felt safe and encountered no problems, even coming home late on the bus. There is a lovely park with fun playground equipment only a few blocks away. Suzanne is thoughtful and organized. Communication with her was easy and quick. I would definitely stay here again. Very highly recommend! 5 stars!
Outstanding!!

Great place! A cozy room, super comfy bed, very friendly kitties too! Can walk north to US Bank stadium, or west to a a bunch of really great diners and restaurants! The hosts are very friendly and you’ll feel like you’ve known them forever. Will definitely be back!

Beautifully restored older home, large bedroom, really comfy bed, and nice bathroom right beside the bedroom. Hosts were really welcoming and helpful, and were even able to accommodate us despite some last minute changes due to weather. We felt right at home and would certainly return.

This was our first time staying at an Airbnb and it was a great experience and a nice place to stay.  The house is clean and the bed was comfortable.  There is a private bathroom and it is located right next to the bedroom.  They have two cats and we found them to be friendly but not annoying.  Jen and Suzanne were great hosts and we will definitely stay here again!

We stayed here for 2 nights and it was delightful. The room and bathroom were spotless, the hosts friendly, and the location a short uber ride to wherever we needed to go. The two cats were a big bonus and I miss them already!
I had a lovely stay. Very clean and comfortable. Beautiful space! Great communication. Suzanne and Jen are very welcoming hosts. I would definitely stay again.
They were bothering very welcoming and their home was very cozy and clean. We even enjoyed their two fur babies.
Very welcoming and charming.
Great place to stay, great hosts! I enjoyed chatting with them briefly as I was very busy. Love the diverse neighborhood that is an example of what Minneapolis is.
Wonderful place to stay, nice hosts, perfectly clean, and beautiful house! Can’t ask for more! Thank you Suzanne and Gen!
Suzanne and Jens place was perfect for the few nights we needed to be near our mom that was  in the hospital a few blocks away.  Super accommodating!
Super cute home and a great location!
Suzanne and Jen had a beautiful cozy home near everything we wanted to see in the twin cities. Would definitely stay here again and recommend to others!
Suzanne and Jen are phenomenal hosts. The neighborhood is great and the location provides easy access to Minneapolis and St. Paul.

My stay at Suzanne and Jen’s place was wonderful! Their home is in a great location. I had a really short drive to the University of Minnesota from their home which was super convenient. Their home has a vey welcoming atmosphere. Suzanne and Jen are very kind, helpful, and great hosts. The room and bathroom were very clean and had everything one would need. I would highly recommend staying at their place! If I ever make it back up to Minneapolis I will definitely try to book their place again.
Very clean house, friendly people, and close to where we needed to head downtown for our conference. Would definitely stay again
I was in town for a conference downtown. Room was very nice, close to downtown and much less expensive than the hotels.  Definitely a place to stay when I go back.
Suzanne’s place is clean, convenient, and lovely. Suzanne was very accommodating and very responsive to messages. Also, cats Yoda and Bear were friendly and sweet. We would definitely stay again!
The house was so nice and sparkling.  Suzanne's is very thoughtful in decorating her house. Definitely one of the best airbnb experience I ever had.
This place is the perfect place to stay. They are very easy to get along with, super friendly, and their space is wonderful. No complaints.
Awesome:))
If you're in Minneapolis and need a room stay here. It's clean and comfy and your hosts are very helpful and kind. And go to Frenchmeadow Bakery and Cafe.

I've stayed at many airbnbs all over the world, but I truly believe Suzanne (and co-host Jenn)'s was the best experience I've had! The house was beautiful and cozy, and the two cats were super friendly and affectionate. Suzanne and Jenn were incredibly hospitable and went above and beyond to help me out with a personal situation. The neighborhood was cute with lots of flowers and community gardens. There are a few points of interest within walking distance from the house. I highly recommend.

This was a great find, a gem. Clean and spacious. Private bathroom. large wonderful kitchen. Pleasant hosts. And close to downtown. I walked to the convention center. About 20 minutes. $6 Uber ride. Check out the bicycle trail a couple blocks away. It’s an old railroad bed. Great for walking or biking. Comfortable bed. Quiet neighborhood. And extremely affordable!
Suzanne and Jen's home was lovely. It was quiet, sparkling clean, and cozy—the perfect place to come home to after a long day of work. Plus, cuddles with cats?! Amazing.

Suzanne and Jen are amazing hosts. The room I stayed in and the bathroom next to it were very clean and very comfortable. Their place in general is decorated with great taste. Also, it is quite close to most of the major attractions in the Minneapolis area. I would definitely stay there again next time I visit MN!
They are great hosts. They have a veryvery beautiful clean. I would definitely come back to their place.

My friend and I had a fantastic stay here! The hosts were very accommodating, the space was lovely and was conveniently between everything we were interested in doing during our stay! They had a fantastic place with a lot of helpful guides of things to do around town and two lovely cats too! I would absolutely recommend anyone to stay here

Suzanne and Jen’s house is a great place to stay for a quick visit to Minneapolis! It’s a short uber to downtown and the UMN campus. While the entrances are through the 2 main living areas, the room we stayed in and the nearby bathroom were nice and private. They have two sweet kitties and were very kind in welcoming us into their home.

Very Nice House.location is good, not far from airport and close to downtown . room decoration is lovely, well designed and with a lot love. Even we arrive every late in night, we can easily find out the house without interruption. Highly recommended

We loved staying in Suzanne’s home. The house is charming, clean and had everything we needed, including extra touches like an iron and full length mirror. We enjoyed playing with the cats but they did not come into our bedroom or bathroom so they would not bother you if you did not want to interact with them. Suzanne and Jen are friendly but give guests space and privacy. We did have a slight issue with check in but the hosts were responsive, apologetic and gave us a refund for the issue. I would stay with Suzanne again next time I am in Minneapolis.

Suzanne and Jen were wonderful hosts, and their home is comfortable and charming. Check-in and communication were smooth, the guest bedroom and bathroom were clean and comfy, and the location is on a quiet residential street (with easy parking) but close to lots of amenities. Thanks for a great stay!

Suzanne has a stylish & comfortable character home, and the bedroom and bathroom I occupied were sparkling clean. Her hospitality and warmth were outstanding, and I’m already recommending her place to family and friends!

Best hosts ever!! We absolutely enjoyed every minute in Minneapolis thanks to Suzanne & Jen. Great hospitality, awesome people and two cuttly cats. 
The room was clean and cozy.
As was everything in this great house. We felt welcome from the very first minute!
Thank you so much!!
Our stay at Suzanne’s place could not have been better. She and Jen were most gracious. The accommodations were clean and comfortable, and the location superb!
Great place to stay! The hosts are very welcoming and the house is cozy. I can truly recommend.

The houses in the neighborhood have that "historic" feel which I thought was cool. Suzanne's place has historic details, but is otherwise updated on the inside. The bathroom is modern, it was clean and the shower was easy to use. The bedroom was very comfortable. The cats are so friendly and funny! Best part though, the hosts were kind and easy to get along with.

This was a really very nice experience and just the place you want when like me you were a solo traveller in a new place. Warm clean very comfortable house and a nice bedroom with your own private bathroom to use.  Lots of thoughtful touches like lovely toiletries in the bathroom,  a charger plug for your cellphone,  and books with recommendations.  Suzanne and Jen let me use their washing machine and dryer, dropped me down to a local cafe when my dinner plans fell through and were always happy to answer questions.  Handy to the bus into downtown and not too far to the light rail to get to/from the airport. Two very cute cats too. I recommend eating at Maria's cafe a few blocks down from their place for breakfast or lunch.
A very comfortable stay. Accomadating, thoughtful hosts.

Suzanne's place is located in a nice neighborhood and was convenient for our activities in Minneapolis.  The Global Market is just a short drive away and "Eat Street" is on the way to the downtown area. The house was very clean and quiet.  All amenities were as advertised, although we didn't take advantage of anything in the kitchen other than for filling our water bottles.  The two cats, Bear and Yoda, are very friendly.  The off-street parking spot behind the house was nice.  We would gladly stay at Suzanne's place again in the future!
Excellent location near downtown.  Very accommodating hosts who respond to messages quickly for any issues!  Great stay!

Suzanne and Jen were wonderful hosts! You can tell a lot about people by the art choose to hang on their walls, and theirs  was on point. Their home is a very clean and well kept historic house in south Minneapolis not far from the Global Market, Matt’s Bar, among other MSP landmarks. It was more like staying with friends, than other AirBnB experiences I’ve had. Their cats Bear and Yoda were super friendly. The room was just what we needed for the week. Would definitely stay with them again.
Terrific place to stay, I keep coming back. Clean, accessible, great hosts.
Always a great stay. Clean and comfortable.
Great place to stay, always.
Lovely Cats! Nice house!

Jen and Suzanne's house is amazing. The beautiful bedroom and private bathroom are very clean, and you feel at home immediately. We so enjoyed chatting with Jen and Suzanne when our paths crossed, as they are really smart, generous and heartwarming women. Don't hesitate to book! Thanks so much!!!

Such a great stay in Minnesota! I was back for work and also to visit some friends. The AirBnB was great! My host were wonderful and kind. 
Everything was as described, very clean and comfortable.

Suzanne was a great host, offering a stay in a great location for a budget friendly cost. The house offered onsite parking (which is a huge bonus for a city) and there was lots to do in the area. During my stay i never had to drive more than 20 minutes to do anything.

Very beautiful home, very cozy. Suzanne and Jen were wonderful hosts and so was little Bear :) Amenities were perfect and it felt just like home. Wifi was fast and location of the home was perfect for my needs.
Perfect. Nice room, nice hosts, all was nice.

Suzanne and Jen were incredibly kind and very thoughtful.
The room is very comfortable and clean, and you have everything you may need. Also, there is a bus stop less than 5min walking where you can pick a bus that leaves you downtown Minneapolis in only 10min.
If I come back to MN I will definitely stay again at Suzanne and Jen's!
I don't even know how many times I  have booked here now...quite a few! Always clean, good company, and always feels like a safe place. Recommend!

Suzanne and Jen go above and beyond for their guest. Great location if you’re contracted to work at the Childrens Hospital as it is just a block away. Also great location if your active, being a few blocks away from the Greenway where you can walk, run, bike, rollerblade, etc.... Suzanne is a great cook and offers to have you join them for dinner on any given night. Very easy to talk to and great conversationalists. Bear, their cat, is also very friendly and talkative as well. I would highly recommend staying with them if ever in the Minneapolis area and I will be back. Thanks ladies.
Top-notch room with private bath and perfect hosts.  Jen and Suzanne were very welcoming.

I had a blast staying at this place. Jen and Suzanne were so friendly, made me feel like home. The kitchen is well equipped with cooking utensils, if you need. 
It's within driving and walking distance to most tourist spots.
Clean, Friendly, awesome hosts who really let you decide the level of interaction. Think I just made a couple of friends for life.
I felt so comfortable and at home at Suzanne and Jen’s Airbnb! They are such a lovely couple and everything was super clean! Would definitely stay here again!
Suzanne and Jen are lovely and amazing people that should honestly have a city holiday for them... with booze.

This was my first AirBNB stay. My hosts were amazing and made me feel right at home. The location is centrally located and just 20 minutes from the airport. This will be the way I stay when I travel from now on as long as they are all this good!

nothing bad to say!!!
very clean; comfortable bed; private bathroom; toiletries available; great location; friendly & communicative hosts
would stay here again!
Suzanne and Jen’s place was very clean, comfortable, and in a really beautiful and cozy house. Would definitely stay here again!
Jen and Suzanne made everything so easy!

Our first stay at an Airbnb could not have been better. Everything about it was great, the place, the location and our wonderful hosts who made the stay so easy and enjoyable. If/when we travel back to Minneapolis, this is the first place we'll be looking up!
My husband and I took a short vacation to the Twin Cities, and Suzanne’s place was perfect. Super clean, comfy, and ideal location! I’d highly recommend staying here.

This was my first Airbnb experience, and it could not have gone better.  Suzanne was a fantastic host.  She and Jen were incredibly friendly and helpful.  They had great local suggestions, and the location of their home was great.  With a greenway a few blocks south and downtown Minneapolis not far to the north, I enjoyed exploring the area on foot.  And their home is really beautiful and welcoming.  I will definitely be staying here again next time I am in Minneapolis!

Suzanne and Jen were excellent hosts, offering just the right amount of welcoming conversation after a long drive. Their home is lovely and very clean, and my stay was very nice. I would recommend staying with them in Minneapolis!
Great place and experience. Super friendly, clean, comfy and everything a guest could want!

My mom and I really enjoyed staying with Suzanne and Jen! They were wonderful hosts and their home was very comfortable/stylish. We needed to check out early unexpectedly and they were super understanding. We will definitely stay with them next time we're in Minneapolis!

the hosts were very amazing, they helped a lot.
thank you very much
This house is amazing! The room is super clean and Suzanne and Jen are very friendly. Their two cats are adorable
Great host and place to stay if you are visiting Minneapolis

Suzanne and Jen were just the most hospitable and gracious hosts. They were generous with their time, their food, and most importantly their coffee! The accommodations were perfect: private, clean, comfortable, and beautifully decorated that made it feel homey. I would absolutely recommend staying here!
I loved staying with Suzanne! The room was comfy and in a convenient neighborhood. There were two very friendly cats that made my stay extra special. Thanks!
A wonderful home in a great location! Suzanne and Jenn were very helpful and friendly hosts, as were Morty and Cat Benatar 😻

We stayed here for one week and had a great time getting to know Suzanne and Jen. They are very wonderful beautiful people. Overall the stay was very comfortable, we had self check in while Suzanne was out for football. The cats 🐈 🐈‍⬛ were great company and well behaved. The bathroom is well equipped, and private. The kitchen is well equipped too, we were able to make meals every day with no issues.
Great place, great location, awesome hosts! I would definitely stay here again.
Nice and clean, good location and the best part, 2 super friendly kitties :)
Lovely historic and comfortable home that has a great location. Suzanne and Jen made me feel right at home with their generous hospitality. Fantastic all around.
Jen and Suzanne were very kind to us during our stay! Would highly recommend if you're planning on visiting in the area! Very sweet cats as well!
Wonderful stay! Great location and lovely place. We love the two resident cats - Morty and Benny. The hosts were great with communication, kind, and very generous. We would definitely come back :)

The house is very nice and clean. It is located in a great location: Close to downtown, uptown, and the freeway. There are 2 cats that are very sweet and come to get petted when they hear you in the house. Suzanne is very welcoming and invites you to sit with them at dinner. She has great knowledge of the area and can give you recommendations on what to do
