How can you not love an Airbnb w such friendly cats AND superior hospitality!? I would look to stay w Suz and Jen again. Their home is beautiful and their kindness is so welcoming.
Will definitely stay again the next time we are in the area! Their home was cozy and in a great location.

I was very much looking forward to staying with Suzanne and Jen, but unfortunately when I landed in Minneapolis I felt under the weather so it was best for me (and them) to get a hotel closer to Paisley Park, my reason for traveling. I communicated with Suzanne and Jen to let them know I did not expect a refund due to my sudden change of plans, but they graciously gave me a partial refund anyway which was very kind. I hope to meet them someday!

Wonderful experience for my first Airbnb booking.  The bedroom and bathroom are well appointed, the location is easy to get into and out of complete with no fuss parking and quick access to the cities.  Check in and recurring access were seamless.  Coffee in the morning + gracious & helpful hosts + friendly cats + favorable rate = tremendous value.  What's not to love?

My stay with Suzanne was so lovely and cozy!! Suzanne and Jen were very welcoming and made me feel right at home, offering help with everything I needed. The cats were adorable and the room was very comfortable. Would definitely stay again!

This house was absolutely wonderful. Hosts were kind and communicative, and, the cats were also wonderful hosts :) 
The location was great, close to major bus routes, and in a very lovely neighborhood.

Suzanne and Jennifer were amazing hosts. The house was clean and located conveniently to the main attractions of Minneapolis. The hosts were kind enough to allow us an early check in and also made muffins for us! It was a great stay and we recommend anyone who wants to be close enough to downtown Minneapolis yet far from the noise and crowds.
I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Suzanne and Jen's lovely home! Everything was so clean and organized, and we had a great time chatting! 10/10 would book again!

What a cool place!! Suzanne and Jen had great amenities and a great touch to their home! Their home had a fantastic location to the convention center and Mall of America. I would absolutely stay here again if I came back to Minneapolis!!

Suzanne and Jen are great!
Clean, comfortable, welcoming! 
Thank you again for hosting!
Morty and Benny are 10/10 cats, they like to watch me eat food
Hosts were very friendly and hospitable. Location was convenient and easy to find, and parking was not an issue. Would definitely stay again!
This was a perfect location for a short stay or long. The hosts were very friendly and helpful.   Both the cats were friendly and I would stay here again.

What a great place to say. A nice house with a nice guest room and bathroom. Comfortable bed. Very clean, easy to find, fun hosts. Suzanne offered to make me a breakfast sandwich, which wasn't part of the deal. I did take her up on coffee, though. Convenient place to stay for downtown events, easy parking on the street, great communication, friendly hosts. What's not to love?
Incredible find! They were open and inviting, but also very accommodating in making sure you have a space to yourself. Was within 15-20 minutes (if not closer) of everything I wanted to do!

This is such an amazing place. Easy to reach, clean, beautiful house. The cats Morty and Benny make the stay even more worthwhile. Both Suzanne and Jen are very kind and warm. A big thank you to both for making it so pleasant for me.

Suzanne and Jen were friendly and welcoming.  They have a beautiful home.  Great location with easy access to public transport.  As a solo female traveler I felt safe walking to/from, even at night.  Bed was comfy and the cats were super cute.  Highly recommend a stay here.

Amazing stay! Very clean, room is decorated nicely, Suzanne is extremely friendly. Super close to downtown minneapolis (the armory is a 7 minute drive, uber was roughly $8), also only about 15-20 minutes from the airport (depending on traffic). Super convenient, comfy stay!
A lovely space with very nice hosts! Highly recommend!

Suzanne and Jen are great hosts and this place exceeded expectations.  We appreciated the great location, ample street parking, cleanliness/decorative details, having our own bathroom, and the comfortable bed.  We slept great!
Both hosts are very generous with their space as well and though we were mostly out and about, we appreciated the flexibility with using the living room/kitchen/backyard.
And finally, I would be remiss not to mention the kitties, Morty and Benny, who were very friendly as well 😺

Great spot!
Would stay again.
Great...although I didn't spend too much time in the house, basically just there for sleep and showers, clean and tidy.
Great people, grateful for a wonderful stay!

Stayed here for a weekend and had absolutely no problems! Lots of restaurants and tourist things to do nearby the house. The hosts were very outgoing and made sure you made yourself at home. If I ever travel to Minneapolis again, this is where I’ll try to stay!
Suzanne and Jen ROCK! Their house is so lovely. Easy to get to everything downtown as well as locally! Great host, super friendly, kind, and helpful! So easy to talk to and answered all questions!
A great stay with great people! Nice location and communicative hosts. Very comfortable. Would stay again!
Great recommendations, welcoming home, comfortable stay.

I greatly enjoyed my stay at Suzanne and Jen's place. Check is was easy, the room was just as described, and the fur babies were a nice addition as well. Suzanne and Jen were both very kind and I will definitely be staying here if I am ever in the area again.
Very clean, good amenities, quiet, and two lovely kitties. Great location for getting around the cities.
Sehr herzliche Gastgeber, es ist für alles gesorgt, sauber, modern, unkompliziert, gute Lage, faires Preis-Leistungsverhältnis. Sehr zu empfehlen!
Our stay was great! They were so friendly and offered us some wonderful food recommendations and told us some cool places in the area to check out! The house is very clean and we felt at home! 😄
Lovely setting and great hosts. Public transportation is just a couple blocks away, which made it quite convenient. I let one cat out and the other snuck out, so careful with those furry ones 😅.
Great location. I felt super cozy in this cute house.
A relaxing stay ! Had a great time in Minneapolis.

Suzanne & Jen are perfect host - open minded, very sympathetic, generous and uncomplicated. We felt really comfortable and welcomed. One of our best Airbnb experiences so far. House is perfect located in a safe neighborhood with a nice garden. The house itself is a beauty with a more than 100 years history. We loved the cats too :-)
I really enjoyed my stay with Suzanne. Clean home, adorable cats, and a great welcoming host! Great location especially if you plan on using the bus/train to travel around Minneapolis!
Excellent position for attending the conference center
Nice and cozy!

Had a wonderful 2 week stay, fortunately, at Thanksgiving, to which I was invited and had great conversations with their interesting, diverse, and welcoming community. Perfect. Intimate setting but so comfortable with sharing space with such a great couple. You will hear joyful laughter in the other room a lot, which was extremely healing for my soul. 
I absolutely love the neighborhood. Small park about 2 blocks, but about 10 blocks in the same direction  is a much larger park with lakes etc. Loved watching the sunset on the frozen lake there. I recommend bus #5 for getting around because it runs so often. No need to worry about schedules. Lots of diversity and nice people everywhere you go with a strong sense of community. My people.
I am already looking forward to staying there again in the Summer.

My partner and I really enjoyed our stay here. The bed was very comfortable, the room was clean, and the hosts were gracious! It was a lovely house, and Jen and Suzanne were very generous with their space. They are friendly, warm, and quick to respond. 
The location was great for us- just a short car ride to wherever we needed. I would definitely recommend staying here!
Suzanne and Jen's place was exactly as described and very welcoming. They both went above and beyond to make sure my son and I had a good stay with them. Highly recommended!
We had a great time at Suzanne’s place. Great people, great location and cozy place.
Nice place！

We traveled to Minneapolis to visit family and Suzanne and Jen's home was the perfect location for us to rest and recharge each night after a full day of fun with family. We appreciated their cozy and clean accommodations, great parking spot, and delicious coffee! Thank you for your hospitality.
I had a great stay! Location was blocks away from Abbott and Allina Commons which I needed. The home was very clean and the bed was comfortable! Great hosts!

Senti uma energia muito boa na casa, uma Paz. A casa estava muito limpa, flexibilidade no check in e chek out. 
Toda ajuda que precisei, fui bem atendido. Jen e Suz obrigado pela hospedagem!
Really accessible and for the location for which I needed to get to the hospital, it was the best location.  Very clean, Jen and Suzanne were exceptional hosts!
I had a great time staying here. i could see myself booking this spot again

Suzanne and Jen (and their cats) were the perfect hosts,  I felt at home from the moment I stepped in ! Everything felt relaxed,  with just the right blend of interaction and privacy. The room is nice and quiet, with an adjacent bathroom; I also appreciated a lot that I could use the kitchen to prepare my meals. The wifi connection was also very good.  And the cherry on the cake: it's only a 15-minutes walk to the MIA, where you can spend one rainy day or two exploring the outstanding art collections.
We loved Suzanne’s place!  It was so warm, inviting and quiet!

I had a very nice stay at Suz' and Jen's place. They are both amazing people, very passionate about what they do, and very professional as hosts. They were very accommodating and made me feel right at home. Thanks so much for having me!

Very nice home. Extremely clean. Everything we needed. Quiet neighborhood. Easy to find. Hosts we’re very responsive, friendly, quick to suggest a perfect breakfast restaurant. Can’t say enough. Very positive experience. Cats were a huge bonus. Would definitely go back!

Lovely accommodation... Clean, quiet, exactly as pictured.  Hosts are pleasant and accommodating. Location is close to quick and convenient transit options to the downtown.  Hope to stay again soon! Thanks Suzanne!

Suzanne’s place is really neat. I like the decoration and all necessary things included in the room. Super nice hosts provide clear instructions. 2 adorable friendly cats will be your fur friends around. Good location. I couldn’t ask more. It’s nice to stay there 😌
Suzanne and Jen were very warm and welcoming, and so were Morty and Benny 😻 They struck a good balance of engagement and giving us time to ourselves. Definitely recommend a stay with them!
Had a great stay in Minneapolis! Suzanne was very responsible and flexible with our 2am check in time. Loved the two kitties. They were sweet and well trained. Very happy with our stay.

Staying with Jen and Suz was a dream! I immediately was welcomed in to barbecues and breakfasts on the busy 4th of July weekend I was there. The location was excellent for catching the bus to different parts of town, and just a bit east of hopping neighborhoods. The room itself was quiet and clean with a bathroom right outside. More than anything, I felt at home. Thanks to you both!

Suzanne and Jen were the nicest hosts! They are very friendly and responsive, and their home is clean and just as pictured. They provide lots of local recommendations, too! Check-in was super smooth and their cats were very sweet. I highly recommend staying with them!

We enjoyed staying at this place so much! The hosts were very kind, generous, flexible, and quick to respond. Their place was beautiful, cozy, peaceful, and very clean. We also had easy access to public transit, groceries and restaurants. Naturally, the cats were the cherry on top! Would 100% recommend this place.

Suzanne is a gem of a person, and Jen too. I had the pleasure to meet their extended family on the first day and they all seemed so nice. 
I had absolutely no problem finding the place. I made a small request and they effortlessly accommodated me.
The room was clean, and had everything one would need to stay there. The house was extremely quiet all day and I loved it given I had a massive migraine due to extreme Minnesota heat.
Would definitely recommend to anybody looking for a place to stay with a kind, friendly family at a reasonable price.

I loved staying at Suzanne's place! Our hosts were extremely flexible and generous. We had a couple late nights planned so we missed each other during the early days of our stay but when we finally met they were nothing but accommodating and friendly. Would absolutely come back next time I'm in Minneapolis!

I have nothing but wonderful things to say about our stay here!
Suzanne and Jen are such kind, generous, and welcoming people. They made us feel right at home. 
Suzanne is very communicative and all of the instructions for things in the house are very clear. 
It felt like they went above and beyond—Jen even offered to drive us somewhere that was just down the block, which was very helpful. 
Having the private room and bathroom was just the right amount of privacy for us to feel comfortable. 
We fell in love with the cats too!
Great stay and nice location! Cats alone worth the stay!

Suzanne was so friendly and communicative! The apartment is very comfortable and welcoming, and the access to fun local things like Midtown Global Market was a huge perk. I had a great stay and would DEFINITELY return if I'm back in Minneapolis.
Great location , great hosts!

Spent 2 weeks with them and everything was perfect 😊❤️ both are kind and you really are in a comfortable place to stay in. Bathroom, kitchen, room, everything so good, clean, ready, easy, comfy and more! The cats were so lovely and cute too, they're so soft, PERFECT if you like cats! Location wasn't perfect but good! Some good places kinda near, a lil of walking but all good! Easy to wash clothes, perfect bathroom,perfect bedroom, really such a lovely beautiful house! Wish they adopted me haha!
I absolutely recommend them! For a long stay mostly 😊🙏
Definitely coming back to them whenever I come back to Minneapolis!

By far my best experience on Airbnb. They were outstanding hosts and so giving. They were flexible with the check in time so I didn't have to wait in the airport. The place was completely clean when I arrived and the cats were SUPER friendly. They cuddled with me at the entrance. The place is close to public transport and lots of bikes/scooter to rent. They offered food which I got a sandwhich for the airport on my check out morning. Best hosts I have had through AirBnb and would love to book again when I work in Minneapolis in the future.

I enjoyed my stay with Suzanne, Jennifer, and their 2 cute cats. They are quite a unique couple, friendly, and easy going. The house is kept tidy and clean, and the bedroom I stayed in was also in excellent condition. The house is located close to the downtown area, quite walkable if you don't have a car, but street parking is also not a problem with plenty of spots available all the time.
Great communication, location,  and hosts! Suzanne was very welcoming and the room was perfect.

Suzanne and Jen were wonderful hosts. Very friendly and made me feel welcome. They made me coffee for my early morning clinical at Abbott Northwestern and gave me a delicious cookie that they made for an upcoming event. Their place could not be more convient to Childrens or Abbott hospitals, it is within walking distance. Their cats Benny and Morty were adorable and super friendly! The house was clean, the bedroom was spacious, and I felt very comfortable there. Highly recommend!
Suzanne was very accomodating, friendly,easy to get on with and doesn’t mind a chat. I would have no problem in recommending staying at Suzanne’s place. Plus it was an easy walk into the city.
The stay at Suzanne’s was peaceful and felt like we were with family. We truly enjoyed our time there and would definitely go back again. This has been one of our favorite places to stay at.
Suzanne and Jen are awesome hosts. I felt at home and well rested while I was in their home. I rebooked my next trip immediately after I met them.
Great location, nice place, just as described, awesome place to stay for the anyone
Thanks for everything! Such a warm and friendly home!
Excellent place to stay

We had a great experience and would definitely stay here again. Suzanne and Jen were very friendly and accommodating during our stay. We enjoyed the location, parking was easy, and it was close to where we needed to go. The cats were also very sweet and chill.
Suzanne is right on target!
Suzanne is an awesome host.

Suzanne's place was a wonderful place to stay. We felt right at home sharing their home.  Great communication, comfortable bed, good location for exploring Minneapolis.  
We had a great time going dancing and seeing shows around town. Coming back to Suzanne's was like going home except our "home" was somehow magically in Minneapolis and it was clean and organized. :) So Delightful!

Thanks for the wonderful place to stay! Clean, private space in a beautiful home. Suzanne and Jen were respectful, nice and very welcoming. Would definitely book here again!
Also, very friendly cats. Always a plus in my book. Thanks!!
An amazing stay right in the middle of Minneapolis. Would 100% stay here again. Our hosts were accommodating and gave us privacy. You can’t get better than this

I stayed here for 5 nights for a work conference. The room was clean and as-described, and the house was lovely. The hosts were friendly and generous, and as a bonus they have two very sweet cats! This felt like a great deal to me. I would highly recommend staying here!
Suzanne and Jen were welcoming and friendly. They were generous with offering food and coffee. My privacy was honored and the cats were very well behaved. I would go back!
Suzanne is a great host!  Very comfortable.
Super nice host

Suzanne and Jen are wonderful hosts! Their home is beautiful, clean, spacious, and inviting, and they are so friendly, kind, and helpful. 5-10 mins drive to downtown and other Minneapolis neighbourhoods and places of interest. Bonus points for the loveliest cats! Thanks again for a great stay.

Delightful stay! If you're a cat lover, added perks are getting to interact with their two adorable cats. Check-in was very easy and I had everything I needed for this brief stay. For the price, it can't be beat!

it was a very comfortable stay with great hosts.
thank you for hosting me
Great hosts!  Very clean and comfortable accommodations.  We will definitely be back!

I have no words to describe how AMAZING my staying at Suzanne and Jen’s was. The house felt just like home, the girls are super friendly, their kitties are beautiful and very well behaved, everything was perfect. The room was spacious and comfy, the private bathroom also. Thank you for an amazing stay! I cannot wait to come back to MSP and stay with you again!
I felt so comfortable and welcome at Suzanne and Jen's home! Would absolutely recommend to stay there!

A fantastic place in a great location, and top-notch hosts too boot.  I had a full weekend planned and wish I coujld have enjoyed more time with their hospitality. Incredibly friendly and put a lot of care into their guests' experience.  A great place to call home on the road.
Room was perfect for my needs and satisfied as a home away from home. Bed was comfy, shower hot, plenty of fans, and clean living. Seeing the two cats around was a bonus :-)

Suzanne and Jen were gracious and responsive hosts! Despite me coming at a very busy time for them, they made sure I had everything I needed and even helped me with my travel plans after my stay by allowing me some extra time to leave my belongings. Their kitties are so sweet and I enjoyed spending some time with them before I headed out for the day. I was attending an event in downtown Minneapolis for several days and was able to utilize the metro bus system from this location with little issue as well. As a single traveler, this home was exactly what I needed. Thank you!

I very much enjoyed my stay at Suzanne’s place. Suzanne has been very friendly and helpful in making my stay as comfortable as possible. We had a great conversation and personal interactions and I felt like I was staying at my own home where I got the chance to cook, do laundry and enjoy my own time and privacy. Suzanne was very kind to let me borrow her umbrella on a very rainy day. I would highly recommend staying at Suzanne’s place and next time I come back to Minneapolis, I would like to stay there again.
Clean place and friendly hosts! Within walking distance from US bank stadium for us to attend! Very friendly cats!

This was a lovely place to land for a visit with my college friends in the twin cities. Conveniently located, clean, beautiful. Jen and Suzanne were kind and welcoming hosts and their home reflects that. Would happily stay there again!
We felt comfortable and safe staying here.  Thank you! 😊
Great room for a solo traveler or a couple that packs light. Friendly hosts who are glad to provide recommendations. Short drive to downtown and other local spots.
Had a wonderful stay with Suzanne, very friendly and responsive.
Great hosts, calm, safe, clean, and comfortable place. You feel at home. I highly recommend it.
Couldn’t have asked for better hosts or a more comfortable stay!

Suzanne was very friendly and welcoming. The place worked great for attending a conference downtown over a few days -- I used the Lime e-bikes to get around; they are everywhere. The room was cozy and has a private bath as advertised. Everything was clean and Suzanne was very generous with food, too. Would recommend!

Suzanne and Jen were excellent hosts. Felt right at home. It’s a beautiful character home in a multicultural neighbourhood. Close to many restaurants and markets. Very close and easy to get to downtown Minneapolis. We also found it easy to drive to downtown St. Paul, about 20-25 minutes depending on traffic. Our room was cozy and had a spacious closet. The mattress is neither firm nor soft. The pillows were a bit lumpy but comfortable enough. We slept well. Had our own washroom with a nice shower and a bidet!  We were encouraged to use the kitchen and we found the things we needed. We will definitely return.

This place was absolutely perfect for my needs during my most recent stay in Minneapolis. The house is warm and comfortable, and Suzanne and Jen are both very easy-going. The location is very convenient, both to the airport and pretty much anywhere else. It’s the perfect solution when you have a lot of things going on in town, but need a quiet clean comfortable place to stay at night. I would definitely go back.

My stay at Suzanne and Jen's was wonderful. The atmosphere was perfect for relaxation, with every detail thoughtfully arranged to make guests feel truly at ease. Suzanne and Jen went above and beyond to create a comforting and serene environment—their kindness and attentiveness made me feel genuinely welcomed, and I left feeling refreshed and grateful. The location is incredibly convenient for getting to downtown, yet the neighborhood remains quiet and peaceful. Highly recommend for anyone in search of a peaceful retreat with easy access to the city.
It was a pleasure to stay at Suzanne’s home. Although we didn’t meet, she communicated very well. Highly recommend
Very hospitable,  ice area, clean, respectful, warm welcome

We could not have been more pleased or satisfied with our stay with these wonderful hosts, including the two friendly cats.  They all made us feel right at home, very comfortable, with the right balance of privacy.  The bed was super comfortable, and the room was quiet. For us, the location was perfect. We look forward to staying here again and again. We are so grateful that the owners have chosen to share their beautiful home!

Suzanne was very kind. Their house was very clean and peaceful. I slept great and felt welcome. It was my first time staying with the hosts in the house but they made me feel very comfortable and at home.

This is a special place. Hosts were great-made me feel right at home—above and beyond! Suzanne was extremely helpful and responsive and gave great local recommendations. Their home is warm and comfy. Quite the respite!
Suzanne was very helpful when my trip didn’t go exactly as planned. very friendly and understanding.
Unfortunately I was not able to make the trip, but the exchange I had with Suzanne was very professional and informative. I apologize for not being able to make it.

Suzanne's place was easy to get to easy to find parking in front of the house.  Super clean and the room for the listing was perfect for 1-2 people who just need a bed and bathroom.  
The hosts were very friendly and helpful with any questions I had and were generous in allowing me access to their kitchen and use of any utensils, glassware, and food/drink items I needed. 
10/10 would recommend staying here when in Minneapolis.

Everything in this Airbnb was as listed! Both Suzanne and her partner are very friendly and accommodating hosts and it was pleasant to communicate with them. Even though you are sharing the space with the hosts, your room and bathroom are private and they totally respect your privacy and space too.
The bed was comfortable, the kitchen was well-equipped and they provided a parking spot, so it couldn’t have been more convenient. We highly recommend this place!
Location is great, Suzanne’s home is everything described and very generous with all the amenities offered. Thank you for your hospitality
Suzanne's place was nothing, but immaculate! Truly a place you have to stay at in the Twin Cities. Super accommodating, extremely knowledgeable, and really organized place. Would stay again!

Appreciate the check-in accommodation and comfortable atmosphere of the place. Felt right at home! Despite the extreme cold, the room stayed warm with plenty of extra blankets and an extra space heater available, if needed. Everything represented in the listing met my expectations and the hosts were kind, responsive and clear in communication, and gives respectable privacy. The cats are also friendly but not bothersome. Highly recommend this stay! Thanks again Suzanne and Jen!
This is a great place to stay in Minneapolis. Suzanne and Jen are lovely hosts. Their home is beautiful, and felt cozy and welcoming. I highly recommend staying here!
Easy
Loved staying at Suzanne’s place! She and Jen were very nice and their house is beautiful. I felt right at home the whole time. I’d love to stay there again next time I’m in Minneapolis!
I loved staying here! Very comfortable, the proximity to public transit is great, and the house is very clean. Would stay here again!

My stay here was great ! Didn’t get to meet Suz but Jen made us feel right at home! Like literally I talked her ears off the whole night lol ! What she didn’t know at the time I was going through something so for her to be there and allow me to vent meant a lot to me! Would definitely recommend any one to stay! And the Cats were so sweet they are pretty big lol but they are so lovable !

Suzanne was a great host. Her place was in a quiet area not far from a bus stop and only 3 stops from downtown. The room is big with drawers and closet spaces. Everything was spotlessly clean and the bed was very comfortable. If I was to come to Minneapolis again I would definitely stay at Suzanne’s if her place was available.

We really enjoyed our stay here! Hosts were very friendly and gave us many good suggestions for good spots to go. They were quick to answer our messages and made sure that we felt right at home and had a comfortable stay. The room was spacious, clean, and comfortable. The bathroom was really clean as well. Overall it was a great stay and we would definitely come here again if we are ever in the area again.
Great peaceful place to stay in Minnesota!

Loved staying with Suzanne and Jen. They’re both so so nice and friendly, I felt right at home. They keep their house very clean, organized and quiet and have very clear instructions but are also very helpful and accommodating. Would’ve honestly loved to stay longer if I could.
とても親切かつ積極的に案内をしてくれました。

Suzanne and Jen were incredible hosts who were generous and thoughtful. I highly recommend staying with them especially if you're a biker. The location is second to none. I was able to bike everywhere which saved me hundreds of dollars that were then spent on dining out and  local attractions. Not only was their home in the heart of Minneapolis, St. Paul was a gorgeous forty minute bike ride away where the ride itself is an attraction. The Midtown Greenway is excellent, and Venture Bikes is half a mile away if you need a bike or to service one that you already have. I will be sad when I leave and have to say goodbye to Mitsy, their chatty kitty. I'm grateful that Suzanne and Jen opened up their home so travelers like me can get to experience the wonderful twin cities.
Lovely, quiet place to stay with friendly hosts and cats! Looking forward to returning soon.

name: Classic Craftsman Room 4 - Walk 2 Light Rail!
description: Location, location, location!  This beautiful craftsman home is situated in an ultra-convenient area for anyone wanting to get around easily in Saint Paul or Minneapolis, especially if you don't have a vehicle.  The house is a 3-block walk to the light rail, which effortlessly connects you to various locations throughout Saint Paul, MSP Airport, Mall of America (MOA), downtown Minneapolis and the U of M Campus.  You are also within walking distance of numerous local shops and eateries.

neighbourhood.overview: Besides all the local shopping and travel amenities, this house is within blocks of the new Allianz Soccer Stadium as well!

detailed_reviews.comments: Great location
This was my second stay at one of Jessica’s properties. Best value in Airbnbs in Minneapolis.
Just a couple of blocks from the lightrail which makes this place one of the most convenient airbnb places to stay in the twin cities. Jessica is a great host and will respond right away.
Excellent place to stay with everything needed for a long term stay.
Lovely place to stay while I was moving into the city. I was able to network with my fellow airbnb guests who were also there during my stay.

Jessica was very good at communicating and updating on other new coming guests to the house. The common places were cleaned regularly and located in a chill neighborhood. Finally, the house was very close to the green line light rail and other bus lines.

Jessica was kind, accommodating, and extremely responsive! I came to Minneapolis for the 2022 APA Convention, and she made her I had everything I needed and was able to let me check in early when my last accommodation plan fell out unexpectedly (and at like 7am at that)! The private room was nice and clean, but the shared bathroom was not bc there were hairs of other tenants laying around--which is something I can be very anal about lol---I'm not even sure if they wiped the toilet seat before and after they used it bc I could not locate the spray and paper towels Jessica told me about in the instructions! However, I enjoyed that we all stood out of each other's way, especially with COVID and now monkey pox spreading like wildfire! This is a great place to stay if you don't mind having your own room and you're in a time and (financial) crunch! Thank you Jessica!!!<3
I loved the location, ease of parking, clear communication with Jessica and the room with all the amenities. I will definitely recommend the craftsman room :-)

The thing I liked the most about my stay here was the excellent communication by Jessica. She was very responsive, welcoming, understanding and accommodating. On my check-in day, my mother’s flight was rescheduled 3 nights later and she accepted to let her stay with me. I also liked the proximity of this house to the green metro station as well as supermarkets, restaurants and shops. It still didn’t feel the safest, though. 
The things I suffered from in my stay included the following: 
- Dirty and unorganized kitchen because the other guests didn’t wash their dishes regularly, clean the area after cooking or take the trash out. *the professional cleaners came every week or two. 
- The basement (where the washer and dryer were) was spooky and not well-lit 
- The central AC wasn’t cooling my room enough. There wasn’t a table fan either. 
- There we’re only two electric outlets in my room, one which was used for the mini fridge, so it was a struggle to charge all my electronics sufficiently.
- It’d have been nice if the room had a rug or colorful decoration and bedding. 
- The other guests were very loud at times and would walk around the house or leave and come back in late night and early morning hours (Jessica was very supportive in reaching out to them but it didn’t solve the issue entirely unfortunately). 
- This wasn’t the best place for me as a young female.
Great location with a great value from a responsive host. Would come back if I am in the area!

An easy stay and comfortable for those who want a clean and quiet place to sleep that is affordable. I wasn't around much other than to sleep so I didn't see others too much but each room was booked and never had a problem with bathroom overlap or noise. check in was easy. seems like most people were here longer term which is nice. A perfect budget option if you're not looking for your own place.
This house was perfect for my stay. It was at a convenient location and was extremely cozy. Would definitely recommend to other potential guests. An excellent stay and an excellent host.
It was very nice staying at Jessica place, easy and convenient, reasonable priced. Thank you
Perfect place to stay, I’ll come back for sure
Jessica’s place is well-located in a nice neighborhood - convenient by car and light rail. She was responsive when I asked for a small lamp in the room. A good inexpensive option.
Very helpful and staying on top of improvements.  Great for a long term stay.
Awesome spot! Right by the soccer stadium and very close to the railway! Jessica was a great host and her place is an excellent choice if you are looking to stay in St Paul!

the house is a bit outdated but has a niche vive to it if you like that sorta thing which I didn't mind. I worked night shift while staying there and the floors creaked so I felt bad for making so much noise while walking around the house on my off day meal prepping and whatnot. there was 2 refrigerators so that was awesome, shower was a bit small but didn't bother me to much. parking behind the house was awesome because I was working night shift and one of the days the city put a notice out about no parking on a particular day for the street sweepers to come through on that day. The host was nice and very informative and easy to work with i ended up extending my room 4 times and she was easy to work with. I would stay there again for sure.
The place was clean, quiet, and exactly as described. I had to leave earlier than planned due to an emergency, but Jessica was quick to respond and very understanding. Thank you for your hospitality.

comfortable, cozy. Great location, close to lots of good food choices and the light rail. If you needed a longer term stay this would be a great spot.
Jessica is a very good host, responsive and caring.
I truly enjoyed my stay at Jessica’s place. She is a 5 start host.

name: Lumberjack Inn DT-on Main St. with a rooftop deck
description: Welcome to our unique townhome located in a historical building nested into the heart of downtown, offering panoramic views of the St.Croix River.Unwind on the expansive rooftop deck, enjoying a 360 panoramic view of the river, downtown, and the charming historical neighborhood.This gem is also apart of the Union Art Alley, featuring a vibrant mural by a local artist.With dining, shopping, and live entertainment just steps away, your stay promises a perfect blend of culture and entertainment.

neighbourhood.overview:
Stillwater is a charming historic river town along the St. Croix River, known for its antique shops, boutiques, fantastic restaurants, and vibrant nightlife.

Visitors can take a scenic paddleboat ride, explore historic sites on a trolley tour, or bike across the St. Croix Crossing Loop Trail that connects Minnesota and Wisconsin. For a unique experience, you can try axe throwing, create art at local studios, or enjoy outdoor activities like boating, fishing, and golfing.

In the winter, skiing is just a short drive away, and a leisurely road trip along the St. Croix Scenic Byway offers picturesque views and stops in towns like Hudson, WI, Afton, MN, and Taylors Falls, where you’ll find more wineries, shopping, and dining options.

Whether you’re into history, outdoor adventures, or just soaking in the scenic beauty, Stillwater and the surrounding St. Croix River Valley have something for everyone!

host.name: Sunny
host.about: Love Stillwater

detailed_reviews.comments: What a jewell. If you want to experience downtown Stillwater this is THE PLACE to stay!  The location is ideally located within just blocks of everything.  The interior is spotless, spacious, updated, and furnished to entertain.  There were 3 couples in our group and the rooms were more than perfect except we did have to flip a coin for who got to stay in the main "master" on the main level or in the two other rooms on the next level up !  Unfortunately, it was too cold to enjoy the top patio/balcony but it looked like it would be a lot of fun in good weather.  Bill, our host, was very pleasant and helpful.  He called just before our arrival to go over the things he thought we needed to know.  Once we arrived in town we had did have a few questions and Bill immediately answered our calls and texts. We can't wait for summer so we can hopefully stay again and experience Stillwater in warmer weather.

The ambiance and location are phenomenal. We appreciated the well - proportioned linens and the bedding was very comfortable. Felt safe and secure with plenty of personality. Enjoy the view and fireplace. Thank you for a great stay

10/10 recommended! Very helpful with parking and getting checked in. The location was wonderful, we only had to drive somewhere once otherwise we walked everywhere. Everything was very clean and the place is absolutely beautiful! We were already talking about booking again in the summer!
Amazing place. You will love it!!

Property is awesome and location is great for walking to anywhere in downtown Stillwater. Everything was very comfortable and designed beautifully. Owners responded promptly to any questions. Would highly recommend!!!
He was very nice! Perfect location and view. The airbnb is better in person! Definitely recommend!

The owner is friendly and very helpful when planning your stay. He will tell you good spots to try and fun things to do while in Stillwater.  The condo itself is gorgeous and has a unique vibe to it. Our group walked in and immediately fell in love with it.  We were pleasantly surprised with all the little extras we found including games, coffee/creamer and little toiletry kits to name a few.  We highly recommend this rental. Can’t wait to come back in the summer!

Perfect location! We literally did not realize how close we were to every restaurant, bar, dancing, entertainment and shopping location! Definitely recommend this place! Place was immaculate and breathtaking as well!

The only detail that wasn't as advertised was the self check in. Anil met us to check in. The details he gave were great but could have been in a message or a welcome book.
Everything else was phenomenal. Great walking location, beautiful rooftop views, comfy inside space. 
Anil also gave some great personal touches to make us feel at home. I highly recommend staying here if you can!

We stayed at Anil’s place for a Bachelorette party and it was absolutely perfect! 
The space is beautiful, clean, and spacious. You can’t beat the location as it is right downtown and within walking distance to all of the bars/restaurants. 
If you’re staying in Stillwater I would definitely recommend you stay here. Thanks Anil!

Well maintained loft, with a ton a space and natural light. Has great views of the river and downtown from the living room and rooftop patio. The host was fantastic, easy check in, parking passes, and everything was clean and neat. My family and I enjoyed our stay very much and would recommend this place to anyone with an event in downtown Stillwater.
Highly recommend this as a destination.  The accommodations are lovely and the location is excellent.  The rooftop lounge is sublime.

Rented out this place for a Bachelorette party and it was perfect. Beautiful, spacious place with an AMAZING location. There were so many restaurants, shops, and bars all in walking distance. We especially loved hanging out on the rooftop patio as well. Place was clean, host was communicative, and it was the perfect size for a group of 8 of us.
Only con is that it was very busy in downtown Stillwater so the parking situation was a little difficult.
Gorgeous property and fabulous location. Slept all 7 of us very comfortably. The rooftop patio was the highlight for us. Highly recommend!

We had a fantastic stay in Stillwater! Unbeatable location close to shops, restaurants, and the riverfront. Private roof deck was perfect. Everything in the home was clean, updated, and well equipped. Highly recommend!

Not only is this place beautiful but it’s close to everything! It fit 7 of us perfectly with plenty of room. The rooftop deck was the highlight by far. Everything was well stocked, super clean, easy check in, and any questions we had were answered quickly. Would definitely stay here again!
Absolutely an amazing place!  Anil made every part of the process/stay effortless - simple check-in, and well thought out amenities.  I would definitely recommend this place to anyone!
Awesome stay! Great location! Clean and great amenities! Will definitely be back!
We had a wonderful time at this spot! The location is perfect and can't be beat! Walking distance to everything! The space is beautiful as well with plenty of space for our group of 5!

We stayed here for a girls trip and the place is just as amazing as the listing showed! The host is very communicative and helpful. We had requested an early check in which was granted. The location is especially convenient to visit local shops and restaurants. It is a little tricky however to find overnight parking around Stillwater. With a few suggestions from the host we were all able to find parking options for the whole weekend. Each room was clean and as pictured. There was more than enough space for our group to stay. We will definitely book here again for our next stay in Stillwater!

If you want a premiere space to enjoy downtown Stillwater in style, look no further. Anil has the perfect spot. The interior is classy and the rooftop patio is the icing on the cake. We will definitely be coming back. Thank you, Anil!

This was a fantastic place to stay.  The location cannot be beat.  The rooftop patio was the best place to have morning coffee, afternoon conversation and evening take-out.  The listing is very accurate.  We didn’t lack anything to make this our “home” for a few days.  We will definitely be back!

Our stay here was perfect! We came here for a bachelorette party and the location could not have been better to hit all the local spots we wanted to! The rooftop was the cherry on top with an awesome view, hopefully coming back for another girls weekend!
Great place - comfortable, attention to detail, amazing deck with a wonderful view, and perfect location for exploring Stillwater.
Beautifully designed and maintained, fantastic location, amazing rooftop. The dream place in the middle of town! Couldn’t have asked for any better. Thank you.
Amazing place and an amazing location!  The place was beautiful and clean!  The beds were all very comfortable!  Would highly recommend!

What an incredible place! Spacious, open and inviting, the place is great for groups and entertaining. The private rooftop patio is a game changer! The combination of the energy from being right on Main St and  its views of the St. Croix make it unbeatable. 
Anil is great to work with! He was very proactive with communications and very responsive. He also offered great ideas and recommendations for entertainment.

Stayed at this place a second time since the first was so amazing! Anil is an awesome host and is very communicative. He allowed us a late check out which was very appreciated. I will definitely book here again
10/10 recommend if looking for a stay in the heart of Stillwater. We had a group to celebrate a bachelorette party and we were THRILLED to be so close to everything!!!

Amazing location! Gorgeous loft. The best air b&b I’ve ever stayed in. Great communication. Sleeps a lot of people very comfortable. Rooftop has amazing views. Beds were very comfortable. Highly recommend. Will be staying here again.
Great location.  Plenty of room.  All the amenities. Especially loved the rooftop deck.
We really enjoyed our stay!  Very comfortable, great location and well appointed.
This place was the best place we could ever hope for, so well located, such a beautiful home with all the classy and functionally you need. We are just dreaming on coming back soon.

What a wonderful place to stay at! It was just like the photos and more! Very spacious, clean, with all the amenities we needed, and lots of style! We had a great Christmas break. Would definitely recommend to friends and family members.
Great location went to family wedding every thing was in walking distance  Very quiet and peaceful  I would recommend it with 5 stars
Perfect location, great amenities.
Anil was so easy to work with, incredibly responsive and hosts an incredible home.  We are looking forward to coming back this summer to enjoy the rooftop and explore more of the Stillwater area.

Would absolutely stay here again! The space was exactly what we needed for a girls weekend and was even better than the pictures showed! Everything we needed was walkable and it was overall a great stay.
Great location, beautiful space!

We booked the weekend with a group from out of town / out of state - we could not recommend this beautiful place highly enough. It is in the perfect location in Stillwater to enjoy the town. Anil & Sunny we’re so helpful and responsive when we had questions! We are already planning another trip back!
The place is gorgeous and comfortable.  We loved the views and how close we were to great restaurants.  I will be coming back in the future!
Had a blast this weekend visiting town and this place is absolutely perfect to be in the center of all that is Stillwater. I would highly recommend staying here any time!
Perfect location, amazing loft, close to everything. Anil also responded quick to a question I had.

Great place to stay for downtown Stillwater experience. Very walkable to restaurants, shops, and grocery. Unfortunately it rained while we were there, otherwise would have loved to sit out on the rooftop deck this place offered!  Would definitely come back again! Host was very responsive to questions!

This place was more spacious than the pictures implied, and the old building had such amazing character. There are skylights over a few of the beds, which provided great light (but unfortunately poor sleep quality for our toddler). We had 6 adults, 2 children, and 2 kids under two, and had plenty of room. This was such a great find in the heart of downtown Stillwater. We absolutely loved it!
Will come back. Was a great stay

I can’t say enough positive things about this place—from the GORGEOUS space, amazing location, cleanliness, to the super sweet and helpful hosts. The whole stay was absolutely perfect for a girl’s weekend. I have already recommended this spot to a few other friends! Trust me, you WILL NOT regret booking this! It was above & beyond all expectations. :)

Great stay for a bachelorette weekend! Location was everything and the rooftop was beautiful with the sunsets! Highly recommend if your coming down for a fun girls night or any getaway to spend in the charming town of Stillwater, MN:)
This place is amazing! Spacious & clean Airbnb. Great location in downtown Stillwater! The rooftop patio is EVERYTHING.
Great spot in a great location

This is the kind of place my family didn't expect as the pictures understate the well thought out elegance of the place. 
The rooms themselves were excellent and my family instantly bonded as they divvied up the rooms. The master bedroom is especially spacious with an excellent bathroom.
The rooms were spacious and clean, the kitchen and living room areas well thought out. Bathrooms were very clean and as hosts they provided lots of well thought out amenities from shampoo to make up towels.
Anil was very responsive and helpful as well.
The location in Stillwater is perfectly positioned to go out and enjoy the day or simply relax at the space. 
All in all, an exceptional rental!

Our family of 5 enjoyed Anil’s place downtown Stillwater and enjoyed being within walking distance of everything.  Parking was easy even over the 4th of July holiday with the provided parking permits.

We stayed here for a family get together, and it was just perfect. The roof deck was absolutely beautiful and well appointed. The whole place was just as it had been advertised. We would definitely come back.
Had an amazing time at the Lumberjack Inn! Highly recommend wedding parties, bachelor and bachelorret parties to consider this location. Great music, bars, and restaurants within only a few blocks!

We enjoyed our stay at The Lumberjack Inn so much! The residence itself exceeded our expectations as far as the size of it goes. The location was great as we were able to walk to just about all of the places we wanted to get to. The amenities were top notch and the rooftop patio was a fun place to hang out!

A really beautiful apartment - perfect for a group - lots of space and fantastic amenities. Great views and right in the heart of Stillwater right across from the river. 
Anil was super responsive and welcoming. We’d definitely stay again. Thank you for a lovely stay.

This place is stunning!  Pictures don't do it justice.  Great location in downtown Stillwater.  Walkable to so many places.  The host was very nice and easy to work with.  Great Communication when questions asked.  Definitely worth it.
We had an amazing time and look forward to coming back again!!  Highly recommend!!
Excellent place to stay right in downtown stillwater, close to JX venue and water street inn which was perfect for the wedding festivities.
Beautiful place! Looks better than the pictures
Loved the location, lots to do and see. The house was clean, love the rooftop!
Place was awesome! Great location & very clean. Would recommend it to others.

The Lumberjack Inn was amazing. It was the perfect location to all the shops and restaurants downtown Stillwater.  The place was spacious, and had everything we needed to make our stay perfect!! Will definitely book again!

This is one of those places that looks even better then the pictures showed it looking. We loved everything about this rental it had all the amenities that you would need perfect location, this place was decorated and furnished with thought. We would love to come back again soon!

This place was in a perfect location with a beautiful roof top deck overlooking the city. The Space was very rustic elegance. The activities and restaurants were within walking distance. Our family had a wonderful stay!!
Nice place. Great location!
The place was beautiful and close to everything! Plan on booking in the summer as well!

Such a stunning place to stay in the area. Walk right out to the hustle and bustle of Main Street and enjoy some weekday live music and a karaoke spot right down the road.
The exposed brick with modern kitchen and amenities was a perfect getaway for our little startup business who needed a collaborative space to host a hackathon. We'd love to make a quarterly visit possible. It's exactly what we needed.

Great location! Restaurants, stores and water front were all within walking distance.  Anil was quick to respond to questions and provided great recommendations. The place was clean and comfortable.  Would love to come back during the summer.

This is a gorgeous loft. It was clean and comfortable. The host was quickly responsive to messages and allowed an early check in since the place was ready. It’s right downtown, so the cute shops are all walkable. There’s a health food store and service station across the street, so it’s easy to grab some essentials.
Perfect for a girls weekend. Great location! Able to walk to everything. The rooftop is a wonderful addition to the space.
We had a great time with family over the weekend. The place was better than the pictures show! It was an incredible stay, in the heart of downtown Stillwater. Perfect for a fun weekend away!

We stayed at Anil’s place for a Moms weekend retreat in Stillwater and it was AMAZING! The location was pristine (right on Main Street) and walking distance within all of the fun activities in Stillwater! It was spacious, clean and the rooftop was an added bonus! The check in and check out process was extremely simple and Anil was always extremely responsive! We are definitely looking forward to staying in this space again (hopefully next year)! Thank you for such a great space!

Cannot say enough great things about this spot! Exceeded our expectations for our girls weekend! It was SO spacious! Even better than the pictures & posting! Will totally be back & will for sure recommend! Location was walking distance to literally everything! The rooftop patio was great too! Lots of sleeping space & very comfortable.
Great unit!  High end and right in downtown.  Finding the entry was a little difficult because it is in between a couple of stores, but the location was perfect!

Anil and Sunny are incredible hosts!  From the minute we booked until we checked out, they are very responsive!  My group was retired teachers looking to explore a city, enjoy the restaurants, shop, and spend time on the rooftop of this rental.  Wow,  just wow!  Beautiful view from the rooftop as well as from inside the house of Stillwater and the river!  Pictures don't do this place justice!  VERY spacious for 8 of us!  Would recommend that anyone looking to visit Stillwater check this place out!  A gem right on Main Street.  You can park your car  (they give you parking permits, so super easy to find parking), you never have to get in your car until you checkout.  Great location in a fun city.  Thanks to these hosts, made this experience so wonderful!

My bridesmaids and I stayed at the lumberjack inn and had an absolute blast. I would stay here again in a heartbeat! The photos don’t do enough justice of how absolutely stunning this airbnb is! The rooftop patio was perfect for people watching and an amazing view. We walked to everything we did for the weekend, everything was perfectly close. Lots of really cute shops and amazing food around. The beds were extremely comfortable and the skylights in two of the rooms added a wonderful ambiance. Beautiful and well decorated bathrooms as well. The only thing I could think of that wasn’t perfect about our stay was the stairs to get in, my calves got a pretty good workout this weekend, but it’s to be expected with a loft style condo. Overall I don’t think I could’ve had a more perfect stay! Thank you to the hosts for making this weekend as comfortable and carefree as possible!

Overall, great place in a great location.  My family of 6 were in Stillwater for a wedding and this place exceeded our expectations. 
Location, location, location.  Bars, restaurants, the water, coffee shops - it’s all there within a few steps of their place.  
Only regret, wish I would have booked an extra night to experience Stillwater 1 more day.

Our stay was incredible! We (5 women)stayed for 2 nights 3 days the first week of June. Parking was easy, the condo had beautiful views, the beds were very comfy as well as the rooftop patio. We will stay at Lumberjack Inn when we return as it is an excellent location. Thank you to our hosts.

This was an incredible place for a girls weekend. All of our out of town guests fell in love with Stillwater. Location location location!!! The condo was beautiful with all amenities we needed and we were able to enjoy the rooftop patio the entire time. Would highly recommend!!!
Great location, beautiful facility and great people to work with. Ill be back

Had an opportunity to stay here for my friend’s bachelor party. This is a very convenient location in downtown Stillwater close to all the attractions. Anil and Sunny were extremely responsive from the time I booked the reservation through the day we all checked out. 
The rooftop deck is very nice even though we did not get a chance to fully utilize it due to weather. The utensils in the kitchen were hard to find because there are drawers within drawers in the kitchen. You can tell that Anil and Sunny invested in a nice setup for their guests and it shows! 
It can be a bit warm in the individual bedrooms so I would recommend brining a box fan for hot days if you are staying on the second floor in the summertime but we came prepared for that possibility and managed to stay cool at night in the upstairs bedrooms.
If you are looking to have a location right in downtown Stillwater for your stay, look no further. While this property is not inexpensive by any means it certainly is worth it!
Comfortable, clean, classy.  It was a wonderful place for we four sisters to spend time together!
Perfect experience!
Great location. Interesting space. Close to everything Stillwater!
Easily accommodates 4 couples, nicely decorated with full kitchen and appreciated the street access to restaurants and the river walk. Appreciated the quick response to address a minor detail.
Great location.

We stayed here for my bachelorette party! We loved how walkable everything was in downtown Stillwater. The owners let us check in early which was so nice! The door was a little finicky but they were super responsive and answered so promptly when issues arose! 
We had 10 girls and fit comfortably with 3 girls in king bed, 2 girls in each queen bed (3 total in the second floor loft), and 1 mattress in the main room. We loved the rooftop and main living space to hang out. It honestly is bigger and more spacious in person than pictures show. I was amazed when I walked in!!
Downsides: It was hard to find things in the kitchen, but got the hang of it the more we used them. The A/C seemed to be a little spotty and never quite figured it out but we survived and had a great time despite some areas being warmer than others!
This condo was amazing and the location was perfect for a girls weekend!  So much space and we had a group of 8.  The rooftop was picture perfect and so nice to have to enjoy the great weather.
Unbeatable location
This was the most perfect location for my sisters bachelorette. It was large, clean, and walking distance from everything. Everyone loved it!

Outstanding communication!
Lovely place and ideal location!
Rooftop is fantastic too.
Absolutely beautiful place. Great location!!!!! You won't be disappointed.
The place was gorgeous, and it worked  great for our group!

Such a perfect location to stay for a downtown Wedding! The view from the rooftop is 
Great! Sunny was wonderful to communicate with. She always responded quickly to my questions/requests.
Great loft, lots of space, would definitely go back again. They were very helpful and responsive which I appreciated.
It was a wonderful place to stay at the area Is also beautiful honestly no complaints

The place was beautiful and right in the middle of the downtown area. Plenty to do and see within walking distance. The hosts gave plenty of information and were available to answer any question. This was the best place to stay in Stillwater.
Rooftop was worth every penny we paid. Beautiful.
This place and its location was awesome! I was so impressed with the home and the decorations and the amenities and the rooftop. It was so gorgeous. I definitely marked this for a return.
The property was incredible and everything was very clearly spelled out + quick replies from the hosts on clarifications once I arrived!
The loft was such a great space! Inviting and very comfortable. The location is close to many shops and restaurants. We were able to walk everywhere we wanted to go.

We had a great stay!
The loft is beautiful and the location downtown is great.  The views from the rooftop are wonderful, we are looking forward to staying again in the summer!
Great people, super flexible and one of the more beautiful airbnbs I've stayed at.

My family traveled to Stillwater for a family event.  We were very happy with the accommodations.  Ample room, for  the five adults.  The layout was perfect, great views, and walkable to restaurants and shops.  Would definitely stay here again.

This was a lovely and hip rental right on Main Street. The view of the river was beautiful. The place had been restored from its past lives thoughtfully and beautifully. The whole family loved it! 
The master bedroom had blackout curtains and a firm mattress. The other bedrooms and loft upstairs all had bright skylights with no coverings, so that is something to keep in mind if you plan on sleeping in and are sensitive to light. All mattresses were medium firm to firm.
Easy to access location & so close to down town, yet felt very private!!
I'll absolutely be staying here again!

Perfect for our group in every way!  The rooftop deck gave us a birds-eye view of all the activity on Stillwater’s Main Street. The location, cleanliness, and amenities exceeded our expectations. I highly recommend this location.
Awesome living space/rooftop in an awesome location. Overlooking the river and easy to walk downtown. Host was very responsive and kind.

name: The Northwest Cottage
description:
Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space.

This beautiful single family home is tucked in a beautiful neighborhood. The rental unit is a lower level basement apartment. The entrance is shared and the host may be on sight.

detailed_reviews.comments: Julie was very welcoming and kind to me during my time here. Everything was great.
A good location, great place and Julie was a good host
Wonderful place. Wonderful host. Highly recommend.

name: Charming Savage Home w/ Yard: 18 Mi to Minneapolis
description: Your next rejuvenating retreat to Savage, Minnesota, awaits with a stay at this 3-bedroom, 2-bath vacation rental! Whether you're seeking outdoor adventures, shopping, dining, or family-friendly fun, this pet-friendly home has it all. Take a short drive to check out the Minnesota Zoo, hike the trails of the Minnehaha Regional Park, or explore the Mall of America in Minneapolis. After a day of adventure, head back home to relax by the fireplace and enjoy quality time with your loved ones.

neighbourhood.overview:
LOCAL HIGHLIGHTS: Wilkie Unit National Wildlife Refuge (6 miles), Valleyfair (8 miles), Canterbury Park (9 miles), Mystic Lake Casino (9 miles), Minnesota Zoo (10 miles), Edinborough Park (11 miles), Historic Fort Snelling (17 miles) 
OUTDOOR REC: Hidden Valley Park (0.5 miles), Murphy-Hanrehan Park Reserve (3 miles), Buck Hill Ski Resort (5 miles), Lakefront Park (7 miles), Hyland Hills Ski Area (11 miles), Mississippi National River & Recreation Area (13 miles), Hidden Falls Regional Park (18 miles), Minnehaha Regional Park (18 miles), Excelsior Commons (23 miles) 
MINNEAPOLIS (~18 miles): Mall of America, Grand Round Scenic Byway System, University of Minnesota, US Bank Stadium, Minneapolis Institute of Art, Stone Arch Bridge, Walker Art Center, Minneapolis Sculpture Garden, Target Field 
ST PAUL (~23 miles): Xcel Energy Center, Science Museum of Minnesota, Minnesota History Center, Cathedral of Saint Paul, Minnesota State Capitol, Como Park Zoo & Conservatory 
A

detailed_reviews.comments: My stay at this Airbnb was absolutely wonderful from start to finish. The host, Evolve, was incredibly accommodating and made sure I had everything I needed for a comfortable stay.

What a beautiful place to stay - private and peaceful, a gorgeous natural backyard,  beautifully decorated, comfy... a secluded getaway that's still close to everything. Would stay here again in a heartbeat and would recommend to anyone I know heading to the Twin Cities!
Great stay,  no issues and was close distance to everything nearby and close distance to get to the cities as well
The stay was short and met all our needs.
The place was clean and peaceful. The toilet paper wasn’t stocked so bought some. No big deal just information for host that it needs to be restocked before next visitors.

name: The Carriage House
description: Spacious Retreat: 3BR, Smart TVs, Deck w/ Fire Pit & Grill, Near Attractions!

neighbourhood.overview: Your surroundings: city. Activities you can do nearby: bicycle, bike trails, bird watching, cycling, downtown, golfing, miniature golf, movie theatres, outlet shopping, restaurants, swimming, theme park

name: Cozy Private Room in St. Louis
description:
Spacious Private Room with Ensuite Bathroom in a modern 2BD/2BA apartment.

Just steps from your front door, you'll find a dynamic mix of shops, restaurants, and cultural spots that keep the energy flowing and ensure you’ll never miss out on a good time.

Amenities:
+ Study room
+ Games room
+ Gym
+ TV lounge
+ Movie room
+ Dining room
+ Coffee bar
+ Laundry services
+ Bike storage
+ Elevator
+ CCTV
+ Keycard access
+ Parking (fees apply)

Check-in is only available during: 10:00 AM – 6:00 PM.

detailed_reviews.comments: Fred is a nice host, he answered all of my questions which were asked, one of genuine host in this country , service was great, thank you fred .

name: Lovely 3BD Near Parks & Downtown
description: 1900 sqft apartment available in the Lowry Hill/Kenwood. Steps from the Sculpture Garden and across from wooded bike/running path. Easy walk to downtown or uptown. Close to all major sights such as lakes, theater, convention center and Twins stadium.

neighbourhood.overview:
THE NEIGHBORHOOD

The home is located at the border of Lowry Hills and Kenwood. These are two of the most affluent neighborhoods in Minneapolis. The homes in the area are stunning! Walk around the Tudor, Victorian and Colonial mansions. The neighborhood is close to downtown and has easy access to the highway. Situated near Lake of the Isles, the streets are quiet and tree lined. 
-Walk over to Kenwood or Loring Park. Steps from the sculpture garden with the famous Claus Oldenburg sculpture of a spoon with a cherry. 
-'The Kenwood' is a great local spot for brunch or dinner with a fantastic 'farm to table' menu. 
-For a special night, book a table at nearby 'La Belle Vie'--Minneapolis' premiere fine dining spot. 
-'The Wedge' is the best food co-op in Minneapolis with lots of fruits and vegetables. 
-Bike down the Kenilworth trail to the baseball stadium and the hip warehouse district. 
-Use the lovely running/walking paths around the lake or on t

host.name: Eliza
host.about: I am a New Yorker who recently moved to Minneapolis. The city is great place to bike, eat Thai food and visit the co-ops. I am also an avid mushroom hunter if you need recommendations for foraging.

detailed_reviews.comments: I traveled to Minneapolis with a colleague for a meeting and EVERY hotel was taken...And it turned out to be a blessing in disguise. We found Eliza's apt on AirBnB and it could not have worked out better. We were central to everywhere we needed to be and the place provided us with a great environment to get work done. Thanks Eliza!

A few colleagues and I were exhibiting at a conference in Minneapolis, and all of the hotels were booked. Lucky for us this was the case, because we were able to stay at Eliza's amazing apartment. This place is a gorgeous large three bedroom apartment, with a spacious living room, separate dining room and full kitchen. We were pleasantly surprised when we first saw the space, and loved that we were able to stay here. Eliza is also incredibly helpful and the location is very close to downtown. Perfect place to stay while visiting the Twin Cities.
The apartment is spacious and well appointed.  The location is excellent for almost anything in Minneapolis.  Eliza was responsive and helpful.

This place was absolutely beautiful! As my first AirBNB experience, I could not have been happier!  Eliza was there waiting to give me a quick tour and hand over the keys. The place was spotless and clean, cozy and comfortable.  Just the right mix of classic elegance (huge, chunky leather couches and beautiful wood work) and modern amenities (a killer kitchen I wish I had at home).  All that tucked into a great neighborhood just seconds from downtown!  Loved it!

Great apartment. Super big with lots of room, great kitchen,bath, and bedrooms. Tastefully furnished and quiet. In a great neighborhood and of course Eliza was super nice and helpful.
I'll definitely stay here again when I'm in town.

We met up with another couple and our babies and this was the perfect spot for a relaxed weekend visit in Minneapolis. We were able to walk to the sculpture park/Walker Art Museum and Target Field for a Twins game. (The museum is down the block and stadium less than two miles.) The hilly neighborhood behind the condo has some breathtaking homes. We walked through it on our way back from Rye Deli - a lunch spot recommended by our host - and admired the spectacular architecture. 

The condo itself is very comfortable and clean with historic charm that's well-kept and updated. (Eliza even left some coffee for us, and the bathroom was stocked with shampoo for guests.) It was nice to have wifi and a TV and communal areas to hang out and share a meal.

The only hiccup was the key drop-off. Eliza was out of town and there was a slight miscommunication with the person who was supposed to let us in, so we waited for an hour outside. (He was inside but didn't hear the bell and we had the wrong numbers for each other.) It was my first airbnb experience, so I was nervous, but it definitely ended up working out just fine! 

We wished we'd decided to stay another day and are already thinking about a return visit! We'd definitely stay here again if it remains as affordable. A terrific value.
An absolutely lovely apartment in a beautiful neighborhood.
Absolutely stunning from any point of view!

This was my first experience using Airbnb. Eliza couldn't have been a better person to start with. She walked me through the whole process. My wife and I rented her apartment for our anniversary. It was a wonderful place to stay. Beautiful and minutes from everything Minneapolis and Uptown have to offer. Thanks for making our anniversary a great night. Loved the accommodations and would highly recommend.

Spacious, gorgeous and close to everything you want to be close to!  Room to spread out, and within two blocks of the Sculpture Garden.  Across the street from running/walking/biking trails, and about a 10 minute walk over the sculpture bridge to Loring Park and downtown.  

We enjoyed the early 20th century ambience of the place, the polished wood, updated kitchen, and large family dining room with plenty of storage space.

Kinda makes you want to move to Mpls!

Apartment was very clean and the pictures shown was just like in reality. Beds was comfortable and air condition worked very good. It is very close to uptown and fine restaurants. We went for groceries at The Wedge, an organic supermarket wich was just fabulous. All in all we are very happy with our stay and the communication with Eliza.

Myself and four of my friends stayed in Eliza's Minneapolis apartment for three nights while attending a conference. Our stay was excellent! Eliza is a great host and met us at the apartment early so we could drop our bags off ahead of time - once we returned, the apartment was comfortable and immaculate. The apartment is also conveniently located; it was just a short walk for us to go back and forth to the convention center. Overall, we all would definitely stay with Eliza again!
Everything was clean, easy and accessible. Very centrally located to downtown.
Just as advertised, hassle free with no surprises.
The apartment was great and we enjoyed our stay. We would definitely recommend!
Great host, great place - would definitely stay here again. Thanks for everything!
Nice, clean place. Around the corner to the Walker. In a quiet residential neighborhood. Don't think the listing mentions this, but it is on the second floor of a duplex apartment. Thumbs up!

Great place with lots of room 
The bedrooms were spacious and well decorated 
The kitchen had all of the amenities to make a nice dinner
It was close to shopping and restaurants

Absolutely would recommend! I am a Minneapolis resident, and chose this property to host my family based on its location; I knew it was in the right place, but was thrilled that the space was so functional and well-appointed. An upstairs unit in a lovely part of town.

We rented this space for a long-weekend family reunion for 2 single adult children, and two boomer (separated) parents. The condo gave us all enough room for ourselves and was a welcoming space for us to be together. The layout allows for early risers to get up, make coffee, and sit with the tv without disturbing those still sleeping (or in the opposite direction: stay up with a glass of wine and good conversation while others sleep soundly). 

We were in the space during a very cold spell in December (windchill - 18), and the home was warm, no drafts, and we could control the temperature ourselves. The beds were comfy and cozy, plenty of pillows and extra blankets available. The cabinets were stocked with spices so that we could cook at home. And Eliza was generously flexible with allowing me to stop in early to pick up the key for the unit since I happened to be in the area. 

The family is already talking about their next visit!
Great location and apartment with fantastic amenities. Eliza was a fantastic host and worked with my arrival changes day of! Would stay here again.

My husband and I rented Eliza's apartment for a Christmas visit to Minneapolis. We are familiar with the area having lived there for many years. The space was nice and homey. Kind of like having a home of our own while we were traveling. I would recommend it to a family also. Lots of space to get together, and more importantly, to get away from one another as needed. Comfortable mattresses and clean.

Eliza was an excellent host and made us feel so welcome! This is a beautiful and spacious apartment in a lovely neighborhood and close to a number of great Minneapolis attractions. I would definitely stay here again!

This was a good place for our family to stay over a reunion weekend.  There was plenty of room for all of us and the beds were comfortable.  The kitchen was nice and well stocked with pots and pans etc.  The neighborhood is well located.  We did shopping in the downtown area nearby and also walked around Lake of the Isles, 5 minutes away.
This apartment is listed as "luxury" and I would not consider it a luxury place.  The building is old, the woodwork and bathroom are not new either.  
Eliza was very responsive and good to work with.

We had the most delightful stay in Eliza's lovely house.  The spacious living room with its large windows is so comfortable and inviting.  We enjoyed several dinners in the formal dining room and found the kitchen a perfect space for preparing food.  With 3 bedrooms, there was ample space for our family!
The location is perfect - right by the Walker Theatre and a reasonable walking distance to downtown.  Eliza was great about responding to all my emails.  She was there right on time for our arrival and the place was just as she has described it in the write-up.   The whole experience of staying in an air BnB was excellent!

The duplex was beautiful, spacious, and clean. I came with two co-workers for a conference and we saved a good amount of money compared to a hotel. The place is steps from the Walker Art Center and a couple of blocks from Loring Park, where you can find good restaurants and bars. My more ambitious colleague enjoyed running around Lake of the Isles every morning and looking at the beautiful houses around it. 

Eliza was friendly and responsive throughout the process and made sure we were comfortable and happy. I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again!

We stayed at Eliza's while remodeling our house and it was great! Beautiful space, lots of room, quiet.  I really enjoyed listening to the birds with a cup of coffee in the morning sitting on the front porch! Thanks Eliza !

This apartment met our needs for a graduation celebration and we are glad we made this choice. The description and pictures were true to what we found. The location worked perfectly--close to downtown and uptown. Eliza met us according to our schedule and graciously accommodated a last minute request.  She left helpful hints for restaurants and maps of the area and sites to see. We would definitely stay here again!

Everything about our stay was perfect! The location could not have been any better for attending our conference at the Walker Art Center. The house is beautiful and quite spacious. The kitchen had everything we needed, comfy beds, and great sitting areas. Eliza was there when we arrived, told us about nearby food stores (The Wedge was great), and made us feel very welcome.
Great location, very nice duplex.  Eliza was great and met us us upon our arrival to show us around the house.  Everything was very neat and clean and it all worked out so well!

Excellent location and very spacious apartment made for a great stay!  Eliza was helpful and informative.  About the only suggestion we could make is for some attention to the cleanliness of the basement laundry area, especially the staircase down there!
Everything was as stated.  Nice quiet area and would rent again.

This is a really nice apartment on the second floor of a house in a  quiet area close to the Walker Art Gallery. It is well furnished, very clean and very comfortable. The host is responsive and accessible.
Our stay was great! Very large and well appointed apartment. The location was great and we enjoyed the walker art center and Lowry hill neighborhood. Would definitely recommend!
Relaxing visit. Well equipped apartment. Attentive host.
I enjoyed my stay. Great location.  Spacious, room for everyone. Exactly as advertised. I didn't know there was going to be another man named Ernesto with me during my stay, but he was kind.
Great apartment and an excellent host.
