We were in town for Grandma's Marathon and needed a place to stay before heading up to Duluth. We're so happy we found this stay! Everything was clean, easy to find, and beautiful! Rudy and Kealani were extremely friendly, providing local recommendations and letting us check-in early to accommodate work meetings. I highly recommend!

We have stayed in a few air bnb’s and I have to say this was the best one so far! Everything was very clean and organized, and all of the little extras made us feel right at home. The location was perfect and the parking was stress free. Definitely worth what we paid and made our trip much less stressful 😊

We had an amazing stay here! Kealani & Rudy were VERY friendly & responsive to any questions or concerns! The bed was soooo comfortable & bathroom was beautiful! They had the place very cooled down once we arrived which was SO NICE in this heat! Overall, 10/10 recommend staying here if you’re in the St. Paul area! Thanks Kealani!
The NICEST hosts we’ve ever had. They were so kind. The space was adorable and in a fantastic location. We loved walking and running the bridge right next to the property.
Amazing little spot! Comfortable and so so nice. The hosts were attentive and kind. The drinks and snacks were so nice! Would definitely stay again.
If you need a long term place or short term, here is your airbnb

We loved everything about this place! From seeing the gatitos in the window on our walk back home to the friendly interactions with the hosts, this was our favorite stop on my 40th birthday road trip! I hope to come back someday!

Great place to stay! Kealani was very friendly and helpful, great recommendations for restaurants and things to do. The room itself was very clean, organized, and stocked. No complaints at all! We will definitely be booking here again if/when we make our way back to the area!

Kealani was extremely helpful with clear instructions on how to find the location, recommendations for restaurants, and very responsive. The Airbnb was beautiful and cozy. 
10/10

Sparkling clean, comfortable and stylish space with extremely thoughtful and responsive hosts!  The host's kind and intuitive extra touches and amenities were greatly appreciated and I would
happily stay again on my next visit to the Twin Cities.

Kealani and Rudy’s place was one of the best places we’ve ever stayed on a trip! The location is on an interestingly laid out street, that feels quiet and peaceful but is steps from amazing breweries and restaurants. And they were super friendly and communicative, which helped us feel welcome and at ease after hours of driving. A few notes about the place: they have clearly put a lot of love and hard work into this cozy place, and it was obvious as they left us drinks and snacks in the fridge, supplies on the side of the bed, and other intuitive and helpful things (morning coffee, a well-organized list of restaurant and other recommendations, and other items) that helped make us feel right at home! Honestly I wasn’t ready to check out, and would love to stay at their place again. Highly recommend this gem! -Mike and Michael and our pup

Perfect place for our one night stay in Saint Paul! Google took us right to the front door. The hosts responded to every message within minutes and answered every question.  They are a super sweet couple and you can tell they put a lot of love and sweat equity into their property. The bed was super comfy and the bathroom is ginormous! The place is super walkable - we walked easily to a lovely Italian restaurant and two breweries in just a few minutes. We also appreciated the snacks! We would highly recommend this place without hesitation!
The place was great and relaxing. Kealani thought of everything. Would book again if traveling that way. Well worth what you pay😊.
muchas gracias,  excelente lugar !

Kealani and Rudy’s place is probably the best AirBNB I’ve stayed in, and I’ve been to a lot during my travels. They communicated well, were there to help, and even had free snacks and drinks (are they angels???? Likely). I definitely will be checking their place’s availability first next time I’m in the Twin Cities for either work or personal time.
We enjoyed our stay at such a comfortable suite! Thank you for hosting us!

The place was perfect for our overnight stay in St. Paul to see SIX the Musical at Ordway. Kealani and Rudy had nice little touches in the place (welcome board, a select choice of drinks and snacks, and a guide book to the area.

What a great spot! So close to ask the things you'd want to do in the area. The hosts were super responsive and flexible. Snacks saved the day after getting back super late from a music festival. I will definitely stay again!
Great spot to stay near 7th St! My fiancé and I really enjoyed the space! The hosts were very accommodating for an early check-in and very friendly! Would definitely stay again!

We very much enjoyed our short but lovely stay - and with so many walkable spots to explore, we wish we could have stayed longer! Should we get the chance to return to St. Paul again, we would certainly seek out this lovely spot and these kind hosts.

The studio is in a charming neighborhood in St. Paul- full of sites, restaurants, and attractions within walking distance. The layout and amenities were incredibly thoughtful and the space was perfect for my husband and I! It was a highlight of our trip.

We very much enjoyed our stay—the area was super quiet and had tons of things to walk to! Our hosts were absolutely amazing and this had to be one of the best airbnbs that my partner and I have stayed at! The hosts were so friendly and accommodating, not to mention how safe and welcome they made us feel as a queer couple! If you are looking for a cozy and relaxing stay, this is the place to be! Thank you again for hosting us! 💕

One of my favorite BnBs ever! So cute and clean and exactly what we needed for a little weekend stay! Kealani was so helpful and quick to respond to any question I had. The little snacks and drinks were such a. Fun hospitable touch too! Felt right at home. Can’t wait to go back!
Kealani’s place was great! So comfortable and so many amenities! One of the best airbnbs we’ve ever stayed in

Felt like arriving at my parents house and letting myself in to the basement rooms out of their way.  something really charming about that. heard no noise my whole stay but in the morning as I stood in the garden the cats greeted me from the windows above. fantastic 
will visit again soon
We were pleasantly surprised at the way this place made us feel right at home. We will be back.
So wish we had more time in this lovely spot - if you want to be in West Seventh, this is the place!
Well apportioned space with great welcome snacks. Fun and scenic neighborhood. Lea and Rudy were helpful and responsive hosts. We’d stay there again!

Excellent place! It was raining when we got to town and Rudy and Kealani responded immediately to let us know it was totally fine to check in early and quickly popped out to help when we used to wrong number to get into the space. The space itself is lovely- thoughtfully supplied with snacks and beverages,  large bathroom with a shower with excellent water pressure, modern and comfortable aesthetics. We especially loved the fenced in backyard! Would stay here again!

Location was great for us as we were going to the Minnesota state fair and drove to a nearby church to park and ride to the fair. Kealani posted photos of how to get into her place which was extremely helpful. We appreciated the variety of drinks and snacks available AND the half and half for our coffee. Kealani gave us recommendations for dinner, and we walked to Burger Moe's the first night. The next night we went to Pizza Luce, a short drive from the bnb. Both places were excellent.

Our stay was wonderful. Bed was comfortable, the shower with the rainfall feature is awesome, the room is spacious and tastefully decorated. I was so impressed with all the thoughtfull touches in the place. Truly have everything you need for a few nights. We didn't get a chance to walk to the near by restaurants or over the pretty bridge but that's also a great perk! We will for sure be back to stay!!

Staying at Kealani’s was an absolute pleasure—the space was easily accessible and clean. We really appreciated her local recommendations. She even let us pick cherry tomatoes from her garden (which were delicious!)
We had a wonderful stay! The hosts,  property and location were all amazing. We were able to walk to Xcel center for a concert with no problem! I would definitely stay here again!

Literally the best airbnb I've stayed in. Kea and Rudy are the most attentive hosts, from snacks and drinks to the awesome guide book they provide. The shower is amazing, the bed is so comfy, and they are always ready to help with anything. They are truly the best! Book this place!

We had a wonderful stay for a friend’s wedding in St. Paul. The location was incredibly convenient to the venue and there were also many great places to eat close by. One of our favorites was a restaurant called Gus Gus. Parking was convenient and the airbnb was easy to locate. It is in the basement, so take caution going down the stairs. I love that they had an info binder for guests. My one critique is that there isn’t much natural lighting and can be a little dark. Overall the space was clean and Kealani was super communicative and accommodating. She also kindly provided complimentary drinks and snacks for us. I most appreciated that there was half & half and non-dairy creamer in the fridge. Of all the airbnbs I have stayed at that provide coffee, very rarely do they have sweetener/creamer. If we find ourselves in St. Paul, we would definitely stay here again!
really enjoyed my stay and everything was Top Notch would definitely visit again
Kealani's place was great, local activities and tourist attractions like MOA and the zoo's and the restaurants around the area are great!!!
Absolutely stunning and beautiful studio, they were very considerate! I would definitely recommend this to anyone who’s visiting Minneapolis/Minnesota area!

My boyfriend and I had great stay at Kealani and Rudy’s Airbnb!  It’s in a very cute neighborhood that is very driveable and walkable, and the space was very cozy, clean, and comfortable. We would definitely stay again :)

We loved staying with Kealani and Rudy! This place is near many restaurants, breweries, activities. They even had snacks and drinks ready for us and our stay. They are extremely friendly and welcoming. We would definitely love to stay here again and highly recommend their place!
Absolutely perfect for my girlfriend and I’s one night stay in St. Paul. Very clean and economical space. Beautiful bathroom and all around great. Will be returning!
We loved the neighborhood  and the place was perfect for us!!
Kea and Rudy were very accommodating to our need for early checkin since we arrived at airport too early. Their room was one of the best we’ve seen anywhere we’ve been.
Very nice cute place!
A charming and perfect stay. The hosts are SO kind and helpful. Quick and easy walk to downtown and a beautiful neighborhood. Would absolutely stay here again

Cute, quaint and cozy place.  Friendly hosts.  Nice and safe neighborhood.  Within walking distances of some of their favorite recommendations - which we took advantage of.  Always nice when the recommendations turn out to be superb.  We stayed 2 nights and it was perfect for our itinerary and then some.

The perfect Airbnb if you are looking for “home away from home”. Had everything we could have needed & more. It is very clear that this space was put together by people who love to travel for people who love to travel. Informative guest book, walkable distance to shops, food, and the excel arena. 
We absolutely will be rebooking when we find another reason to come back to the city!

This would be in my top tier for stays.  I liked the decor, the ease of checking in, and the recommendations.  I'm also very sensitive to odors and there wasn't any smell of artificial fragrance or mildew, etc.   Great sleep!  I'd definitely love to return if in the area.

Daughter and I stayed here for a concert at Xcel. This was perfect for 2 people and we felt safe walking. The host was fantastic, responsive and very friendly to talk to upon arrival. The Airbnb was adorable and exactly as described down to hearing and seeing the cat! We appreciated the snacks, drinks, local recommendations, and provided amenities. The airbnb was clean and had a  comfortable bed.  Ear plugs were provided, there was ample amount of lights and outlets. We would stay again if we are ever in need!
Exactly what we hoped for. Easy and quick walk to Xcel Center, great amenities, friendly host, amazing mattress, fresh and clean bathroom- wouldn't change a thing. Will recommend over and over.
Great location, hosts were easy to communicate with, and the place was perfect for our needs. Would definitely stay here again!

Kealani was amazing! Full of great knowledge from eating and drinking recommendations to neighborhood lore. So friendly and kind. The Airbnb was clean, cozy, and well decorated. Would absolutely stay again. Don’t think twice just book it!
Great location for a concert at the Xcel Center. Kind and responsive hosts, and lovely place to stay!

One of the best bathroom that I’ve seen 
Thank you again for this cozy place 
Will comeback without doubt.
very beautiful place! super clean and easy to check into. would definitely come back.

The bed was SO COZY- I wish we could’ve taken it home with us LOL! We loved their decor and the overall feel was so nice. There’s a LOT of things to do within walking distance— especially if you’re there for a hockey game! It was only a 15 minute walk. We didn’t have to go through the hassle of finding a place to park or deal with traffic. We will definitely be staying here again if we come back for any more games!

Everything about our stay was perfect. The hosts are very easy to communicate with. The space is cute and cozy. It is in a basement area, so not a whole lot of natural light, but there is a nice egress window by the bed. The bathroom is amazing! Nice size, lots of hooks to hang towels, etc on. And the shower...I wish it was mine! We appreciated their local guide with favorite places, the provided snacks, and the beverages. The neighborhood is great. Walkable to so many places, including the Xcel center. We walked there for a concert. We never felt that it was unsafe to do so. Two GREAT breweries within a block. We will book again in the future!

Friendly hosts, even checked to make sure we made it safely. Space was clean and extremely comfortable. Provided snacks and a binder full of local restaurants, activities, etc. would absolutely stay again.
Great Host

She was super friendly and welcomed us right away:) The location is beautiful right off a little park and bridge (but not busy road noise!) over all it was amazing and would definitely come beck loved this location, amazing walk to the Xcel Center!
Great host and place to stay.

Amazing location and close to everything in downtown St. Paul! The hosts were responsive, friendly, and provided a lot of amenities including toiletries, hair dryer, snacks, and water. The place was clean and inviting and when we had downtime we were able to relax while enjoying Netflix provided by the hosts!  I highly recommend staying here, and I cannot wait to go back!  Thank you so much for such a wonderful stay!

Fantastic stay! The location was perfect—close to everything we needed yet quiet and relaxing. The space was cozy, comfortable, and beautifully decorated, making it feel like a home away from home. The hosts went above and beyond, providing thoughtful snacks and amenities that added a special touch to our visit. They were sweet, lovely, and made us feel so welcome. Highly recommend this gem of a property!

My stay at Kealani and Rudy's place was thoroughly pleasant and enjoyable, and I plan on staying here again in the future.
The space is quiet, clean and comfortable, and I felt welcomed by both hosts. I was able to meet them both as I arrived, and Kealani communicated well. 
The shower feels like it belongs in a very expensive home - dark tiles, spacious, good pressure,  and two options for shower head. 
For me it was a really relaxing space and just what I needed. I am grateful that I found this place in St. Paul. 
Thank you Kealani and Rudy, you are very welcoming hosts.
The place is exactly like the photos. Very clean.  It was comfortable and had a very nice bed.  Hosts are very friendly.  I recommend staying here.

Had a great stay again! Kealani was extremely friendly and communicative! The space was very clean and organized and we love the location, very close to restaurants and activities. We will definitely book again in the future!

I really enjoyed my stay.  The unit was clean and welcoming.  I felt comfortable and there were plenty of snacks, coffee, water, and even a couple beers in the fridge.  I wish the bed was a bit more comfortable. But overall, I would stay here again.
My stay with Kaelani and Rudy could not have been better. Thank you both

This was my second stay with Kaelani and Rudy, and they have been great hosts in every way possible. They handled a last minute reservation (well, two actually:) ) with understanding and ease. 
I find this place peaceful and relaxing, and each visit has been a genuinely enjoyable stay. 
You will feel welcome and appreciated here.
Thank you both again!
Loved the little space you guys provided for us! Thank you soo much!

This was our second time stay with Kealani and Rudy. We got the pleasure of speaking with Kealani briefly when we arrived and she was so kind in giving us recommendations and asking us about our travels. 
Couldn’t recommend this place enough. It’s our favorite place to stay when we are in the area.
This was a lovely little gem of a place! I would absolutely stay here again. Lots of little extras, super clean and really cozy! I had a great stay!
My husband and I had a great night away! We had grand plans to go out on the town but once inside the cozy Airbnb , we decided DoorDash, shower and movies! It was the perfect night!
Had a wonderful experience at the Bnb, the host were friendly and responsive. The pictures matched EXACTLY what I expected it to be. 10/10 and recommend to all!!

This place was exactly what I was looking for and needed! It was super cute and all my needs were anticipated. I had a relaxing and easy stay and would happily stay again. Plus, I'm feeling inspired about my own basement in an old house!
great place! loved the personal touches, snacks, etc. hosts were very responsive! bnb was walkable to all the places we wanted to eat, shop, and the xcel energy center!
Nice location within walking distance to Xcel energy center great host. Thanks again.
We loved our stay! The place is adorable and in a perfect location. Kea is a wonderful host with helpful information and VERY responsive. If ever back here, we would definitely stay again!

Wow, I cannot even put into words how much thought and care Kealani has put into this space! We felt welcomed from the moment we arrived. So many sweet little touches for guests and the complimentary items were great! Very close to Xcel Energy and all of the nearby breweries and restaurants. If we are ever back in the area we’d book again in a heart beat!

Kealani was so kind and welcoming!!! We came for a hockey game and shopping and it was a great place within walking distance of the excel center and within a 10 minute drive of the MOM!!! Would recommend 100x!!!!
Was a great place and environment, Excellent location and great communication.

Stayed here for a few nights and it was one of the most comfortable Airbnb's I have stayed in! The location was great for tons of things to do, along with privacy. Kealani designed the place with a lot of random touches, and it made the place extremely relaxing. It had pretty much everything you needed for a stay, and Kealani provided snacks and drinks! She was very responsive and answered any questions I needed. The bed was super comfy and cozy, but one of the coolest things was the shower! Overall, everything was clean, convenient to get around to, and just a comfortable place to stay. Highly recommend.
Kealani was a fantastic host- she thought of everything!  This will be our go to place anytime we are in the area overnight.  Wonderful experience!

We had the opportunity to have a weekend together without the kiddos - Kealani & Rudy’s place was the perfect spot to come & relax!  We walked to Bad Weather Brewery to catch their shuttle to the Wild game.  If it wasn’t raining, we certainly could have walked to the Xcel center from the house!  Both mornings we walked to Hope Breakfast Bar, which was excellent.  Kealani was quick to respond to any questions & checked in to make sure we had what we needed!  The space was very clean, private & cozy!  We will absolutely stay here again!!

I stayed for a week while in St. Paul for a 60hr in person law school finals week. The space was everything I needed. I would absolutely stay there again! Hosts are
Incredibly friendly and I  certain if I ever needed anything they’d be first to help me figure it out! Beautiful space, comfortable bed, and hot shower plus little extras made it feel like a retreat at the end of a long 10-12hr day in class.
Kealani was willing to help with anything as needed. The place was very nice and clean and everything that we expected.

This space was so well decorated and planned. We loved that everything we could have needed was available. The neighborhood recommendations were great. We’ll definitely stay again next time we’re in the area!
Great place. good communication from the hosts.
Clean comfortable space. Comfortable bed. Good location.
St Paul’s streets are laid out weird so it’s a little tricky to find but worth it.
Will be back
Good area

My husband and I loved our stay at Kealani and Rudy’s place! It was so comfortable and had everything we needed. We loved the set up and how it was decorated. And wow, that shower was amazing! The location is great and we love how it is so walkable. We plan to return in the future!
I really enjoyed staying here - although I was mostly just there to sleep. There's so much to do around that neighborhood! I was very comfortable there at night! definitely recommend!
We loved the neighborhood recommendations!
Super cozy space and friendly, helpful hosts!
Really wonderful place, I would definitely recommend visiting and exploring around with your loved ones.

Had a great stay here earlier this month. The studio is a good size for one, with well thought out details and a amazing shower. 
Location is convenient with many restaurants and bars in walking distance, and area is pleasantly low key and pretty. 
Highly recommend and would stay here again for sure

This is a basement unit. The unit gives off a dampness as well as smell. The host was informed of the smell and dampness & told me it was not. Also, the walkway was full of debris from outside, which the owner stated is natural because of the walkway. However, failed to sweep it up upon arrival. Finally, the bedding was uncomfortable. All which was mentioned to the host and she challenged my entire experience.
Loved staying here! Perfect!

It was a really beautiful space! The hosts provided a multitude of things from earbuds to snacks. The hosts also responded to any questions we had very quickly. The space is a wonderful place to come back to after a busy day of adventuring around the cities! It was very easy to access and clean.
The space is adorable and private. Hosts were great! We loved our quick stay here.

Fantastic host!  We had a great stay!  Everything was well thought out and prepared. Very appreciative of the coffee bar & snacks.  Kealani was expeditiously responsive, very friendly and super accommodating.  The studio was spacious & comfortable and the outside space was a great little spot to sit out for some fresh air.  We really enjoyed our stay.  🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

Absolutely loved staying here! The aesthetic of the Airbnb was very inviting and cozy. The place was incredibly clean and exactly what we needed for 2 people. I loved the walk in shower. Kealani was an amazing communicator and I would absolutely stay here again. :)

Kaelani and Rudy's Airbnb was an excellent stay! A tidy, charming space in a great part of town right next to the river and within walking distance to great restaurants, breweries, and bars.
The hosts went above and beyond offering complimentary snacks and refreshments, as well as great personalized recommendations for places to go during my stay. They were very helpful and communicative.
I can't recommend staying with them enough!
Kealani's place was fantastic! They've truly thought of everything. I felt very well taken care of and would absolutely stay again.

My husband and I enjoyed our stay! The space is located in the basement of the hosts house with separate private entrance. While small, the area is well decorated and clean, with very thoughtful amenities provided by the host. It was all the room we needed and we would definitely stay again. It was very quiet and cozy with no noise from upstairs…maybe could hear footsteps occasionally but certainly no issue. The location was perfect for us with numerous restaurants in walking distance. The neighborhood is very cute and the host provided great local recommendations. On-street parking was easy and always available. If you are very tall, a larger person, or have mobility issues, you may struggle with the small, narrow stairway entrance. Check in and check out were a breeze and the host is extremely responsive. Highly recommend and I’m so glad we chose this place to stay!

Kealani and Rudy’s place was awesome. It was a great place to walk into after a long day of travel, with the kindest little touches everywhere! The shower is AMAZING and was one of our favorite parts of  the stay, as well as the extremely comfortable bed! They left excellent recommendations for the area, making our stay a blast. We can’t wait to come back!

Kaelani was super responsive and helpful. I ended up staying in the area last minute with my daughter, so feeling safe and secure was honestly a blessing. 
The place was nicely updated and even though it's a basement studio you can't hear much coming from upstairs. My daughter loved all the complimentary snacks and beverages, it was nice after a long road trip! 
Would definitely stay here again!
Great stay, great neighborhood. Hope to be back soon!

name: Huge private guest suite
description: Huge guest suite + NEW private bath in a shared, charming 4br house in the heart of the city.  Lower level 450 sq ft. room in the quietest part of the house. Just minutes away from: US Bank Stadium, the Greenway, Global Market, Downtown, Eat Street, Lyn-Lake, & Uptown. Beautifully appointed with a mix of new and vintage style. Memory foam mattress, quality linens, organic toiletries. Coffee, tea and light breakfast items available. 3 other rooms available-check my other listings.

neighbourhood.overview: This is a very diverse urban neighborhood. Most popular areas are within a 10 minute drive. We are very close to Abbott and Children's Hospital making this an ideal locale for traveling healthcare professionals.

host.name: Zhauna
host.about: (And husband Daniel) We are an artistic couple. A hairdresser and a performing artist born and raised in Minneapolis, transplanted in NY in 2004, then back to Minneapolis in 2017. Often described as the "hosts with the most" we are friendly and laid back in just the right (non-annoying) way. Or so our friends say.

detailed_reviews.comments: Man where do I begin! Lol This was by far the best airbnb I’ve stayed at for an extended period of time. Zhauna is amazing! No matter what time of night she can be reached and the house manager Deb is an absolute gem! Definitely stop and have some conversations with her if you ever see her while there. I’m a travel medical assistant and they were extremely accommodating and the amenities that were included definitely was a perk! Deb comes daily to do the laundry, general cleaning and to make sure the included amenities like coffee, sparkling water, almond milk and yogurt are stocked and for your use. Anything that needs their attention just let either of them know and they jump right on it. The location is perfect in my opinion, about a 5-7 minute walk to Abbott northwestern hospital, about an 8 minute drive to the target and Cubs and ALDI on East lake street. There are buses 1-2 blocks that will get you many places but if you want to really roam around I would recommend bringing your car or renting one. Other then that the location is quiet and safe near a Main Street but not crazy busy. House is clean and well accommodated, laundry in the basement soap provided. My room was the suite in the basement across from the laundry room very spacious and cozy in the summer and winter time I was there from (11/29-05/22).
Perfect

Stayed at Zhauna’s for 2 month in the basement level and I can only speak positive of my experience.  I have meet all three, hosts and co-host, and they are super people, helpful in every way to accommodate their guests and make ones stay as pleasant as possible. Zhauna provides all the amenities, along with some courtesy items, to cook ones own meals if one choses to do so; very economical.  Almost every day  Deb comes in cleans the common areas and restock items. I have even made friends with some of guests, and unexpected nice plus. 
All in all, its has been a great experience staying at Zhauna’s and I can highly recommend it for what is offered and the price.

A really great spacious room, I felt super relaxed any time I was in it. A quiet neighbourhood in walking distance (if you don’t mind longer walks!) of downtown. House was comfortable and filled with nice touches. Hosts were lovely and accommodating.

We had a great time staying in the lower-level suite. It was spacious with lovely decorations.  Zuauna provided all kinds of supplies for her guests in the kitchen, bathroom, and in our suite. The house was clean and the two other guests that were there during our stay always cleaned after themselves.  The house gets sufficient sunlight during the day and is well-designed. If I had any questions or needed anything, I texted Zhuana and she responded immediately.  The house is located a few blocks away from Nicollet St. where you can find a variety of bars and restaurants.  However, I didn't feel very safe walking at night on East Lake St.
One of the best (:
Absolutely amazing, clean, awesome neighborhood. Beyond comfy environment. Thank you for having me!
great location, room is comfy and spacious.
The room is great, a big space and quiet.  Buses services very convenient. The kitchen clean and handy.
Great space to relax after work, and really cozy for studying. Close to shops and restaurants. Always very clean!
Good

Amazing spot! Very spacious private guest suite with plenty of room to yourself, and some beautiful and light-filled communal spaces on the main floor. I loved being able to walk down to restaurants on Lake Street and Eat Street, or hop on the greenway for a run.
This place is excellent to stay, value for price, I will stay there anytime needs be, and recommend for others.
Outstanding and gorgeous building I’ll definitely return!

this was a great place to stay, wonderful homey feel, and very comfortable. perfect place to warm up after experiencing the Minneapolis cold. we were close enough to downtown and other area attractions but far enough our to be friendly on the wallet. would definitely considering staying again if I'm up this way again.

This was a comfortable longer-term stay that exceeded expectations. It's clean, spacious, and the complementary items (sparkling water, granola bars, etc.) are a nice touch. The basement has an open laundry room and toilet across from this room with privacy curtains. The kitchen has basic utensils, pots, pans, silverware and dishes to use. There are opportunities to meet other people staying there and it's easy to communicate with Zhauna or Deb if anything comes up.
fantastic place. host was very polite, room was great. would definitely stay again!

Extremely convenient and well-appointed home. Everything has been thought through to make it feel like a true home away from home. Would highly recommend for anyone hoping to make any extended stays in the Minneapolis area.
Very convenient location and spacious room!
Nice place, kind and available hosts!
This place is great value for what you get. Unique home, good shower, lots of space in the basement. The host left out snacks and was really nice.

Lovely peaceful large studio. Great value. Quick and easy contact with Zhauna. Everything was clean and well taken care of.
Highly recommend.

This house was immaculate and well cared for.  Deb was there often to put out clean towels, to tidy up and other things!  I liked how things like the fridge and cupboards were labeled specifically for which room you occupied!

My stay was very pleasant. Everything is very clean and well equipped. All the people I had the pleasure to meet were very nice. Good access to the city and good parking on the street. Would come again

I booked the place based on its location, reviews, and price. I barely looked at the photos. When I walked into the giant suite downstairs, my jaw hit the floor. Everything was perfect! I had so much space to myself and I slept like a baby. The owners couldn’t have been more accommodating. I visit Minneapolis often and would love to stay here again.
Great location, tidy and quiet would stay again.

Stayed in the lower level suite for 4 months while working in the cities. The space was always clean and I loved the privacy of being on a separate level. Some things that stood out to me: separate locks on all the guests doors, lovely plants and spaces around the house for reading, a clean bathroom, clean linens, filtering water pitcher for your room, full kitchen with a light breakfast provided, clean washer and dryer,  and only 15 min from MSP airport.

Zhauna’s space was just as lovely as the pictures and description. A pretty good location with street parking. I saw another review with a disclaimer about ambulance traffic due to the nearby hospital — I only heard one go by during my stay, don’t be too concerned about being disrupted. I travel to the twin cities often and would absolutely stay here again.
Great place for what I need to do. I'm coming back soon.

我居住的这间是地下室，房间很大正如照片提供的，但是会和楼上二楼的三间客房一起公用卫生间，洗漱洗澡需要到楼上。地下室的洗衣房内有一个简易的马桶，如果地下室的卫生间能完善就更好了。
晚上楼上有时候会有脚步声，以及附近救护车的声音，不过这个看个人是否可以接受。
这边离机场比较近15分钟，附近可以乘坐公交车去超市，交通便利。
房东提供的早餐补充品，如燕麦片，牛奶饮品，非常不错👍。
Great place! I'm coming back again.

I stayed in the newly renovated basement suite, and I could not of been happier. The room was large and comfortable which helped it not feel like I was in a basement. I had my own bathroom that was very nice and clean. It even had a heater in the bathroom! I was never bothered by anyone the entire time I was there. There was complimentary food and coffee which was a lifesaver! The other guests staying there (which I did not see ever) also made sure to clean up after themselves too. 
Overall, I had a wonderful stay and whenever I had a question they were quick to respond. 11/10!

Clean, comfortable and a great, central location. Very friendly, responsive and concerned hosts. Plenty of street parking in front. The house has been renovated beautifully. If I ever come back to  Minneapolis this is my spot.
Great place to stay for a few days. It’s a basement unit so it’s quite dark even during the day but if you’re just using it as a place to sleep it’s perfect.

Great stay. The room was clean with everything necessary in it. The house is nice and it's easy to get to downtown from there (10min uber ride or plenty of buses- walking distance). Thank you so much for your hospitality:)

I had a great stay. The space is clean and the room itself is huge. All the common areas were kept clean and tidy as well. It’s in a great location just a bit outside the city but still close. Would definitely recommend!
Wonderful stay with a very comfortable bed! Zhauna gave us great insights for our short stay and was very accommodating. Great place!
Great stay
This was hospitable, clean and well managed. Came for a weekend event in the neighborhood.

Very cool spot to live in and experience what the Twin Cities have to offer! The host are super responsive and the room / bathroom were super clean! Sincerely this is a great place to stay… Highly recommended. Enjoy!
Such a reliable place. This is the 2nd time I’ve booked this place for a weekend event and I will continue to come back here if I ever plan on coming to Minneapolis again. !!!

I had a lovely stay! Everything was very clean and well kept, and Zhauna was incredibly helpful, responsive, and kind when it came to answering questions I had about the surrounding area and the city itself. Would definitely recommend!

I felt right at home on the spacious guest suite in the basement. The private bathroom is accross the hall and the kitchen with a designated place to store your food is available. You share the house with other guests and to my delight one of the guests attended the same aeminar as I did!
She was really helpful and kind. Her instructions were simple and clear.
Zhauna is very communicative and this place is right for someone looking for private place.
Exactly as described and was perfect for our needs. Very responsive and accommodating a late check out as well. Would come back again!
It was good
Nice big room.  Easy walk to the hospital for work.
Great stay!

It was pretty great. Exactly what was in the description and what we wanted. There were also a decent amount of bus stops around so the location was nice. Also, appreciated the free granola bars and other breakfast stuff.
Very clear instructions, place is as described online. Zhauna was very responsive and helpful too.
Habitación cómoda y con amplio espacio, muy ordenado todo.
Zhauna was an amazing, accommodating host and her place is clean, comfortable, and homely. Would definitely consider coming back again
Amazing host, goes above and beyond. Very quick to respond and is very helpful with any questions or worries.
Great spacious spot!
This was a terrific stay, especially for a basement. The bed was comfy, shower was good, it was a nice space.

name: Retro Vegas Style Oasis
description: Step into a time capsule of 1970s charm with our two-bedroom main-level townhouse, where the spirit of vintage Las Vegas lives on. Located in a quiet neighborhood, yet just minutes away from the excitement of St Paul and Minneapolis, our home offers a unique blend of comfort and nostalgia. Wifi & streaming services are ready for you! Only 7 minutes from White Bear Lake. Less than 15 minutes to St. Paul, 20 minutes to Minneapolis and MSP airport, and 25 minutes to Stillwater/Hudson.

host.name: Lisa
host.about: I am a wellness and empowerment professional with my own company. I often travel and enjoy curating beautiful spaces that feel homey and personal. I believe in intentional hospitality, thoughtful communication, and unique touches. One of my favorite things about Airbnb over staying in a hotel is being able to drop into the vibe of a city; finding a lovely studio to practice yoga, the best place to get an Americano, the local market to pick up groceries and cook at home, and the nearest park to people watch on a bench. Hotels don't give you a 'home' feeling like Airbnb does. I take special care for my guests to enjoy the city and feel at home when they visit my spaces, and I love experiencing hosts who do the same for me when I travel. Please visit my guidebooks for the best of my home state, Minnesota!

amenities: HDTV with Amazon Prime Video, Hulu, Roku

detailed_reviews.comments: Very cute and unique, clean place in a quiet neighborhood. Loved the decor and how welcoming the space felt. Had games and stickers for the family to stay entertained plus all the amenities!! They thought of everything. Fully stocked kitchen had everything we needed to make us feel right at home .
Lisa was a great host. Very proactive in getting us the info we needed before our stay.

This place was perfect and had everything we needed...Carpet was super clean and soft, beds were very comfy, and all kitchen appliances worked perfect and coffee was supplied...AC and fan worked every time to keep house cool. The decorations were amazing..
Outside was awesome and beautiful ...Only a 15 minute Uber to downtown..
This place is legit ,super happy. Peace

Overall, this was a wonderful stay. The property was very comfortable, and it was greatly appreciated to have outstanding communications from the house.  
This is definitely a place we would stay at again.
The space was lovely and comfortably fit 3 guests. The living room space was roomy and the bedrooms were both super cute! I really recommend staying in this beautiful home while away.

This was such a comfortable place to stay,  everything was so cute and functional. I really loved the many whimsical light options, especially the little mushroom nightlights. It was clear that hosts took pride in furnishing the space with unique and well-preserved pieces. While you can sometimes hear footsteps from upstairs, the unit and neighborhood is very quiet and peaceful. Lots of parks nearby and places for food, shopping, and adventure. Big thank you to the hosts for being extra accommodating and friendly! I would definitely book here again.
We loved our stay. It was a blast looking at all the fun decor!
We had a great experience staying at the airbnb, our host was helpful with instructions and very responsive.
we had a great stay ! Very clean and a safe Neighborhood.
This was perfect for us. We definitely plan to stay again next time we’re in Saint Paul.
Great place
Everything was great. Plenty of cookware to make our meals. Comfortable & Cozy.
Comfortable & cozy townhouse in a beautiful neighborhood. Neat decor!
Place was clean and just as described! So much fun decor to look at and kept us entertained. Beds were comfortable and the place was perfect for what we were needing—no complaints!

This is a gorgeous space that was perfect for our short stay in town for a concert. Lisa and Ivy were both responsive to messages and clearly value their guests. We felt very welcome and the place was even cuter than the photos! We had a great time during our stay.
The place was cute and exactly what we needed for a night to hang out with friends in the cities. Close to St. Paul and easy to get to.
Loved how easy it was to check in and how Walmart was right down the block. Very clean and comfy beds and couch.
Felt very comfortable and at home in this space! The decorations are very cute, and you can tell Lisa and Ivy care alot about their space. I would definitely recommend booking! 😁😁

We felt right at home here! We were able to stay close to our friends’ apartment and was a comfy, quiet place for us to sleep while in the cities. Definitely interesting decor! We would stay again if in the area! Thanks!
my relatives came to the area for Christmas and were very happy with the lodging

We had an excellent stay.  Lisa was very proactive in terms of communicating in advance everything that I guest would need to know.  Everything was wonderful…ease of access, quiet neighbor, close to stores, spotless accommodation, and we loved the retro theme.

I had a great experience staying at this Airbnb. The place was very clean and neat, and the art on the walls felt like a museum exhibit—absolutely stunning! Communication with the host was smooth and easy. However, I did notice that if you have no prior reviews, they require an in-person check-in, even if you've been using the app for years. Aside from that, it’s an excellent place with a very accommodating host. Highly recommend
Lisa’s please was great. Nestled in a quiet neighborhood and stocked with almost anything you could need. Any issues that came up were handled immediately and with ease. Would recommend.
Lisa thank you.This house equipped with all kitchen and woman needs my wife loved it.Well organized furniture all grocery stores around by the highway we loved this place definitely recommend.
